My mother and I stayed at his place for one week and spent a terrific time in in New York.
Ben welcomed us personally, explaining to us everything we needed to know about the apartment. Since he was not in town during our stay he made sure we had all the information we needed in advance. Communication was also very easy, as he responded to our e-mails almost immediately when an issue came up. He provided us with detailed directions to his place and with his apartment being just a few footsteps away from the next subway station, it was not hard to find at all.
The apartment itself was simple but cosy.  Everything we needed was provided. Our bedroom was not facing the street but a courtyard so it was mostly quiet (except during our first night when lots of helicopter traffic was going on).
I can definetely recommend Ben´s place. It's not super fancy but if you're looking for something comfy and perfectly located  this is the place to go for. Great spot to explore NYC from.
Thank you Ben!

Ben was a great host. He was very available before and during our stay. He gives us a lot of useful suggestions for bars and restaurants in the area. The flat is cosy and clean as shown in the picture. The appartment is very closed to the subway which is so great after a long touristic day.

I strongly recommend the flat. Thank you again Ben for the very nice stay

Nous sommes
Trois amies, nous avons passé six nuits dans l appartement de Ben début juin. 
L'appartement est très bien placé car le métro est au bout de la rue, situé à la limite de chinatown. Le voisinage est calme, la chambre ne donne pas sur la rue. Il y a la climatisation.
Ben est très sympa , accueillant. Il nous a donné des conseils et à même pris le temps de nous commander un taxi pour repartir à l aéroport. 
L'appartement est idéal pour trois personnes (trois couchages séparés).
Nous avions tout ce qu'il fallait à disposition dans l appartement (draps, serviettes de toilette, torchons). 
Bref nous vous recommandons cet appartement si vous souhaiter dormir la nuit loin de l agitation de Times square !

Ben's place was great.  It was clean and surprisingly quiet. We were late getting in (almost two hours) and Ben was patient and understanding. 

The only thing I'd say to others is that Ben's apartment is not super close to most of the main tourist attractions.  That worked out for us as I usually stay uptown and wanted to get to know a different area.  There is a lot to do near his place (I especially recommend the tenement museum) but you've got to work a little harder at finding those points of interest. 

I'd happily stay at Ben's place again.

Ben a été un hôte très accueillant, accommodant et discret.Son appartement est conforme à sa présentation, un peu flatteuse. Il est bien situé à 2 pas de Chinatown, et Little Italy et parfaitement desservi par les transports (métro à 50m et bus à la porte). Il est bien équipé et décoré mais sans chichi et nous nous y sommes sentis comme chez nous. Nous le recommandons sans réserve.

Three of us stayed at Ben's for four nights and the apartment was ideal. The location is perfect, a short walk from the Subway station and bike rental. It was comfortable for three people despite being fairly small, and is well decorated and has all the amenities you'd expect. Ben had no problem meeting us late at night for check in and early in the morning to leave, and was friendly and professional. We would happily stay here again or recommend it.

This was a great little apartment and Ben was an excellent host. He waited for us upon arrival (even though we were late), and went through everything we needed to know clearly. He also made an effort to check up on us, which was greatly appreciated. The apartment is small but cozy and definitely has everything one would need for a stay in NYC. It is literally 30 seconds from the F train subway station, which is EXTREMELY convenient after long days out and about!

Ben's place worked out great for us. He keeps it clean and provides all the amenities you need. As other reviewers mentioned, it was close to the F metro station which makes it very convenient. There are also lots of places nearby to get your morning coffee. Ben was also great at communicating with us before and during our trip. He was also flexible with the check out time. Overall we had a great time.

Ben est un hôte très sympathique, agréable et aux discussions très intéressantes, qui n'a pas hésité à nous attendre au milieu de la nuit devant son appartement pour nous remettre les clés... Appartement très bien situé, proche de nombreux lieux touristiques, métro au pied de l'immeuble. L'appartement est petit mais il y a tout ce dont vous avez besoin, et même plus!  On s'y sent comme chez soi. Nous recommandons fortement l'appartement. Merci beaucoup Ben, et à bientôt en France ..? :) Gaëlle et Bastien

Ben is a great host, his correspondance prior to our visit was helpfull and accommodating. He was home to welcome us, and gave great advise about places to eat near the apartment, eventhough he was out of town for the rest of the week.

The apartment is exactly as show on pictures. It is clean and especially perfect for two people seeking a place to stay in Manhattan. The Metro is really close to the apartment.

We had a wonderful time and would recommend this place to others.

Just back from our short stay in NYC at Ben's apartment, which was more than fine for 2 nights. We appreciated Ben's flexibility with the arrival and departure times and he takes care to make sure you have all the information you need for the apartment and the nearby area. The place is small but that's typical for NYC apartments. The three of us did just fine - even had the choice of sleeping on the really long sofa in the bedroom or a "real" bed in the living room. We opted for the sofa and it was comfortable. Being so close to the East Broadway subway was a huge plus - it's literally steps away - and we were able to find a cab to get to airport without going too far. The shop owners in the near vicinity were nice - it was convenient being able to grab a deli sandwich late at night. Ben does a good job describing the area, which is what it is - as long as you don't come expecting the ambiance of Greenwich village or the Upper East Side, you'll be fine.  In the end, my friends appreciated seeing a "real" part of the City and we felt perfectly safe. Ben was good at communicating through the whole reservation process and gave us a nice welcome when we arrived. Thanks for a great stay!

We enjoyed a lot our stay in Ben's appartment. His place is quiet and clean. Ben helped us before and during our stay. He answered very fast to our questions regarding our schedule. It is also well located, very close to the East Broadway station. We recommend his place an we will probably come back one day there. Thanks for all.

Ben is a very welcoming individual who eagerly assisted us during our stay, even though he had to depart to Oklahoma during our stay.  We had a number of contacts in case of emergency; however, we did not need to bother his friends as everything ran smoothly. Ben is an extremely interesting individual, and we wished we could have gotten to know him better - maybe next time.
The place itself is well located to downtown, China Town, Little Italy, Soho and Brooklyn.  Even though we enjoyed walking around, the F Subway is on the corner - so no part of the city is too far.  The neighbourhood itself has a real community feel to it.  It has a mixed ethnic make-up, which gives it an interesting feel.  All in all, a quite enjoyable experience.

We enjoyed our 3 night staying in Ben's apartment - a great base for a short stay in NYC. Description is accurate - the apartment is small but well equipped. We loved the location and not having a typical 'tourists' experience of NYC.

Although we didn't meet him, Ben was a great host - ensuring we could get into the apartment, knew how everything worked and had contacts for any issues. 

Our only other feedback would be that the apartment wasn't that clean and the photos make the place look a little less cluttered than is actually is  - not a major issue but worth being aware of.

We had a very good stay in the apartment for our 4 days in NYC. The apartment is located close to the subway so we had an easy time getting anywhere. Although Ben was out of town, he was very organized and had a friend meet us. All went very well.

A nice and cozy apt, with the subway only a half-block away. Chinatown and Little Italy are a short walk away. The perfect place if you're looking for something in the Lower East Side that comfortably houses two, is reasonably priced and isn't a hotel.

As my wife put it, "I want to stay in an apt and not a hotel to experience the Manhattan way of life". This apt is perfect for that. While it has a kitchen and a dining table ideal for two, my wife and I spent most of our time seeing the sights and eating out.

Ben was awesome. He was always available to answer questions via the AirBnB app and was very courteous, with a light sense of humor. His background in theater is apparent in the apt, with theater and movie-related decorations that were great conversation pieces. 

Won't hesitate to look this apt up again on our next visit to NY!

We had a great time in New York, and enjoyed the apartment of Ben especially because of the great location! The apartment looks the same as on the photos. 

Check in went easily, the neighbour of Ben (Anna) gave us the keys and let us in the apartment. Although we contact through (Hidden by Airbnb) as well with Ben. There is a guide in the apartment available with all the information you need about contact, how things work in the apartment, transportation etc. That was really helpful. 

Regarding to cleanliness, the bathtub was not very clean. We couldn't take a shower after each other directly because the water didn't drain immediately. Also the fridge was stuffed with food and drinks of previous guests. With is not really a problem, but some products were out of date, so a bit smelly. 
There were plenty of clean towels and linens available, in the bathroom closet.

Altogether, we had a good stay! Thank you Ben :)

Great experience! the description is accurate, in fact Ben's apartment is cute and cozy. Very near to the subway and also to the Manhattan bridge and the Brooklyn bridge. 
We had a late check in (because of a delay in airport) but his friend was waiting for us. Although Ben was not in town, he checked to be sure that we have no problem and gave us a contact (just in case) but really we had no need.  
All went very smooth. Thank you Ben, see you next time!

Bens apartment was perfect for our week in NY. Ben wasn't there to meet us but called as soon as we arrived and was easy to contact throughout our trip. The location is great and so close to the subway. Would definitely recommend.

Abbiamo soggiornato nell'appartamento di Ben a Novembre e la sua accoglienza è stata fantastica! Al nostro arrivo ci ha consigliato come muoverci ed è stato disponibile ad ogni nostra domanda! L'appartamento è piccolo ma accogliente , la posizione ottima per girare la città e a pochissimi passi dalla metro. La zona è tranquilla anche di notte ! Consigliatissimo e con un ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo dati i prezzi di New York! Se dovessi tornare a New York sicuramente sapró dove andare!

The description of the apartment was very accurate! Cozy! Ben was very helpful with our late time arrival and getting us settled. The bedroom was nice and quiet, well the whole apartment was pretty quiet which was awesome!

Ben's house was exactly as described. Everything we needed was there and the location was great! Ben was very helpful throughout the entire process; from our very first messages when booking and even after we had left. I would recommend booking Ben's  place for your NY stay!
Amazing apt and very conveniently located. Highly recommended for a getaway in NYC. Not to mention, a very sweet and accommodating host!

Had an very nice stay in Ben's cozy apt on the Lower East Side. The place was comfy and as described. It stayed warm at night, despite the polar vortex blowing -16*C outside! Ben was very helpful and courteous, and remained contactable and responsive throughout our stay. Really interesting area, got a good feel for NYC staying here. Great cafe around the corner too.
Ben was great and happy to help with any questions. The apartment was great it has everything you need and is in a brilliant location, thanks Ben.

Ben was very nice and friendly. Everytime I sent a message, he was responding and helping. The apartment was nice, and great location. Everything was easy to go (brooklyn, time square..) The neighborhood was safe and a lot of store. and the apartment was cosy! Nothing bad to tell!! thank you ben!!

Ben's place is in a perfect location for exploring New York. Everything we needed was present and bed is comfy. Small drainage problem was fixed quickly with help of Ben and Anna (thanks for that!). If we ever come back to NYC we will definitely try to stay here again.

Tout eétait conforme à ce qui était prévu
On s est senti comme de vrai new yorkais pendant ces quelques jours

Bien que Ben ne soit pas disponible pour des raisons professionnelles tout a été parfaitement organisé à mon arrivée ainsi qu'à mon départ. L'appartement est idéalement situé (100m du métro menant directement à Rockfeller Center). Celui-ci est bien équipé. Je recommande vivement ce logement

I stayed for three nights with my son and husband and Ben's place was perfect for our needs. He was very kind and accommodating and responsive to my many questions about restaurants and the area in general. He has amazing suggestions so take note! The area is interesting and rich with history. The apartment was clean and cozy. It is easily accessible to anywhere you want to go. Next time we are in NYC we will stay at Ben's.
Me and My partner had an amazing time in the flat. It is close to everything a lot of bar and restaurant around the area. We had the best time . Ben was amazing with info and directions.

LOVED our stay at Ben's! You're less than a block from the F train stop and can easily get around all of Manhattan! Great location, clean, and an affordable price. Ben was an amazing host and went above and beyond to give great directions for exactly how to get to his place from Newark Airport. Highly recommend.

Ben made us feel incredibly welcome during our time in NYC and changed his plans to meet us in person when our flight into New York ran late. The apartment is very funky and Ben clearly takes a lot of pride in making it look and feel unique and comfortable. Location in the lower east side near East Broadway subway and walking distance to downtown was ideal for us, as was the nearby laundromat and deli. Overall we had a fantastic experience staying with Ben and would highly recommend his apartment to anyone visiting NYC!
We had a good stay at Ben's appartment. Everything was like in the descriptions. Very close to the subway. Ben organized everything well so we could find his appartment and the keys very easily.
Fantastic little apt in an interesting part of NY I hadn't visited before. Ben was very helpful and accommodating with my travel plans. five stars from me :-)

Bens apartment was just as pictured.  Perfect for 3 people staying in New York. The place was clean and cozy with all the ameneties you need. The apartment was right next to the subway and in walking distance of cozy restaurant and bar areas. 
Ben was not in town while we were staying, but Ben was very helpful and accomodating with arrival and departure details and arranged everything to suit our needs. We would recommend Bens place to other guests looking for at nice place to stay in New York.
Fue todo de acuerdo a lo pautado, la zona estaba bien.

Ben's apartment was exactly as described and a great base to explore the LES and East Village. The apartment was clean and comfortable. We didn't actually make any use at all of the kitchen (so many great places to eat in NY), but it seemed like it had everything we could have needed.

We didn't meet Ben, but, we spoke as soon as we got in and he made sure everything was okay and we had everything we needed. He knew we had friends staying not too far away and had advice on how best to get to their area. He was a great host, very patient with our late arrival, and made us feel very welcome in his home.
C'était super ! Très très bon emplacement et Ben est un hôte très gentil et très serviable.

Estuvimos con mi novio 15 dias alojados en el departamento de Ben. Es un espacio lindo y comodo(para dos personas) para descansar despues de un dia de mucho recorrer. La cocina y el baño se encuentran muy bien equipados. La ubicacion del departamento es excelente, a pocas cuadras del Distrito Financiero. Con una estacion del subte F en la esquina, con el cual se llega muy directamente al aeropuerto JFK. En cuanto al barrio, como dice Ben, puede parecer un poco desprolijo por su cercania con el Barrio Chino, pero es muy seguro. Los unicos incovenientes que tuvimos fueron con la tina, la cual se tapa y el agua caliente dura 15 minutos y tarda bastante tiempo en volverse a calentar.Cabe destacar que Ben se ofrecio a pasar a limpiar el departamento en el medio de la estadia y a destapar la tina, aliviando un poco el problema.Como conclusion final, el departamento esta bueno, volveria sin dudas y lo recomiendo ampliamente. Respecto a Ben, es muy amable y flexible con los horarios de check in y check out.
Es un departamento ideal para dos. En el barrio chino,  con un super en la esquina. El Dpto tiene todo en bue n estado y Ben es un anfitrión ideal. Excelente opción

Great locations for public transit, The F train is few steps away, The 6 train is a nice walk thru China Town, the D train is on Delancy about a 5-minute walk and you are close to the highway if you cab frequently. The Spanish restaurant next door food is amazing, as well as amazing Mexican Vegan restaurant up canal street. Laundry Mat and a pharmacy is next door as well, everything you need is within walking distance.  Perfect for a couple, its cozy apt with a very small kitchen area so if you cook it can be challenging. If you want to live like a New Yorker and walk to Manhattan Bridge for photos or perhaps walk across Brooklyn Bridge or even walk to East Village or Soho this is a great location.
Ben was a great host and very friendly. The handover went smoothly and quickly. He answered my questions quickly and friendly. We will gladly come again.

We stayed at Ben's flat for 5 days. His place is situated in a great location right next to the subway, which is helpful. The apartment was clean and nicely decorated. Good communication. A good size flat for a couple. A few drawbacks worth mentioning when paying around £800 for the stay: a) pictures are somewhat missleading-the flat is VERY dark, almost no natural light so not suitable for staying in during the day, b) shower does not drain properly (which seems to be quite a frequent problem judging by the reviews) and toilet kept on blocking (Ben was responsive to this though), c) no cable TV though it is advertised and the Netflix subscription ran out on the second day of our stay so had to swich to our own - not a big deal but probably shouldn't happen when paying quite a lot of money for the stay. Overall, it was an okay stay (we only really slept in the flat and the flat was clean) but next time we would book something cheaper in Brooklyn as it is only one stop away from this apartment.

Ben’s place is great! Good location if you are wanting an authentic NYC experience. Location is right next to Subway so you can get up town conveniently. Ben is really friendly and had great communication. We would stay there again for sure.

My husband, 2 kids and I came into town for Chinese New Year to see my extended family. The location of this place is amazing - right in the middle of China Town, East Broadway subway station is right downstairs, playground across the street, cafes and restaurants all within walking distance. The place is small but we had enough room for even the 4 of us! Ben was a great host - attentive and flexible. Definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay in this area.. and we'll look to book this place again when we come back in future years!
Great location, next to the subway station, Ben was very helpful and gave good advice for restaurants...

L'appartement de Ben est très bien situé, très proche du metro, très pratique pour explorer New York ! Le quartier est très sympa. Ben a été très disponible avant et pendant le séjour. L'appartement n'est pas tout neuf mais correct. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, je recommande !

Lena definitely has an awesome place in a prime location. The renovations are top-notch. 

The place is just 1 bloc away from Columbia University, 3 blocks from Central Park, only 1 block away from Line 1, 2, 3 trains and 3 blocks from subway A, B, and C, and the neighbourhood is full of great places to eat, drink and shop. 

All this only 20 minutes from downtown... Great experience altogether!

Lena was so helpful and communicative throughout the entire process. Our arrival and departure was incredibly smooth- she arranged for her doorman to have the keys right when we arrived. Her building is beautiful and we had no problems getting anywhere- the 2 metro stops got us everywhere we wanted to be. We couldn't have picked a better place to stay for my first trip to the city!

We had a truly wonderful stay in Lena's apartment. She was a generous and gracious host. She gave us great tips on what to do and where to eat, was very helpful with practical concerns and was so pleasant to communicate with. We give Lena and her perfectly situated apartment our top recommendation!

lena's apartment was a great place to relax after long walks in NY. is a nice place, with two metro stations within walking distance and with incredible markets. I travel with my 10 year old son and was very comfortable.

Had a great time! Her place was really clean with a nice modern bathroom. The location was also amazing. We loved that it wasn't right downtown in the middle of tourist-y areas but very close to a few different subway lines.
Also tons of restaurants, grocery stores and other things right around the corner.
Definitely recommended.

Lena's friendly warm welcome and willingness to advise made our stay most enjoyable. Her apartment is very comfortable and with every convenience within close proximity, it was a great location for our stay in New York. Close to Central and Riverside parks with great places to eat, and a choice of 2 subway lines plus buses close by made getting around Manhattan easy. We highly recommend Lena's.

Lena's apartment was great and she was a great host. She answered any transportation, restaurant, grocery store questions that we had. We were late getting in from the airport and she changed her plans to accomodate us. I would give her a good recommendation any time.

Lena was a fantastic host - even though she was on vacation at the time we visited she made sure we felt at home and made arrangements for pick up and drop off of the key. The apartment is really nice and great value - great place to chill out and unwind after a hectic day downtown.

we've  spent really amazing holidays in lena's place.
the appartement is confortable and pleasant to live in.
there's a lot of deli and other shops around.
definitely a good adress.

Great place!!! . . location, apt set-up, WINDOWS in every room (a real plus in NY.) etc. Ditto the other reviews.  Am quite familiar with NY and this met all of my expectations.  For a new visitor to NY, this is an excellent home base, with all the comforts of home.

Lena was out of town during our visit, but through email, text messaging, phone calls, her notes and recommendations, etc., everything worked super smooth.  Very delightful person and looking forward to meeting her on our next visit.

Would definitely stay there again, and would recommend to friends.

Thanks, Lena!!

I and a friend stayed at Lena's one bedroom apt for 5 nights. The over all experience was good. The location was a very nice area for us. The door man abel was very helpful and nice, really made us feel comfortable and helped us with our stay. The subway is close and there is a store and great pub restaurant on the same block a step away. Although keep in mind, this is a personal apt, and here is no professional cleaning. We did our own cleaning and was respectful of her belongings that were in her apt. Overall Lena was very kind and her place was a Life Saver. Thanks again Lena:) ps. You have a wonderful collection of books and we felt very comfortable. I can see you have a great heart I really appreciate you opening up your home to us. Take care!
Excelent apartment.

The apartment is great, the neighborhood is really nice and Lena is a perfect host. My stay here was fantastic and I recommend it all of you. The kitchen and the bathroom are new. The bed and the couch are comfortable. Everything was perfect. Thanks Lena for everything. You are a really nice, friendly and helpful person. Enjoy NYC!!

Lena's apartment is well appointed, clean and very comfortable. The renovated kitchen and bathroom are especially pleasant, Coming back to the apartment after big days of experiencing New York was like coming home. The location is excellent - in a quiet part of Manhattan, close to supermarkets and restaurants. With the subway only 5 minutes away, all of New York is virtually at your doorstep. We would highly recommend Lena's apartment. Thanks Lena!

My husband and I were hosted by Lena in this beautiful apartment for 8 days, everything was just perfect, communication very fast, the apartment was clean and well organized, the bathroom is new with very cool materials, the area is north west central park 1 block to the 1 subway 109th street on the broadway, a nice area full of restaurants, shops, supermarkets....We had even the pleasure to meet Lena! We loved the apartment and we hope to come back to NYC soon! Thanks for everything Lena.
Our stay was comfortable! We would certainly book with Lena again; she was prompt, helpful and very clear in communication.  Great location for access to Columbia University.

Nice flat & good communication.
We had some issues but was solved with Lena
Sono stata bene! grazie Lena

Nice place, excellently localized. Quiet but easy to access (subway Line 01). Very near to Columbia University. The apartment is exactly as described and the host is very attentive to all details. Everything was clean and well organized. The only thing that could be a bit better is the bed mattress, but this is a small detail that won't prevent you from having a good experience.

The apt was just as pictured. Everything was clean and welcoming. Lena was very communicative: she gave accurate directions and, because she couldn't be there, she left an additional contact person in case I needed help. My mom and I needed a place to stay at the last minute around the holidays when things with friends fell through and Lena was very accommodating on short notice. I'm very familiar with NYC and this is a great neighbourhood (right around the corner from the outstanding "Absolute Bagels") and very close to public transit.

This apt would be ideal for 1-2 people on their first trip to NYC or someone just looking to stay in the city for a while. I felt at home as soon as I arrived. The building is secure and the neighbourhood is quiet. If I ever need a place to stay in NYC again, I would come here without hesitation! Thanks again Lena!
This was a beautiful, clean apartment in a great neighborhood!  Couldn’t have asked for a better experience.  Thanks Lena!

The apt was just as pictured, beautiful, clean and in a great neighborhood.
Lena was very communicative and welcoming, she gave accurate directions and even cared to offer suggestions regarding places to visit.
I highly recommend this place! Thanks Lena!

My wife and I went for a very short break to NY and we rented Lena department. From the first minute we arrived at the apartment we were pretty happy. The place looked as it was specified in the information available on the web. Lena is a very nice girl and inspires a lot of confidence. On arrival at the apartment, she gave us important details about the site and some recommendations to better enjoy our visit. The department has everything a visitor needs, and above all is very tidy and clean. The doorman of the building is very friendly. The area is fairly quiet and very close to two subway stations, which is important to organize trips into the downtown area. We strongly recommend to anyone who wants to visit NY stay in the department of Lena. At least that's what I hope to do when you return to NY .. Thanks for everything .. You are fantastic Lena

I was here for work for a week and this apartment was great!  It was very clean and in a great neighborhood. It has an elevator which is somewhat rare in Manhattan and very much appreciated!  The apartment was very clean and Lena (the host) was very communicative and helpful (she even gave me cake)!  I would rent here again.

Léna est une hôte prévenante et réactive, même n'étant pas présente lors de notre arrivée elle s'est assurée que tout se passait au mieux pour nous!
L'appartement est propre et conforme aux photos,  le quartier est agréable, et l'accès très facile aux lignes de métro qui  amènent rapidement vers le sud de Manhattan (20 minutes maxi de métro de la plupart des endroits touristiques). A recommander sans hésiter !

Lena is a thoughtful and responsive host, even not being present when we arrived she made sure everything was going well for us! 
The apartment is clean and exactly like on photos, neighborhood is nice, very easy access to subway lines that quickly lead to the south of Manhattan (maximum 20minutes from most touristic places). Definitely recommended! Thanks again for everything Lena!

The apartment was very nice, cozy and clean, close to subway and central park.  We haven't met the host but we were in touch through e-mail. She was very nice and friendly. 
Only little minus was the noise from the street.

To say it in one word: AWSEOME!!!
The apartment is located in a very nice area of New York. Central Park is so near, you could almost jump in from the window. There are a lot of trendy bars and restaurants in close vicinity.
The rooms are really as shown in the pictures and very clean. The bedroom has an air conditioner which is pretty cool in the hot nights. The bathroom is a little jewel in blue with a great shower (which I loved to use). We didn't used the kitchen but it looked also clean and very functional. 
Lena wasn't there but she gave us a lot of informations and recommendations. She always was very helpful and answered potential questions very quickly. I definitely would book again.

Lena, was very helpful throughout. Her directions and house rules were straightforward and easy to understand. Overall a great experience at her apartment, just right for a couple nights in the upper west side.

Lena's apartment was great for my short New Years retreat. Although I did not meet her, Lena was very helpful and easy to communicate with! She answered all of my questions in a clear and timely manner. The apartment was tidy and just as pictured. The immediate area has stores with everything you'd ever need as a traveler. Apartment is also subway/bus accessible - take advantage of it! And for fans of Seinfeld, Tom's Restaurant is only a few blocks away. Enjoyed my stay, thanks Lena!

The apartment was as described and very clean and tidy. The location was fantastic and extremely close to the subway. Lena was more than available to answer questions and accommodate us; her doorman and other apartment associates were pleasant and welcoming. I would definitely stay again.
Lena was a terrific host, and her apartment is in a great location on the upper west side.  It is convenient and spacious for a NYC apartment, and worked well for our long weekend stay.
Great space and great location. Lena was very helpful and communicative and made sure we had all the information we needed.
Lenas place is quite simply an ideal place to stay for a visit in NYC. And Lena herself is an ideal host - prompt, friendly, and caring of her guests.

Great apartment, awesome location away from the touristy parts giving you an amazing authentic New York experience. Great value, 1 block away from major subway stop making the city easy to navigate. Close to the Northern part of Central Park. Lena was great at communicating with us and answering all of our questions immediately. Would stay here again.
Great location.
Lena is a very thoughtful and attentive host.  I needed for nothing during my stay.

Lena has a great taste in music and arts.  Although I have never met her in person, her apartment is full of pictures and good equipment.  When we entered into her apartment, we found no surprise!  What you see on the website, it's truly what you will get.  She has a guitar, good microwave, and good speakers.  Although I play a guitar, i do not touch it. We personally do not leave any fingerprints on those equipment because we value her space.  It's also my promise to her that I will keep her apartment clean.  On the first day when we arrived, I asked my son not to touch anything of the shelf.   I also feel obliged to clean her kitchen and floor.  I think she appreciated it because she mentioned the kitchen was spotless (Website hidden by Airbnb) am happy to stay in her place and thank her for sharing her space.  We would definitely go back to her apartment when we visit New York.  Thanks Lena.   (also she responded my inquiries quickly, just like what other said).

Good experience, an option to be taken seriously, really pleased with my choice, strategic location, very convenient self checkin and checkout,
Lena is available and attentiv, conexión wifi ok

Una bella esperienza, consiglio la casa di Lena, ben ubicata e servita, buon segnale internet.
Awesome place next to Central Park and Lena is really friendly. Loved it
è stato tutto carino e comodo

This a perfect place! Perfect location  (Upper West side a block from Harlem), perfect size (comfy 1 bedroom with gorgeous tile bath and small but well appointed combined living room and kitchen), perfect host (clear and fast communication). Thank you!
I had an excellent experience with Kate. The place was comfortable and she is very easy to talk to. She can be a great help with getting around NYC and what are the good restaurants, nightlife, etc.

Kate was the best host we could wish for, she's been living in new york for a long time so she has lots of recommendations. The breakfast was spectacular, we could skip straight to dinner. She's such an interesting person to talk to we didn't want to leave the house. Also the location was excellent,best of both worlds, Hell's Kitchen with inexpensive ethnic restaurants and dive bars and buzzing Times Square at equal distance.

Kate fue la mejor anfitriona que podiamos desear, ha vivido en ny durante mucho tiempo así que podía recomendarnos muchos sitios. Sus desayunos eran espectaculares, podíamos saltarnos la comida y pasar a la cena directamente. Es una persona (que además de hablar perfecto español) es muy interesante para conversar, no queríamos dejar la casa. La situación de la casa era excelente, teníamos la zona de Hell's Kitchen con sus restaurantes étnicos y bares muy auténticos y Times Square a la misma distancia. 

We will definitely be back.
Estamos deseando volver con Kate.

Kate is a friendly, easy-going, well-informed and welcoming host! She is also a local New Yorker, so she can give you lots of good tips and insider information on the city! Her aparment is very centrally located so you have easy access to everything!

Kate's apartment is very centrally located and it is very convenient for visiting NYC. She is a special host! 
Hi kate, thank you, we spent a very fantastic week in Manhattan!

Kate's place is great.  It was just the way it appeared in the pictures.  It was very cozy and clean and I felt very safe there with my boyfriend.  Her apartment is in a really fun neighborhood.  It is a few minutes walk from Times Square and only a block from the subway and a large strip of great, diverse, and yummy restaurants.  Central Park, Rockefeller Center, and tons of attractions and shows are all in easy walking distance as well.  Kate is a wonderful and thoughtful host.  I highly recommend her place.

The reviews are a vivid testimony of Kate's hospitality, thoughtful and friendly nature no doubt! Even though I stayed a short period of time, she managed to make me feel at home and also made some excellent suggestions that otherwise I would've not considered. The apartment provides a warm & cozy vibe and the layout is great and the bedroom and bathroom very clean. The location is the best for it is walking distance to Broadway, Times Square, Central Park, etc., and as a female traveling alone the area felt safe to walk at night. If you are looking for a place to stay, search no more, stay at Kate's!

Kate really deserves the positive reviews she has received from other clients.  She is welcoming and helped me choose some of the activities to do in the 4 days I was with her.  The location of the apartment is great and everything is clean and homely.  I recommend Kate´s apartment (either the room or the whole apartment) to anyone who wants a safe, comfortable home while they are in New York - especially other single females.

We had a great stay at Kates place. Kate made us feel right at home from the moment we made our entrance. She was very helpful and recommended some great places to eat. The place was clean and very central located.
I can highly recommend Kate´s apartment. The location is perfectly close to Times Square. The apartment itself is very nice and Kate is extremely hospitable. We enjoyed our stay a lot!

Being at Kate's was a beautiful experience! 
Kate is a wonderful host, the flat is nice and clean and it takes five minutes to walk to Times Square.
Only one warning: be careful, you could be trapped by her beautiful library and spend all your time in New York reading her books!  ;-))

Kate gets an A+ as a host. She's fun,easy going,interesting to talk with and wants to make sure her guest(s) are comfortable. She knows her city well- so take advantage of her knowledge and insight to enjoying all that NYC has to offer.  If you stay with Kate - you are close to Times Square and Central Park - the hustle and bustle of the city. Having said this - the apartment is cozy, clean and quiet. I really appreciated that she had wireless internet access.

We spent four nights at Kate´s apartment. It was a new experience for us to share an apartment with someone who we didn´know before. We can highly recomend Kate´s apartment, it´s very well located and clean, but overall
Kate gave us a very warm hospitaliy. Thanks Kate for your kindness and we hope to visit you again.
Simply the best!

We are really proud to say it was very nice meeting Kate during our visit in NY city and I promise we will be back! Thank you Kate for everything! We had a great experience staying in your house and renting a bedroom. She is so friendly and the best hostess you can ever meet. She even got for us a special ground coffee that we could have the coffee the way we drink back home :) you are amassing!  The room itself is quite small, but it doesn't matter, because you are not looking for posh environment when you are here to explore NY. The apartment itself is very close to all main sightseeing points, metro stations, two block away from the Time square. Kate provided all maps and mention the prioritized places of interest in the city. We saw as much we could see in three days and we had the best time staying with Kate. It's so clean and safe, as somebody mentioned. Don't hesitate to use this smart opportunity to rent this apartment or room rather staying in an expensive hotel! Best luck and have a great time in NY. Best regards to Kate as well :)

It seemed like quite an adventure to rent someone's bedroom, definitely a new experience for us!  As soon as we arrived we felt comfortable with Kate.  She is warm and comfortable to be with.  Her suggestions of places to go and restaurants to try were most helpful!  And we appreciated the clean, very safe place to land after exhausting days!

Well what can you say about Kate and her (Website hidden by Airbnb) was all really too lovely for words!
Great location, incredibly hospitable, clean and homely with everything you might need in a room as a base for exploring one of the busiest cities in the world. Kate has fantastic local knowledge (ask for her restaurant recommendations they are all very good, especially the Thai) and will be happy to help you out deciding what to do next as a “local tourist”.
It was a pleasure to meet Kate and to stay in her apartment; I would definitely stay with her again.  She made us feel so comfortable and relax. A real pleasure Kate, “Thank you”
Kate and her apartment were terrific!  The location is ideal, and Kate is really friendly, and very knowledgeable about her New York.  I will definitely stay there again!

Kate is a perfect guest. The apartment is not big but clean and sharing it with her was not a problem. On the contrary it revealed a very positive experience. She is very kind and very easy, and interesting, to talk to. I would recommend her, definitely.

This was our first experience using Airbnb, and it was a great one! Kate was a wonderful host. Our flight was delayed and she waited at the apartment to greet us and give us keys. She even had our favorite breakfast snacks, juices, and coffee waiting on us each morning. Her knowledge of the city blew us away and we really enjoyed our conversations with her. She was also very quick to respond to emails I sent before our visit. The apartment was very clean. She had clean towels and sheets ready when we arrived. All around...Kate was wonderful and we will definitely stay with her next time we visit New York.

This was our first experience with airbnb and it was definitely great. Although Kate could not be there when we were in NY (as she had informed us in advance), communication with her was really good and quick. She organized that a friend of hers was there to welcome us and also stayed at the appartment during our stay, which was great, as we got lots of information. We had some nice and interesting chats, too. Regarding the appartment: it is very clean and has a great location - close to lots of restaurants, Times Square, Central Park, public transport etc. We would definitely recommend staying at Kate's place and would stay there again, when we get the chance to visit New York again.
Kate is an absolutely wonderful person and host. She made me feel secure and comfortable, and her place is the perfect spot for access to all the city.

Kate is a very helpful and friendly host. Hers is a genuine New York apartment, small and right in the middle of everything: Times Square, Hell's Kitchen, Broadway. But miraculously it's quiet and peaceful in her apartment. I recommend the Hop On Hop Off bus whose base is just around the corner in 8th Ave.

Kate is an incredible host and just a wonderful person in general.  One of the best parts of my stay was just hanging out and talking with Kate because she has some of the most interesting and funny stories to tell about New York and also her travels.  She's super personable, and (as her library will reflect) she is an intellect.  She wants the best for people.  I would come home late at night because I'd been working all day, and Kate would make me these awesome smoothies.  After only a few days staying with her, I feel like I've known her for years and consider Kate a friend of mine.  I would recommend her to anybody and everybody looking for a wonderful stay in the heart of Manhattan for an unbeatable price!

Kate, she is very kind and interesting person.
 She has been very helpful and always avalaible when I needed anything.
The apartment  and the room was clean, quite and very comfortable.
 It's near 3 subway,  Five minute away from Centrale Park and Brodways etc 
There is many shops around and Internet cafe as well.
I'll recommand you and all my friend to stay with Kate.
She just amazing and we all want someone to meet someone nice in our holiday. 
I 'll stay there on my next trip in NYC  for sure.

Kate was a wonderful host. She gave me information about what to do in the neighbourhood and has several maps and guidebooks available for her guest. The apartment was clean, comfortable and very well located (two avenues from Time Square with plenty of nice small restaurants). I would definitely recommend staying by Kate the next time you go to NYC... A bientôt Kate !

Kate es una fantastica anfitriona, una persona super inteligente , respetuosa y amable.  La estadía fue excelente !  Gracias Kate por hacer mis vacaciones en NY  perfectas !!!  Por tu colaboracion y tus interesantes charlas.  Espero poder volver pronto.

First of all, I miss Kate and her place when I see the pictures of her listing They speak volumes: if this looks like a fit for you, it is.  Kate's apartment is such a great place to be in New York:  location, comfort, and the little etc. like great coffee and conversation.  I'd especially recommend it to a new visitor to the city because you'll come away knowing one of the coolest people there.  Kate is easy going, accommodating of your needs, and tremendous fun to spend time around.

Great place and fantastic location, access to everything.  You couldn't stay in a more convenient location.  There are lots of stairs to climb but that didn't bother me.  Kate is the hostess with the mostess - she's a very kind  person and genuinely cares how her guests are doing.  I stayed there on my own for a few nights and the couple of nights Kate stayed too we had a great laugh.  Native New Yorkers always know the best places to go!  This was my first air bnb experience and it was an excellent one.  Would highly recommend Kate's place and will definitely stay there again.  I consider Kate a friend.

Kate was a wonderful host who made me comfortable from the very first moment. She offered me food, great stories, on-going consideration, and many useful tips. It is obvious that she cares about her guests and they her, as a former one came to visit and several more contacted Kate to share news. It couldn't have been nicer.

Kate is an amazing host. She really goes the extra mile to make you feel welcome. Kate is lots of fun to visit with and has vast knowledge of the city which she is always eager to share. Without her advice we would have missed out on alot of great experiences. Kate's apartment is really nice, very clean and spacious.  Not to mention a great location! Any time we are in NYC we will definitely stay here.

Ottima esperienza! 
Kate è una spendida padrona di casa, gentile, simpatica, intelligente, interessante e sempre disponibile nel dare suggerimenti e consigli per muoversi a NYC.
La camera è piccolina (noi siamo stati in 2) ma questo non è un problema se si considera la posizione centrale dell'appartamento vicinissimo a Time Square ed comodissimo alla metropolitana. La zona è ricca di ristoranti (in particolare la 9 Ave) e negozi di ogni tipo ma allo stesso tempo molto tranquilla. Kate ci ha fornito di asciugamani e lenzuola al nostro arrivo.
Ogni mattina ci ha fatto trovare the, caffè, succhi, latte, marmellata e pane di qualità per la nostra colazione.
Nella casa inoltre è anche disponibile il wi-fi.
Io la consiglierei a tutti quelli ricercano un meraviglioso soggiorno nel cuore di Manhattan per un prezzo imbattibile!
A presto Kate!

Fue una estadía maravillosa!!!
Estar con  Kate fue la mejor elección que pudimos haber hecho en este viaje.
Su casa está especialmente llena de energía y buena onda, es pequeña pero bonita... kate es excelente anfitriona, nos dio el desayuno todas las mañanas  y además hace un pan Irlandés casero muy ricoooo !!!
Nos ha  llenado de información, nos dio muchos mapas y libros de la ciudad, nos ha aconsejado donde ir, como ir y qué hacer...
Hemos compartidos cenas y charlas de nuestras vidas, muy interesantes.
Volveremos sin duda a visitarla en nuestro próximo viaje ..
Kate es realmente adorable !!!!

Kate is the perfect host. From the moment I arrived, my needs and expectations were met and exceeded.  She was there to meet me at the apartment.  There was always coffee, or tea, brewing and food ready to be eaten.  Kate was there to lend an ear and to share a funny story.  She even showed me round the city on more than one occasion.  The apartment is exactly as pictured in the photos.  It is homely and comfortable and is the perfect place to recharge the batteries and escape the hustle and bustle of Manhatten. If Kate’s friend Omar is around, make sure he takes you on a tour of the city - easily one of the highlights of my trip. Whenever I was at the apartment or out and about with Kate I felt like a local, which is exactly why I chose airbnb.  If you are looking for a genuine New York experience at a reasonable price, this is it.  Thanks again Kate for all the wonderful memories and I’ll see you again soon.
Kate is friendly, laid back and very accomodating.  I was there for a conference in Times Square.  Location was excellent.  Thanks, Kate!

Confermo il giudizio espresso da altri: ottima location a due minuti da Times Square, stanza piccola ma letto comodo e bagno pulito. Kate è una splendida persona sempre disponibile a darti una mano.
Se cercate una stanza e non un appartamento, è la scelta ideale!
5° piano senza ascensore.

My boyfriend and I stayed for 6 days to do a professional workshop and our experience was absolutely fantastic! It was our first airbnb stay, and Kate was extremely accommodating, helpful, and friendly. Whether you're looking to have a personal experience with a local, or just need a quiet place to work or rest with no interruptions, this is the place for you. The room was clean, VERY quiet, A/C with a large bed and a small closet space. Everything was as, or even better than described, and there were no surprises when we arrived. Kate is great with communication, and answered our concerns and questions quickly. My boy friend, a chef, cooked a gourmet meal for the three of us so we could share something unique together. I would definitely stay here again and consider Kate a very experienced hostess, and someone who is great at creating a personal connection with her guests.

Wow! After more than two weeks at Kate's apartment I am convinced: Kate is the most amazing host! She is incredibly accommodating, friendly, considerate and has a great sense of humor! Her place was very centrally located and the room itself is quiet, clean with a A/C for the warm days. I will definitely stay with Kate the next time I am in New York!

My sister and I really enjoyed our stay at Kate's apartment. The place is right in the heart of Manhattan and is close to nearly everything we needed. Kate is a very welcoming and caring host, we always felt safe and secure at her apartment and she gave us a lot of privacy while always being available to talk or give a useful advice. We really liked her place and the room, despite of seeming small, fit two us well; the bed was really comfortable and the WiFi and air conditioner worked fine. After spending almost a month at Kate's place, it became like a second home to us - I would definitely recommend staying with Kate, she is an amazing and interesting person and her home is great!

Kate was an awesome host!  Very engaging and helpful with good advice on what to do and see.  She was extremely hospitable and sweet.  Can't beat the location: just a few minutes from Times Square and some GREAT restaurants close by.  The climb up the stairs was pretty brutal but I guess it was a good workout for my muscles...
The reservation was canceled 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Kate was amazing, I loved staying with her. The place was beautifully located in the heart of midtown and Times Square and so peaceful at night. She was very welcoming and made me feel safe in a new city. She even helped bring my heavy luggage up. We had great talks at night and she recommended great places to visit during the day. My room was very private, clean and nice. Kate stayed on her side of the apartment and didn't bother me at all. Would stay here again!
Great location. It's about a block away from Time Square. Kate was very helpful too.

Perfect experience! Staying at Kates place was a pleasure. Easy and uncomplicated come together! Kate gave us good tips and information around our stay in NYC. Very centralized location. Thank you Kate!

Kate was an amazing host :) she gave us great directions to get to places that we needed to go to. She is very welcoming and nice. Her place was a great place to stay at because it is very very close to Time Square. It is also close to the subways and it was easy to get there from La Guardia Airport. When me and my friend stayed there, we stayed out late at Time Square and we felt safe walking to her place, the neighbourhood is safe. I would recommend this place to anyone :) It is a really nice walk from Time Square!! :D We had an amazing time at her place and NYC!!

Maravilloso lugar muy acogedor y con todo lo necesario, super bien ubicado, cerca del movimiento en new york, transporte y demás, Kate es una excelente anfitriona amable y cordial, muy interesante, habla español y nos organizó para movernos por la ciudad, en conclusión espectacular!!!!

If your priorities are location and affordability, then this is the place for you.   It's a small one bedroom, 5th floor walk up in a great location.  It's right on the border of the theater district and hell's kitchen.  It's perfect if you enjoy walking, great food, and central park.  We walked around the city all day and then came back for dinner in hells kitchen.  You can find every type of food imaginable, within a block or two of the apartment.  And Kate was great at communicating with us, even though she was out of town.  That being said, there were a few inconveniences we had to deal with during our stay.  Since Kate was not home we had the added bonus of privacy, but when we arrived we had to buzz a neighbor to let us into the building.  Another guest had just left the apartment, and with Kate out of town the bathroom wasn't clean and the drains were clogged.  But my husband was able to unclog the drains and clean.  I contacted Kate about this and she very considerately offered to give a $50 rebate which we appreciated.  Also, there is an unfortunate elderly neighbor across the hall who often leaves his door open and the smell of urine fills the hall.  The elderly neighbor also plays his television too loud in the middle of the night, but my husband asked him to turn it down and he did.  All in all it was a great trip, just be prepared to deal with a few obstacles.

We had a great zip of NYC, thanks to Kate's cosy and perfectly situated apt! Off course, we were exploring the city most of the time, but when we stayed in, we really felt at home. The place is clean, the shower works very good (big plus!), everything we needed was there. We met Kate on our last morning around, when she really helped us out with our bus tickets. Thanks Kate, it was very nice meeting you, best of luck and hope to see you again!

Marieke & Guido

Kate was an excellent host and was very informative about the local area and getting around the New York.   The room is comfortable and the apartment has everything you need.  It is extremely well located in the hear of the theater district, close to Times Square and the subway.  All in all a great place to stay.  Would come back any time.

Kate did a wonderful job hosting my wife and I during our 4 day stay.  She was not only accommodating and friendly, she also knew a thing or two about NYC!  We checked out her recommendations for everything from Broadway tickets to ramen shops and were not disappointed.  Her apartment is extremely convenient to all the city has to offer and comfortably fit us.  The only thing to be aware of is the five flights of stairs on the way up!  This was a welcome bit of exercise though and allowed her unit to have a wonderful view.  We look forward to staying there again.

Desde antes de nuestra llegada a Nueva York, Kate estuvo pendiente de nosotros.
Estuvo enviandonos mensajes para poder ponernos de acuerdo para la entrega de llaves.
A nuestra llegada al alojamiento nos recibió para enseñarnoslo y darnos algunos consejos de qué ver y donde comer en Manhattan.
Fue de gran ayuda podernos comunicar con ella en castellano.
El apartamento és igual que se ve en las fotos, limpio y tal y como se describe en el anuncio.
La localización es excepcional, a 5 minutos a pie de Times Square.
Era nuestra primera experiencia con Airbnb y estamos encantados con ella y sobretodo con el trato de Kate.
Repetiriamos sin dudarlo.
Raquel y Rafa.

This was a really great apartment in a really great location (really, it's close to everything). It's in a nice, reasonably quiet area/building which is hard to find in Manhattan. Kate was very helpful with suggestions for places to eat and things to do.  I didn't have the chance to meet her in person but she was always quick to respond to any questions by email or phone.

Home from home in Manhattan :) I stayed at Kate's apartment for a week, and it was perfect - super cosy with great kitchen and bathroom facilities and more books than you can possibly read! Location is perfect for Midtown, very convenient for Times Square, Central Park and many nearby subway stops. Kate is a true Superhost, quick to respond on any check-in queries and incredibly knowledge about New York both past and present.

Kate was great! She is very kind and friendly. I was in NYC for the first time with my boyfriend and it was very nice staying with her. QShe recommended restaurants and places for us to go, which was very useful! Besides, she is a very interesting person to talk to! I will definitely stay at Kate's next time I go to NYC!

Staying with Kate is like staying with a friend. She is welcoming and knowledgable and offers the best advice so that we can enjoy NYC and what it has to offer. Location wise it was perfect. Great host. Stay with Kate.

Our stay at Kate´s place was perfect. The flat isn´t very big as we knew from the pictures, but you will find everything you need for a confortable stay: good bed big enough for a couple, cleanliness, wifi and it is VERY close to Subway, restaurants and many points of interest in Manhattan, just a few mins walk to: Times Square, Rockefeller center, Bryant Park, 5th Avenue, Central Park, Broadway and much more. And the best of all, Kate, she is very friendly and always ready to advise you and give the best recommendations. She took a lot of care of us even before we arrived, we would repeat without doubt. Thanks for all!

Kate was an amazing host, we had a really great time by her. The apartment's location is the best, we was able to walk to Central Park, Times Square or to the other turist targets, and the subway is also near. Kate was really helpful (although she couldn't be at home) she gave us useful New York maps and before the trip she gave us good advices how to get the easiest way to her apartment from JFK. Furthermore we had two big suitcases, and she helped us and brought downstairs one of them. I offer her for anybody who wants spend a great time in New York City and have a nice friend from there.
 Thank you again for your kindness and for everything! :)

Kate is a wonderful host. She is a very warm person and welcomed me in her tiny but very cozy apartment. We had great conversations and i feel as home. 
Even before i arrived i knew where and how i get Kate's place. She gave me (a first time NY traveller) perfect  advices how to get the easiest way to her apartment from JFK. 

The apartment's location is just steps away from Times Square, Rockefeller Plaza and Central Park. I was able to walk to all that places in "minutes". For other places the subway station (A-,E-,C-trains) is just 2 blocks away. Kate is so helpful giving me useful tips exploring New York, where to eat, getting the best coffee in town ;) and so on. I got to know NY in a very easy way, also places which you not found if  no one indicates you.
Anyone who will spend a great time in New York City in a central location with a personal touch I really recommend Kate and her apartement.
Kate, thank you very much for your kindness and the great time in NYC.
Fue una excelente estadía! Kate fue increíble desde el comienzo. Siempre atenta y muy cordial muchas gracias Kate!!

Kate è un host davvero premuroso. Ancor prima di arrivare, ci ha indicato in modo molto chiaro come raggiungere il suo appartamento.
La posizione in cui si trova l'alloggio è perfetta: vicina alla metropolitana e a due passi da Times Square.
L'appartamento è esattamente come mostrato in foto: piccolo ma adatto alle nostre esigenze.
Kate è sempre stata disponibile a darci preziosi consigli ed è stato un vero piacere conoscerla.

A lovely host and a lovely apartment! Kate was very helpful with directions and the apartment was easily accessible from LGA and JFK. I would definitely reccomend Kate and would happily stay with her again in the future.

Kate was an excellent hostess! She helped us with tips on places to check out, was all in all a gracious host. The room was cozy and always at the perfect temperature for chilly New York City, with dozens of restaurants / bars  a stone's throw away. Had a great time and would definitely stay with Kate again!

Kate was extremely helpful,  warm and welcoming.  She went out of her way to make us feel comfortable and helped us with the necessary information to get around. 

Her place is extremely convenient and walkable around times square, the theatres and even central park.  Will definitely recommend it to anyone.

Kate è davvero una perfetta host, gentile ed ospitale. L'appartamento è a due passi da Time Square, ma comunque silenzioso e tranquillo. La stanza è un po' piccola ma completa di tutto. Prima di partire ci ha anche regalato un libro per la nostra bambina. Ci siamo trovati davvero bene!
Kate est une personne accueillante, avec qui nous avons pu partager de chouettes conversations. Appartement très bien situé et très calme la nuit. Une adresse que nous recommandons fortement.

Excellent place, cousy apartment, perfect location with a walking distance from Times Square.
Kate was responsible for making us feel like home, even from before arriving she was attentive to our needs, giving us all kinds of advices. Choosing Kate like our host was and excelent choice. 100% Recomended.

Kate's house was a very central place in Hell's Kitchen neighborhood. She was very helpful about sightseeing place suggestions and some local area information. We stayed in her place comfortably and had great NYC vacation.

Hello Kate ;-) missing you already.X. I could not ask for more, all the comments well accurate, and I could not ask more more kind friendly and helpfull host. it was my first airbnb experience, and hope that in the future in other countries will meet hosts like Kate if back to NY I know where I would like to stay. ;-) hope to see u again Kate, and best of luck

Ha sido una experiencia fantástica. 
Kate ha sido una perfecta anfitriona. La habitacion fue exactamente como se mostraba y la ubicacion a 2 bloques de Times Square inmejorable.
De ontvangst was vriendelijk en de omgeving een aanrader. Kate wist ook  interessante adressen in de omgeving mee te delen.

Everything was perfect.
Kate gave us precise directions about how to get to her apartment, infos about what to do and total freedom.
The position of the apartment is fantastic, very close to Times Square and to the subway.
We have been there for 10 days and it was amazing!
Thank you sooo much :)

My boyfriend and I had an amazing first AirBnB experience with Kate! She was very hospitable and accommodating. She gave us a lot of privacy, but at the same time helped us out a lot with our questions. Her place is very clean and cozy! It is conveniently located very close to subway stations, Times Square, broadway theatres, bars and restaurants! Next time we visit NYC again, we are definitely coming back! PS Don’t forget to visit Ippudo and Los Tacos No. 1 Kate!

It was really a pleasure to stay at Kate's App.
Kate was really nice,helpful and heartily to us! The App was clean and the bed is comftable. 
The Location of the App is perfect for NYC. It is very close to Times Square and a Subway is nearby. That was perfect for us

Adorei a estadia na casa da Kate! 
Excelente anfitriã. Apartamento super bem localizado. Ela nos deixou super à vontade..
Muito obrigada Kate! Voltaremos com certeza!
Bjs Flavia e Monica

I loved the stay at the home of Kate !
Excellent and kindness hostess . Flat located very well. 
Thank you Kate ! We'll be back !
Bjs Flavia and Monica

Kate's place was clean, neat, and the super-convenient location made it possible to see two shows in one day with a stop at her place in between to change clothes.

She was always ready with reliable advice on transport, food, and activities.

We had a great time and look forward to staying with her again the next time we're in Manhattan.

It was such a pleasant experience to stay with Kate! Kate is very helpful and gives us a lot of useful advice! The room is clean and cozy. And the location is so great that we always walk around to see Times Square, Broadway show and many other fantastic spots. If we travel to NY a second time, we will definitely choose Kate as our airbnb host!:)
Kate es muy diligente, ordenada y amable. Tiene experiencia como anfitriona de Airbnb, eso es muy claro. La descripción de la habitación era la correcta.
Fue muy amable en todo momento y nos ayudo que hablara español. El barrio es super tranquilo pero a la vez super céntrico. .

Our first night at Kate's found us in Times Square after only a short walk from her door! Amazing location definitely made up for the tiny space and basic accommodation.   
Kate was incredibly helpful and knowledgable and very engaging. Thanks Kate!

We spent a week at Kate's apartment and we can't imagine a better location for visiting the city. It is amazing returning home every day through the Times Square full of life. The apartment is very clean, the bathroom is new. The flat is not so big but it perfectly fits all the needs of two guests. It was nice talking to Kate at evenings and her recommendations regarding nearby placed to eat, transportation and touring the city were very useful. She knows the city very well and has great tips regarding almost everything you can do in the city. It was easy to communicate Kate for check-in and check-out. Kate provided everything we needed and gave us a lot of space so we felt very comfortable sharing the apartment with her.
Kate家地理位置绝佳，到百老汇一个街区步行的距离。周边也是相对闹中取静，比较安全，有小卖店可以随时买点吃的喝的。我去的几天主人都不在家，所以得推着大箱子去几个街区外的一家咖啡店拿钥匙，不是很方便。床单枕套等等也都是跟青年旅舍一样得自己动手。房间没有照片是如此宽敞整洁，还是有太多杂物堆积，床及床品已经非常老旧。就当是地理位置抵了全部的房价吧。

Kate é uma maravilhosa anfitriã , nos ajudou bastante com suas dicas . Foi extremamente solícita . Tivemos que chegar um pouco mais cedo para o check in e ela foi bem tranquila e amigável em relação a isso . O local fica a dois quarteirões da Times Square , perto de restaurantes , perto de estações de metrô , enfim perto de tudo. Kate sempre muito atenciosa. O único ponto negativo é porque o apartamento fica no quinto andar e o prédio não possui elevador , mas isso está descrito no anúncio . Certamente é um excelente local para se hospedar em Nova York se você quer ficar perto das principais atrações turísticas .

Kate was great! She was very flexible in arrival/check-out time, and was extremely helpful in providing many ways of getting from the airport to her place. Once we arrived, she had many helpful maps, menus, and suggestions for things to do and places to eat. Her apartment is in a great area - VERY close to subway, Times Square and many many other great tourist attractions. Would 100% recommend her and her place an option if you're looking for a place to stay in NYC. Thanks again, Kate! :)

Kate was awesome, very kind and helpful. Her place is two crossings away from the Time Square, it was fantastic, you just hop out of your room and into NYC lifestyle. I stayed with my fiance and if I would visit NY again, i would love to be at Kate's place again. Thank You for everything.

Kate was really helpful on everything about NYC. We had a relatively short trip, only 3 days. So Kate's apartment is perfect for us. We only want to have some good food and do some shopping. The location is amazing. Anywhere we want to go, we can basically walk there. And the neighborhood is surprisingly quiet, considering it's close to Time Square.
Also it's nice talking to Kate the night before we left. Definitely gonna consider this again.

Another great stay at Kate's place.  As always, very welcoming and helpful.  Due to train cancellations, I was almost stranded in New York. Kate rescued the situation by researching all of the other travel options and finding me one of the last seats on a bus heading out of town.  Really saved the day for me.
Excellent central location in Manhattan near many attractions. Kate was a good host and gave me a lot of information that helped me during my stay.

Kate's apartment is wonderful. It's in a perfect location with especially easy access to the Broadway theaters and the Bryant Park area (I was in town to use the NYPL).  The room is spotlessly clean, very comfortable, and because it's tucked away from the street, quiet.  Kate herself is an incredibly kind, friendly, and extremely helpful host.  She's ready with any directions and recommendations you might need.  I really enjoyed getting to know her.  I hope we cross paths again!

As advertised, the room is small but it is enough for a couple (more than 3 suitcases can be challenging maybe) to sleep and visit the city.  The location is perfect, really close to Times Square, the underground is nearby and easy to reach all the important places to visit. Kate is really friendly and always willing to help if you need it. She didn't have any problems with us leaving our luggage in the apartment until the time to go to the airport, for instance. I definitely recommend this apartment.

Kate is awesome! she was very kind and helpful. We felt very comfortable in her apartment. Her house is so clean and tidy, and is so centrical. Everything is near from this location! We practically did not need to use the metro. We surely recommend Kate and her place. Thanks for everything Kate!!

Thank you, Kate, for your hospitality!  Very quiet and safe place to stay. I very much appreciated the extra effort made to help me navigate my way from JFK to Manhattan. Kate was so great to provide me several options (with prices and necessary specific directions) which made arriving to a very busy city quite manageable.  As long as people are willing to go up 5 flights of stairs (which was fine with me) and share a bathroom (which was never a scheduling problem), then I'd recommend this booking. It's centrally located, easy to find, and most importantly safe and quiet.  Kate, was a gracious host. Thank you!!!

Kate is a very nice person. She helped us planning our arrival in NY. She gave us many different ideas how to get to her appartement from the airport. Once we arrived there she handed out some maps and gave us local directions. The room was clean and she provided towels for showers,etc. We had a great time there. The location is superbe. Thanks for everything Kate.

Kate was not home during my visit but she was very good about arranging for me to get the key and making sure I got in okay. In general, she was a very responsive host. The apartment was exactly as pictured, clean and cozy. The five flights of stairs makes this a challenging location for anyone with large or heavy luggage. I would recommend this place to anyone traveling to Manhattan, especially people who want to sample the restaurants of Hell's Kitchen.
Kate took the initiative to send us ground transportation directions to make sure we made to her place easily. Everything was perfect!

It's really good place! The apartment is really clear and comfortable. It's only 5 to 7 minutes to walk to the Time Square. Kate is a really nice person. We had some great conversation together. And she gave us some great advice in living in New York.

We had a quick overnight trip to NYC and stayed a Kate's place, and it was great! Kate was extremely flexible with my arrival time, and we had no issues finding her place and getting settled in. Kate was welcoming and her place had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Towels, nice size bed with air conditioning, shower, etc. Everything was clean. The location was excellent and she made us feel very comfortable. We will most definitely be staying with her again the next time we go to NYC. This was our first AirBnB experience and because of Kate's hospitality, the expectations are very high going forward. Thank so much, Kate!

Kate was the best host we've met yet. She gave very detailed instructions on how to get to her place.  She was there to greet us and showed us around, and as we were discussing our plan for the day,  even walked us to Grand central station on her way to the Public library.
Kate  knew her city well, and that's a plus for her guests. We'd definitely stay at Kate's again when we want to get our fill of NYC Broadway. Thank you Kate for having us.

The place is nicer and cleaner than I expected. Location is perfect. Kate is the best host that I've ever met. I checked in very late but Kate was there to greet me and explained to me how to use everything. She was very kind to offer help at any time even before I arrived in New York. I definitely will stay at her place again next time I visit New York.

My husband and I had a fantastic time staying with Kate. She was friendly, helpful and her apartment was perfectly located for going to see Book of Mormon on Broadway. We would definitely stay with Kate again.

I arrived a little bit later than I planed.
But she explained me kindly how to come to room.
My room was very cozy and nice.
I want to tell her 'thanks a lot' again through this page.

My experience staying with Kate was short, but very nice and accommodating. My friend and I found the building easily and liked the fact that it was close to the subway, broadway and times square. The only challenge was the walk up and down stairs but manageable nonetheless. I would definitely stay with Kate again next time I'm in NYC.

Kate is an amazing host! I enjoyed her daily talks and advice. She is a savvy of NYC's history. She also tells you how to save money sightseeing the city. Although the room is small when you carry a lot of luggage, she arranged me some extra space to leave it and made me feel comfortable.

Kate's place is as exactly as described. The room is nice and cool with air-conditioning and quite safe and quiet considering it's only few blocks away from Times Square. The location is just perfect, and actually it's within walkable distance to most of the attractions that you want to visit- Times Square, Broadway, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, Lincoln Center, Empire State Building, Macy's etc. Kate is friendly and helpful, she gave me a lot of travel advice and provided nice food and every essential. I so enjoyed my stay with Kate and night talks with her. I can't recommend enough and will definitely stay here again next time I travel to NY!

Kate is a wonderful person!
She was really kind and helped us a lot with everything. Breakfast was really good and the location is perfect, really near to times square.
If you are going to stay some days in NY, this is a really good place!

Kate's home was perfect for us.  She could not have been more helpful or welcoming.  The apartment is small but lovely.  Transportation is easy -- one stop to the Port Authority, two to Penn Station and subways nearby.  We hope to stay there every time we are in New York!

We stayed 6 days and was everything fine as we expected. Kate is a really nice person and help us a lot in directions and nice tips and tricks in NYC. The location is superb and you will just walk to Time Square. Tks Kate and keep the Brazil flag with you! Bye and see you next time.
Kate was an amazing host, her help was valuable for us and the trip was amazing.

Kate was so friendly and helpful. We never we needed her she was there. Her place is pretty and cozy and the location is perfect. Really close to times square and Hell's Kitchen but on a quiet street so you can breathe.

We just had an amazing weekend in NYC and we owe it all to Kate. Her place is perfectly located within walking distance to everything we wanted to do and her knowledge and experience was invaluable. We not only had a great experience in NYC we've also made a new friend. Thanks again Kate!

Our stay at Kate's place was great because the location was really good, it was a good value and check-in and check-out were seamless. Kate was nice enough to give us directions to and from the airport, and we were able to check in right when we arrived in the city and leave our bags at Kate's after check-out so we didn't have to carry them around the city before our flight! It got 4/5 stars because my husband and I thought the bed was pretty hard and it made sleeping comfortably a challenge. Overall, I would definitely recommend Kate's place if you're looking for simplicity and a great location.

We had a great stay at Kate's place. Really good location (2-3 minutes to Times Square and Broadway by walking) and near to subway. Kate is really nice, cool and kind. She has been attentive to all our needs. And she knows really well the city so she can help you with your itinerary and restaurants. We recommend this place!

This was our second time staying at Kate's.  She is an exceptional host, very interesting to talk with and knowledgeable about NYC history and attractions.  Her home is very clean and welcoming.  We will be back.
Kate has been an amazing host. Very helpful and kind. The location is fabulous! Highly recommendable place to stay.
This is my second stay in Kate's house and it was great.  She is really kind with her guests.  The apartment was very clean and the shower simply espectacular.

Kate est une hote géniale ! Elle est toujours la lorsqu'on a besoin d'aide, fait tout pour qu'on se sente bien chez elle, et le petit déjeuné nous a bien fait plaisir lors de notre séjour. Emplacement parfait ! Les 5 étages sont parfait pour éliminer la bonne nourriture américaine :). Nous vous conseillons vivement ! Kate est au top ! Si nous retournons un jour à NYC on ira chez elle avec plaisir !

Kate is amazing! It was such a pleasure having her as a host, she is such an interesting and cultured woman, and really cares about her guests getting the best that they can. Complimentary breakfast was a HUGE plus for the big apple, and she was able to give us recommendations to several places!
