The apartment comes with bed with clean sheets, functioning kitchen, WiFi, cable TV and bathroom with hot water. We had a great time enjoying the spending time exploring the Upper West Side here

Brian's apartament is small, functional and welcoming. The location is perfect, close to subway, Central Park and Columbus Circle, the neighborhood is highly recommended. perfect for couples looking for a place to unwind from a long day of sightseeing.

We had a fantastic time staying in Brian' apartment. The apartment is well located - close to mutiple subway lines and in a great neighborhood. Brian was very accomadating and easy to communicate with. I would definitely come back again!

This was my first using this type of service and I couldn't have been more happier!

Brian was very accommodating from start to finish (even as our bus arrived late due to longer custom clearance and traffic jams on the way) and the apartment was exactly like advertised.

The location was ideal, although sometimes a bit noisy in the morning with lot of traffic coming by. The rest was perfect with everything near and the subway and Central Park just around the corner.

Definitely recommending Brian. Plus special kudos for having an Apple TV and high speed internet access! ; )

It was my first time using Airbnb and it went cool because to have deal with Brian was safe and easy. He is friendly, outgoing and honest host. The apartment is conveniently located - close to subway (lines 1, 2, B, D), next to Central Park, Lincoln Center, Museum of Natural History. Our staying in Brian's apt was nice. Despite the fact that it is an old house (sometimes it takes a few minutes to have a hot water), an apartment is comfortable, kitchen is small but functional (fridge with food, gas stove, lots of dishes), king-size bed with clean linens, high-speed WiFi, the bathroom provided with soap, toothpaste, shampoo, shower gel, clean towels, outside the windows was a bit noisy, but it's New York - a city that does not sleep:)) Overall, our stay was wonderful. The apartment feels like home. The Brian's apartment much easier and more comfortable than a hotel, and a definite plus - the price. If I have the chance once again to visit New York, I'd like to stay in this apartment. Thanks, Brian!!!

Brian was very nice, made sure we had everything we needed and always responded quickly. Even our very late check-in was not a problem at all!

The apartment and the amenities are exactly as described, we felt right at home!

The close points of interest as well as the short walking distance to the main subway lines made the studio a great starting point for exploring the city.

Highly recommended, would book again!

Great !!! Super bien placé. Brian est super sympa. L'endroit est un vrai petit chez soit. Je recommande grandement. Tous les métros sont à côté, ligne 1,2,3,R,Q,N... Central park à 5 mn à pied Time Square à 25 mn max à pied. Un bon plan, c'est très propre. Brian ne nous stress pas pour arriver ou partir. Nous n'avons pas laissé de caution et le ménage est compris dans le prix. Agréablement surpris. New-York étant une ville bruyante, le sommeil peu parfois être perturbé. En tous cas je vous recommande grandement cet appartement ! Thank you very much Brian :) !

Pasamos una semana en el departamento de Brian. El departamento era muy lindo, bien ubicado, la ducha funcionaba perfecta con mucha agua caliente  y la cama es muy comoda. Todo muy limpio y ordenado. Excelente ubicación, cerca del metro, un barrio muy lindo, a una cuadra del central park. Brian nos trató muy bien, es muy confiable, siempre se preocupó porque estemos cómodos. Alquilar este departamento fue la mejor decisión que pudimos tomar! Y Brian es una ecxelente persona, esperamos volver averlo pronto!. Definitivamente recomendamos el departamento y a su anfitrion!

Brian was very helpful and always responded quickly. Even our earlier check-in was not a problem at all.

The apartment is clean and exactly as described.

The short distance to the subway lines and short distance to the Central Park made the studio a great starting point for exploring Manhattan. We had four really nice days in the city and the studio was part of it.

Das Appartment von Brian ist perfekt für einen tollen New York Urlaub! Es liegt sehr zentral, der Central Park ist nur ein Block nebenan. Die Ubahn ebenso und der Bus vor der Tür. Supermarkt, tolle Bars, alles um die Ecke! 
Das Appartment ist sehr einladend und gemütlich eingerichtet. Ich würde jederzeit wieder bei Brian buchen, er ist ein netter Typ und hilft bei allen Fragen weiter.

This was my first experience on AirBnB and it was fantastic! Brian was great at communicating and making sure my friend and I had everything we needed. The apartment is very cute and had just what we needed for the duration of the trip (2 weeks). It was clean and comfortable--we were provided with pretty much everything you would expect in a hotel (towels, wifi, etc). Public transportation was super close -- less than a 5 min walk away. Central park is about a 10 min walk away as well. There are so many restaurants in this area and it's pretty convenient to get to wherever you need to go.. My cousin lives on the UES and it was so easy to take the crosstown bus to meet up with her there. 

Overall, it was a wonderful experience and I would definitely stay at this cozy apartment again for a future visit! Thanks Brian :)

This place is where it's at! Close to subways and Central Park. Safe and convenient to groceries, liquor store and restaurants. Brian was very friendly and easy to work with. A huge thanks to him and hope to stay at his apartment again! Wonderful experience.

We stayed in Brian's apartment for 10 days and had a great time. The apartment is a perfect example of NYC inner city living. The Upper West Side neighbourhood is very friendly and beautiful with tree lined streets and awesome architecture. The apartment is ideally located a block away from a major subway station and the same distance to Central Park. There are literally hundreds of restaurants, cafés and bars within walking distance and we had no trouble and felt safe walking home late at night. The apartment building isn't the best example of architecture in the area but the apartment itself is fitted with all mod cons including fast internet and a functional kitchen (the gas was not working for our entire stay but with so many food options nearby we didn't care). Brian was responsive to all our questions and although we didn't meet him we felt welcome in the apartment. Overall the apartment is perfectly located and offers a genuine experience of NYC life.

Brian responded so quickly that made it an easy decision to choose his place. He is so helpful and lovely. His place is so close to everything in a lovely part of the upper west side. So close to central park also. A great location to explore every where. Great size place for a couple. The bed is so comfortable. Would definitely recommend this place if you want to feel like a New Yorker over a tourist. Heaps of bars, cafes and restaurants all within walking distance. We loved this place and would stay again.

Appartement idéalement situé à côté de central park et de plusieurs stations de métro.
Commerces et restaurants a proximité !
Quelques points négatifs à noter : fenêtres en mauvais état, ce qui vous fait profiter de la circulation (plutôt intense sur l'avenue) des 5h du matin. 
Pas d'ampoule pour les lampes de chevet, dommage. 
Pour finir, nous avons pu faire quelques trouvailles sous le lit (chaussettes d'ex locataires, gobelets, bouteille...) 
Nous recommandons tout de même cet endroit surtout pour la situation!
Brian est un hote disponible et très sympathique qui a su nous arranger à notre arrivée.
Merci et à bientôt !

It was our first Airbnb experience...and what an experience.
Everything was close to perfect. It is an older building but we knew that and that was ok for us. Communication with Brian (we did not actualy meet) was excelent. Instructions we got were detailed and accurate, not a single issue. He was very responsive from initial contact until the day of departure. Flexibe as well.
Location of the place...fantastic, 5 mins to central Park ( The Dacota building is like 300m away), maybe 7 mins to subway...you can easily walk to Time Square.  Restaurants, bars, shops...everything is so close. And you will feel like at home here.
We had 5 amazing days in NYC.
Our thanks to Brian and Airbnb.

My boyfriend and I stayed for 6 days at this apartment, and overall our experience was wonderful. 

Brian was great at communicating, he was friendly and he made sure that we had everything we needed. I didn't meet him personally but he and his girlfriend coordinated everything perfect to facilitate the check-in and our stay in the apartment.

The apartment is exactly as described. It's cozy, clean, confortable and perfect for a couple. It is equipped with everything you may need during a trip. The location is great!!! It is very close to Central Park, Lincoln Center, Time Square, etc  It is also very close to grocery stores, delicious restaurants, cafés, bars, department stores, a little mall, etc. Public transportation is very close too, it is very easy to go anywhere. 

I would definitely stay at this apartment again for a future visit! Thanks Brian!

Good location and decent size place for New York. Brian was great to communicate with for check in and any questions. 
The place is noisy with traffic at night and quite hot. Could be cleaner.

The apartment was at a great location, 3 minutes walk to 2 different subway stations. and 4 minutes walk to central park. Supermarkets and bars are located nearby. The apartment is not very large, but definitely big enough for a pleasant stay. It is not the cleanest apartment, especially the bathroom.  Moreover, sometimes, the was no warm water in the shower. But all-in-all a very pleasant apartment. The apartment is equipped with a small kitchen with an oven, stove and microwave. The TV had HBO available which was nice to relax after a long day in the City. As everybody has previously mentioned, the bed is great! Brain was very pleasant to communicate with. We have never met him, but somebody else brought us the key.

Avant l'arrivée, nous avons eu une très bonne communication écrite pour caler les détails. Malheureusement Nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de faire la connaissance de Brian, néanmoins représenté par une charmante jeune femme. L' appartement est en effet très bien placé à deux minutes à pieds de central park. Petit bémol, l'endroit est peu isolé contre le bruit, important sur cette avenue. Brian a été très arrangeant quant à notre départ, nous laissant les clefs jusque tard dans l'après midi. Nous avons pu ainsi profiter de la dernière journée sans être encombrés de bagages.

We had a great stay in Brian's apartment.  It is in a fantastic location, within walking distance to many attractions and close to public transport, restaurants and supermarkets.  When arranging collection of the keys, his girlfriend was extremely friendly and understanding when our shuttle from the airport was three hours late.  It can be a little noisy at night with traffic and sirens sometimes waking us up for a minute or two.  Overall a very comfortable and enjoyable stay, thank you!

Very welcoming home, as described a cosy studio in Manhattan. Great value for money and a central location with easy access to transport. My only reason for less than 5 stars is the difficult operation of the shower which took a couple of goes to get the hand of. Otherwise highly recommended and the aircon was a godsend in summer. Thank Brian :)
This was one of our best stays in New York. We had so much fun. This apt is situated perfectly in the heart of New York. We hope to come back and stay here again soon!
Super appart dans un super quartier . On a passé une super semaine toujours heureux de rentrer le soir après une journée fabuleuse de découvertes dans New York . Je recommande vivement cette adresse

The location of the apartment was just perfect - especially for first time NYC-visitors like us! Near different metro lines and close to both the Lincoln Center, Columbus Circle and really close to Central Park.
Brian was a good host and very good and quick at answering any questions, we could have concerning both the city and how to get to the apartment. Brian had provided sheets, towels and things like shampoo and toothpaste.
The only minus of the apartment was that it was not as clean, as one might could have hoped. As we only slept there and was out in the city all day, this was not too big a problem.
The location of the appartment was perfect (diffrent metro lines, supermarket and laundy only one block away). It was very comfortable and had everything that we needed.
Appartement très bien situé (métro, bus, Central Park, Colombus Circle...) qui nous a permis de bien découvrir NewYork. Merci Brian pour la disponibilité de l'appartement le jour de notre départ.

Very good listing : description is accurate, many different shops or restaurants on the avenue, central park and city center are very close too even by walk.
City Bikes just in front. Sleeping very well in this bed. Air conditioning very quiet.
For our first time Airbnb experience Brian was an amazing host :D

This is a delightful small apartment in a perfect spot close to Central Park. On the third level it is on an intersection with a view of this busy and interesting neighbourhood. Brian was there to greet us and it was a pleasure to meet such a friendly and helpful host. Everything we could need was there and a couple of minor issues were fixed very promptly and unobtrusively. We felt it was our home in the city for the days we were there.  This small apartment which is for sole occupancy is excellent value for money and Brian as host was brilliant both keeping in touch with us before arrival and while we were there.

Had a wonderful time staying at Brian's studio in Manhattan!!! The studio was in an ideal location, blocks away from Central Park, and many restaurants and bars within walking distance. The studio was described exactly like the description, and we had no bad surprises. Also, Brian was a wonderful host! He greeted us at the studio, provided us with many essentials for the weekend, very friendly, and willing to answer all of our questions about NYC.

Brian was at the apartment to meet me, hand off keys and answer any questions I had.   He also made himself available for calls at any time during my stay and responded promptly, within minutes, on a couple of occasions when I sent text messages.   

The studio is in a great location, 71st and Columbus, and is walking distance to Central Park and several restaurants, stores etc on the upper West Side.  It is a perfect place for a stay in NY.  Studio was clean, bed was very comfortable, second floor walk up which was no problem.

Before arriving to NYC Brian reacted very quickly on my questions about his apt. This felt very good for us. After a really warm welcome on our day of arrival by Brian himself we discovered a really cozy appartment. The room with bed, table and chairs was big enough for the two of us. The apt was clean from bathroom to kitchen to bedroom to hallway.  Everything you need for an easy time in NYC is present. In the kitchen you can cook your meals if you don't want to go out for dining. Fridge and toaster are at your disposal.  The location is more than perfect, close to two subway entrances and bus. Close to Central Park, shops, restaurants and further everything you need for a pleasant stay.

We had wonderful time at Brian’s apartment. Location and amenities couldn’t be better. Apartment has all the necessary for enjoyable stay.  Subway, stores and parks are all within short walking distance.

Nous avons passé un super séjour à New York...l'appartement de Brian est très bien situé ( proche du métro ,de restaurants et de Central park) .
L'appartement est très propre , un peu bruyant mais à Manhattan c'est tout à fait normal et cela n'a pas été très gênant) .
Brian nous attendait à notre arrivée ( aucun problème pour trouver le logement) et s'est montré accueillant et disponible.
Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse.!!
Thank you very much Brian , we enjoyed very much our journey .

The best aspect of the apartment is its perfect location, as other reviewers have said.  Our expectations for everything else were fairly low, and they were met.  We had issues with the shower, the heat and the cleanliness of the kitchen, but we were pleased with having stayed in the older apartment.  Brian communicated quickly and responsibly, and the price was right.

Good experience overall. Great location.  Perfect for our needs.
I recommend Brian's place.
El apartamento era muy chico y antiguo pero estaba bien ubicado

Great stay!! Location is very practical, the neighborhood is very nice, and the apartment is very clean and comfortable. Brian was right there when we came in and made us feel very welcome. He is very friendly and even helped us with our luggage! Great host and great place!
Lovely, comfortable apartment, great location, very clean and warm, close to subway, very helpful host. Would definitely stay here again!

We had a great stay- the apartment is in a great location, with everything we needed as a family of 3. The place was clean, and Brian was available to let us in, responsive etc.  we'd stay there again when back in NYC.

Very good experience with the apartment! The neighborhood was very nice with a lot of restaurants and shops. The apartment is close to everything and just a 20 minute-walk to Times Square. The apartment had everything we needed. Brian was at the apartment when we arrived and he made us feel very welcome! Before our arrival Brian answered quickly to our questions and also during our stay he responded very quick when we texted him. We would definitely stay there again!
I enjoyed my stay at Brian's place! The studio was well set-up and had everything I needed for my stay. The location is great, and very close to public transportation. I would stay here again!

Brian was very accommodating and a great communicator. The studio is centric and cozy for a stay in NY. I would definitely recommend this studio and would stay there again in a heartbeat. Well rounded experience and smooth.

Brian was a great host.  He met us at the apartment and showed us how to work the WiFi, etc. The apartment was exactly as described-- very clean with plenty of towels, soap, etc. Brian could not have been any friendlier or helpful. He recommended great places for coffee and dinner and was spot on with his recommendations. We had a great time- the location of the apartment is excellent and close to everything. I will definitely stay in Brian's place again.
Absolutely loved Brians Apartment!! Bed is comfy, kitchen gadgets complete, bathroom clean, neighborhood is great--overall a wonderful place to stay!!

Brian waited for me and was in touch all the time. He's so nice. The appartment is perfect for single travelers or couples. Amazing location. Good kitchen, bedroom & restroom. Close to the subways and at the heart of the Upper West Side. I will go to this place everytime I will visit NYC
Brian is wonderful. He's the best. He was in contact to know if everything was OK. Perfect host
Brian oli erinomainen isäntä. Mukava ja siisti  asunto hyvällä paikalla

Bruce and I felt right at home in Brian's cozy apartment.  Wonderful location. Brian is a very kind and thoughtful host who provides lots of little amenities, makes himself available for any questions you might have, but then leaves you to feel like this is your home for the duration of your stay.  A really good host in a great NYC location
Brian was great, very useful touristic advices. The place is next to 123, and B C subway stations. Great location and cozy place.

Brian made us very welcome including the dropping off of luggage early and went over all aspects of the property. The kitchen was well equipped and allowed meals to be prepared if required. The property was as described and the location was excellent. It was close to the subway and buses. Restaurants and cafes are a plenty in this area.

Brian was super cool and friendly and made it known that he would be available just a text or phone call away! The apartment is in a wonderful location just minutes walking distance from Central Park. The apartment was clean, well heated and very cozy. Also loved the option of the Citi bike rental just across the street. Can't wait to come back :)
Brian thanks for everything !! I Will right in português para que brazilians could  understand !! Apartamento ótimo muito bem localizado !! Excelente opção !!
The apartment was clean with fresh towels and toiletries. It looks just the way the picture shows. The bed was sooo comfy had a good rest after a long flight.

Brian est un hôte très accueillant, amical, qui reste très disponible par internet ou par téléphone pendant le séjour en cas de besoin, et qui a tout fait pour nous arranger en fin de séjour suite à un changement impromptu d'horaire par notre compagnie aérienne. 
L'appartement est idéalement placé, tout près de Central Park, différents moyens de transport à proximité, petits restos... Appartement bien aménagé, très pratique en couple.
Bref, nous avons beaucoup aimé notre séjour !

Brian was very attentive and hospitable! Every amenity we needed was there. The bedding was also exceptionally comfortable! We never slept on a foam mattress before this, but we slept very peacefully. The location was very convenient to Central Park, subway stations, and many great restaurants. It was also a short walk from a convenience store. Thanks, Brian!

Brian's apartment was fantastic and met all our expectations! Location is perfect as we were close to central park, subway and shops! Thank you for letting us check out later due to our late flight. If we ever come back to New York we will definitely stay at your place again.

We had a great experience thanks to Brian and his girlfriend's mother. We arrived late in NY and had the possibility to "check in" at 1AM. 
The location is ideal with tube stations very close to the appartement that allow you to go anywhere in Manhattan and Brooklyn very quickly; supermarkets, Starbucks and bakeries...
Brian is very friendly and answered to our questions / queries very quickly. 
The kitchen has the basics and allowed us to lay back, cook diner before going out at night. 
I would recommend it without hesitation.

Located at a convenient, elegant and nice neighborhood, Brian's apartment gave us the chance to enjoy Manhattan in full. Just a block away from both Central Park and several subway lines it was easy to reach fun within minutes. 
The really comfortable bed gave us the chance to recover from our exhausting strolls and rides around Manhattan. 
Although there's little room to place your belongings (and extra wardrobe would help a lot)  and the faucet needs some improvement (I guess,  through Brian's words, it's not so easy), Brian's apartment is absolutely convenient. 
Besides,  Brian is an excellent host,  really kind and very communicative as well as efficiently organized. 
Whenever we came back to Manhattan we"d certainly book this apartment again. 
Thanks,  Brian,  for having us there!

L'appartement de Brian est très bien situé. Il est proche de plusieurs ligne de métro et de bus. Central park est à moins de 5 minutes et Times square à 20 minutes à pied. Idéale pour optimiser votre visite de Manhattan. La description est conforme. Nous avons eu un bon contact avec Brian quelques jours avant notre arrivée pour convenir de l'heure et il nous a renseigné sur l'itinéraire depuis JFK ;-) 
Le petit moins est l'absence d'insonorisation de l’immeuble dans une avenue bruyante.
It was great staying in the place. Brian was very kind to us and the place was cosy. There is a bus stop in front of the apartment so that it was very convinient to go sightseeing.

Abbiamo soggiornato io e la mia ragazza nell'appartamento di Brian per 8 notti.. per la nostra prima volta a New York non potevamo chiedere di meglio! Brian all'arrivo ci ha accolti nell'appartamento aiutandoci anche con i bagagli.. l'appartamento corrisponde esattamente alla descrizione.. pulitissimo e ricco di tutto ciò che serve durante il soggiorno.. letto comodissimo per riposare dopo le lunghissime camminate per la città.. quartiere bellissimo.. ubicato vicino a due stazioni di metro (B-C) (1-2-3) che permettono di raggiungere ogni zona di New York.. stazioni di autobus proprio davanti l'appartamento.. Brian è un host davvero fantastico!! grazie di tutto!!!
Francesco e Francesca (Roma)
Hola la verdad que el apartamento esta muy bien, la ubicacion (a una cuadra del subte) es excelente. Tanto Brian como Lee nos atendieron de maravilla es 100 % recomendable.

Very well located flat! Only 5 minutes from Central Park, which is amazing especially in summer time.
Brian is very kind and thoughtful !
We will come back at the same place!
We had an amazing experience in NYC as usual!

Brians studio has the best location and we loved the neighbourhood. It is really close to both Central Park and to Hudson river with nice restaurants where you can see the sunset and take walks along the river.
Unfortunately the studio was not as clean as we would have liked. Brian has been very nice and easy to get in touch with  whenever needed and also let us have another guest staying for a few nights.

Wonderful location. Excellent host. The unit was very clean and central to my needs and to all things great about NY. Further, Brian was extremely welcoming and accommodating, and answered all of questions in a timely fashion. I would absolutely recommend this listing and look forward to booking this unit again. Thanks Brian!
Had a great time in New York... Check in was easy and communication was good. Nice neighborhood, very accessible to subway and Central Park.

Brian was very kind and flexible! We expected to arrive around 4pm and due to many transportation related delays, did not arrive until closer to 6:15pm! Brian was completely fine and happy to accommodate our ever-changing schedule. He met us and showed us around the apartment. You really can't beat this location- close to so many shops, restaurants, subway and and bus lines! It was very hot during our stay and the window AC unit was a life saver. We also really appreciated all of the NYC related pamphlets and books he left out- thank you! Wonderful communication. Would absolutely be thrilled to stay at Brian's place again!
Brian was very helpful and great guy. Highly recommended and a great location, a block from Central Park and the Dakota and close to Lincoln Center.

Brian is a superb host. He provided a warm and relaxed welcome and made me feel home instantly. The flat is quirky, cosy, clean and ideally located, and I was grateful the air-conditioning was working well. Thumbs up and hope to run into again some time, Brian!

I rented the place for my dad and he absolutely loved the location. The apartment has everything you can need. 
Brian welcomed us and helped us get the luggage upstairs, he also recommended us great places around.
I would definitely recommend staying at his place.
Brian has been really nice and helpful. He gave us very good advice about the neighborhood and he knows really nice spots! His flat is a great place to stay. Very good host, don't hesitate !

This was my first time using air bnb and i'm so happy i chose brian's place! he went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed during our stay, the apartment looked exactly as in the photos, and the location was perfect. we look forward to another mini- vacation in nyc and will be, hopefully, staying at brain's place during future visits!

Brian was an excellent host!  He was very attentive with all of my questions and made sure the place was in great shape.  The apartment was very cozy and came furnished with everything I could have needed during my stay.  The area is absolutely gorgeous, I highly recommend you consider staying here.

Brian was excellent! We started texting the day before and he followed our flight. He met us at the room, showed us around and was very friendly. When we had questions midweek he quickly responded to our texts.

Brian's studio was absolutely perfect for our four day stay in New York. Great location close to Central Park with easy access to the subway. The apartment was very well equipped and Brian was a great host - available, contactable but not intrusive at all - ideal!

Brian es un amigo, nos ha tratado de manera formidable. Muy atento, nos facilitò todo lo que necesitamos y màs aùn. Cumpliò absolutamente con todo lo prometido. La ubicaciòn es EXCELENTE, el barrio precioso y cerca de los subtes y buses para moverse por toda la ciudad. Perfect at all, thank you very much Brian!!!

Brian was very welcoming and helpful when we arrived. There were plenty of maps and suggestions for our stay.  The huge bonus of this place is its location. Could not have been better, except for very noisy night time road works. Only  a temporary annoyance. A great place for a real New York experience. Do not expect top facilities, bedding  or decor but hey this is NY  and it fully delivers.

Brian gave us good, clear information about when and how to access the space, and made arrangements for us to be met by someone else when he could not meet us in person. 

This studio is an amazing value for an incredible location in NYC--a great home base to enjoy and explore the Upper West Side. It was also one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept in. The building and apartment are not fancy, but you will have everything you need. 

It's an ideal spot for one person or a couple.
Brian was the perfect host who made us feel very welcome.Great location and the studio was comfortable
Met my expectations

Brian ensured that we had a pleasurable experience from the beginning. The room was clean, the area is perfect (right next to Central Park and the 72nd Subway St). When I go back to New York I will be looking for this AirBnB immediately.

L'appartement à deux pas du métro et de Central Park et à quelques minutes de Time square, c'était vraiment top!
Le quartier est assez animé et sympa.
Je recommande vivement cet appartement.

Brian was very responsive and accommodating. The apartment is in a perfect location to visit Central Park and the Natural History Museum. Plenty of restaurants and bars in the neighborhood. The apartment is clean and just like the description says "Cozy"! I would stay here again!
Brian's apartment is great to explore NYC. It is big enough for two people and you find everything you need there. It is clean and cozy. We loved staying there.

Brian was very communicative, the process was very easy and went very smoothly. The location is great very close to everything, to the subway etc.
Very good neighborhood

Brian was a great host! Always available for any question and doubt!
The apartment was great, very close to everything we needed and very cozy!
We'll definitely come back!
Thanks Bryan
Brian is an excellent host, and he ensured I had everything I needed during my first trip to NYC.
Brian is great host. Respect!
Brian was there to greet me and help me up the stairs with my bags.
A friendly and helpful welcome and fully functioning studio helped us have a great stay in New York. Thank you Brian for making it a stress free experience. I would recommend staying here.

Great place, great location, great communication ! Brian was very easy to reach anytime, he bought us food for our arrival, anticipated every (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a perfect trip, thanks for everything !
Brian is an awesome host and has a cozy apartment. He went above and beyond to ensure it was an easy check in and a comfortable stay. I can't imagine a better value staying in the City!

Brian started texting with me the day before I even set out for NYC. We used the Airbnb site, then the texting, and then finally a quick telephone call--all on his part to make sure I knew that all was fine at his place. 

When I arrived, he patiently helped me set up the WiFi and showed me how to use the TV, loaded with Netflix, Hulu, etc.  Only when he was convinced that I knew everything was operational did he leave. 

The more I stayed in the place, the more I realized how fortunate I was to be in the location. The lower 70s in Manhattan are chockful of restaurants as well as a neighborhood grocery. Lincoln Center is literally 5 minutes away. I quickly grew to love "my" local coffee place, "my" wineshop across the street, and the incredible ease of being one block from an express subway station to anywhere. (Hint: Buy the $20 Metro tkt and be done with it. )  

I also loved sitting at the desk and looking out onto the street, during the day and during the evening. I was there at Thanksgiving, so I watched the Northeast tree farmers set up their Christmas tree stands at midnight on Thanksgiving.  Those images are ones I will recall for a long time--and take me back to the cozy studio, without hesitation.
Brian is super welcoming and explained everything really well.  There's also a wash/fold place right around the corner that made my trip just that much easier.

This was our first time using Airbnb and we were pleasantly surprised! When we arrived, Brian was there to greet and show us all the details of his studio and give us all the information we needed to enjoy our stay. He had already given us his personal cell number just in case we needed anything throughout our stay. When we opened the door it instantly felt like home. Very clean, he had fresh towels folded for us on the bed and everything in the kitchen that we would need. The location was perfect! The studio was very close to Times Square and all the hustle and bustle, but still far enough to give that homey feel. We particularly enjoyed the market that was right downstairs. I would recommend Brian's place anytime and for any occasion!
brian is very nice~

Cozy apartment, very well located being one block away from two subway stations and a walkable distance to Central Park, Lincoln Center, Columbus Circle and well, we even went to Times Square on foot.

Also I really need to give an special thanks to our host Brian, which did many things that for us were unexpected but we are really grateful for, like contacting us the day before check-in to know if everything is allright, waiting for us at the subway for showing us the apartment, being flexible with check-in and check-out hours and he even dropped us in Penn Station by car!

Thank you for everything, it was an amazing stay and we felt like locals for the weekend.
it is very close to Central Park some Bodegas and (Website hidden by Airbnb) hotel needed for us!

My friend and I had a great stay at Brian's. It's located in the best possible location and buses and the subway takes you anywhere! The sheets were clean and the shower was warm, and Brian provided us with enough towels to use :) Thanks so much for taking our luggage up and down the stairs Brian👏🏻 We would definitely come back to stay! (The only downside was the slightly open window that wouldn't close :/ But the bed was super comfy and warm we didn't feel cold at all! :))

Brian's place is in the best location. Close to Central Park and the Metro which takes you directly to Times Square. The apartment is a good size with a well appointed kitchen and bathroom. Brian is a great host, he was very flexible with time changes. Overall it was a great experience.

Brian was such a great host, was there when we first arrived to show us around. Great area, lots of cafes, food shops, great vibe and very safe area, noise should be expected in a very central location. Located just a few minutes walk to the subway and central park, great!!!

Brian is the best host we have had! He was available before and during our stay, he came to greet us and was present the day we left. The apartment is well located, clean and has everything it takes to feel at home. Lots of restaurants and shops in the vicinity. It was perfect! If you want to stay in NYC we would definitely recommend Brian's apartment.

My bfriend and I had a great time at Brian's place. Checkin and communication with Brian was so smooth, and he was very helpful. The apartment is how we expected an old new york building to be like. We used to live in nyc and staying at his place was definitely very authentic experience. We had a few issues with the windows/heating but Brian was so helpful and quick in finding a solution. The flat has absolutely everything you might need! From maps, guide books, netflix, umbrella, plenty of towels... And that was lovely! 
The only thing we didnt like so much was the bed/mattress, way too soft of the type that make you sink in. So we ended up putting the thin top futon spongy layer on the floor after the first night. No biggy, but could be easily improved.
Fabulous Apartment! Would highly recommend for any travellers headed to NYC. Brian is a wonderful host and went above and beyond in answering all of my questions prior to coming to the city.
The host canceled this reservation 116 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
A very warm and kind host, the most helpful and and conveinient .. appartment was great , prime location , clean and very cozy ... would stay there again for sure ...

Cosy apartment but has everything you would need for a single traveller or couple. Heating was quite hot but have air con to counteract it. Only negative would be if you have a bad back as bed is quite small for two people and not very supportive. Host is fantastic very easy to deal with and quick with communication.

Brian's place was a great place to stay at. It was close to good food and subways. Central park was beautiful and we enjoyed our stay very much. I highly recommend this place. 

Through out the whole trip Brian was really helpful and he is great communicator.
Great location, great host, great time! All you need for a memorable New York trip.

Brain was a great host, even after we made him wait for check in he was real friendly. His home is not meant for more than two people. The neighborhood his real clean and safe. Its location is great real close to everything. Avoid the corner store if you can cause its really over priced. Thanks again brian.

The place is fantastic, a block from the park and a subway station and really close to everything worth to visit in NYC. The studio is truly a cozy place and Brian is a great host; you really feel at home. In the morning a fresh juice to start the day at "Joe and the Juice" is literaly a cross the street, just beside "Ella" which is a great place to have a drink at night. All and all an amazing stay.

The location of the appartment is great. There are a lot of shops and restaurants around and the next subway station is only a few steps away.
The appartment is very cosy and you find everything you need.
Brian is great. He gives you a feeling like being at home from the first moment you step into the appartment. If you have any questions - no matter what kind of - he is there for you with his support. 
We can warmly recommend this appartment.
:-)

Amazing!! Great and safe location! Easily walk to Central Park for a fun stroll, explore the upper west side and then be able to relax in this clean and welcome home! I would definitely go back and stay here again!
L'apppartement de Brian est un petit nid douillet et coquet, à recommander sans modération!

Location is fantastic! Easy to access the subway, walkable to many attractions, and in a good area.

Brain was very helpful during the check in process. Very friendly.

Only complaints, both minor, are that the street noise was loud (expected in NY) and that the shower was difficult to get a good temperature. However, there was no shortage of hot water!

Really enjoyed (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with him was great and he made our stay very comfortable. Location is very central and the unit has all the needed amenities. Won't hesitate to stay here again.

Brian is a lovely guy who delivers exactly what he promises. The place is impeccable, well-equipped, and in the best spot in New York I could imagine. Brian greeted us in person when we arrived, showed us the place, offered a few friendly tips, made sure we knew he was available for anything we needed, and then left us to our own devices.  I travel to NY regularly, and hope to stay at Brian's place often. Thank you!

Brian's place couldn't be more conveniently located.  1 block from the subway, in the middle of the Upper West Side.  The apartment has everything you need and is comfortable to stay in.  The bed was super soft - I do see how 2 adults would be cozy in it though.  If you don't want to spend money on expensive restaurants, the kitchen is stocked with everything you need to cook there.  I would stay there again.

Brian was really helpful and communicative prior to checkin and met us in person to talk us through the place. It was really ideally located for our visit to NY and hope to stay again in the future. Highly recommended!

This is a great place to stay if you're looking for something affordable, in a great location, with enough supplies and amenities, and a great host! Brian was very friendly, timely, and flexible! He greeted us when we arrived, showed us around, and offered several suggestions for restaurants, bars, transit, etc, which was super helpful! The studio was very well decorated, and he had everything we needed to make our stay comfortable. It is in an old building, so 1) it doesn't have an elevator, and 2) the shower was a bit difficult as the temperature was unpredictable, and the water flow was not super fast, but it was still effective enough to clean ourselves, and the running water works fine otherwise. We also didn't have a lot of luggage (just two backpacks) and we spent most of our time out and about, so we didn't need anything fancy. The location was perfect, as it was not in the heart of Manhattan where there would be a lot more crowds and noise, but it was also not remote at all...right next to Central Park, a couple of Subway stations, and several great restaurants and bars within walking distance. I highly recommend Brian's place!

He greeted us very kindly. And the room was very pleasant with a very clean and comfortable .
Thank you Brian!
Brian's place is super convenient to public transportation and all the sights on the upper west side. He is a great host and we would definitely stay here again.

18 July, 2017
Brain was an exceptionally accommodating host.
Location far outweighs the age of the building.
Proximity to subway, Central Park, banks, general shops, etc. made the stay perfect for our needs.
Not suitable for a less mobile couple due to stairs. Extras all there including kitchen items, WIFI, Netflix
and a pocket guide to NYC. Thank you.
Great location, everything one could need, clean and comfortable- and the friendliest host one could ask for! Brian and his great apartment made our stay in NY perfect.

This was my best experience in air bnb ever!!!

The place is bigger than it seems to be. The kitchen is properly equipped, the room has a comfortable bed and an excellent decoration with pin up pictures , books and maps, besides a working desk  and an apple tv device so you can enjoy your streams content providers as hbo, netflix and YouTube.

it's important to mention he provides linen, towels and amenities as shampoo, hair conditioner, liquid soap, toilet paper, hair dryer, and there are empty drawers where you can keep all your clothes and stuff.

Is very, very, very well located. One street from central park, one station or 3 minutes from time square (using express subway lines 2 and 3) and four stations or 12 minutes by local subway lines 1, B and C.

The infrastructure around the apartment is fantastic: there are Duane reade, trader's Joe, papaya, dunkin donuts, McDonald's, a lot of bars, cafes, restaurants, shoe stores, pizzeria, and all you can imagine NYC can provides... everything just around the corner.

Brian was an amazing host, waiting for us and attending our early checkin request. He gave us all necessary instructions and we did not need to contact him even he being available all time because the stay was perfect with no problems and I'm sure if any problem come out he'd help us properly.

Thank you Brian and  I wish a good trip for the next luckily guests.

Wonderful stay 
Very centrally located  right in the middle of Manhatten . The flat is well equipped with everything you need. Brian is a very good host and everything was PERFECT!

Ideal location with bus stop right outside the door and subway just around the corner.  Most of the time we didn't need either as most things we wanted were within walking distance. Brian was amazing! The apartment was great and had everything we needed for out stay in NYC.
Excellent location. Well worth the stay. Great host.

Brian's place is fantastic! Clean and cozy. Prime location in the city, with subway stations only a block away. I couldn't have stayed in a better place. I'd definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in NYC.

Great apartment, perfect location close to 2 subway lines that can take you anywhere and to central park. There is an aircondition wifi and good tv. Brian is a really nice guy. The only thing we had issues with was the hot an cold water in the shower that wasn't to balanced.
Great studio and friendly host!ideal location on the upper west side, very comfortable, lively neighborhood and easy access to anywhere in the city!

Brian was awesome, helpful and very nice guy. The apartment is at a great location, cozy and got everything you need. Bed is comfortable. The only downside is the shower which change temperature once in a while and a bit low water pressure, but that doesn't really a big issue and the apartment totally gives a great value!

If you're headed to the upper west side, this is a fantastic location. A block from the park and the blue line subway, two blocks from the red line. Very nice upper west side neighborhood. If you're headed to the Beacon Theater like we were, it's unbeatable! Just a couple blocks from the theater.
La casa en muy comoda y muy linda, esta ubicada en una lindísima zona y Brian muy buena onda!!

Brian's apartment was ideal, exactly what we were looking for! The location is superb, only a few minutes walk to Central Park and local subway and surrounded by bars, restauarnts and shops! The bars and restaurants are frequented by locals which really added to our New York experience! The apartment itself is clean, tidy and very comfortable! Brian was very friendly and extremely accommodating! We can't wait to return!

Brian is a fantastic host - he was there when we arrived, showed us all the little quirks of the place, and gave us some tips on where to go. I was running the NYC Marathon, and I can't imagine a better spot to stay - I literally stumbled just over a block from the park exit and was "home" after the race. The apartment is cozy and clean, with all the amenities we needed for our stay (but bring a hairdryer if you'll need one!). And of course the location is great even if you're not running a marathon - convenient to subway lines, close to a ton of great restaurants and bars, and right in the heart of the Upper West Side, which is probably my favorite Manhattan neighborhood - plenty to do, but relatively low key. I will definitely try to stay there again if I have the opportunity.
Brian was very friendly and accommodating. The location was also great -- central to everything we needed.
Brian nous a attendu malgré notre arrivée tardive. Quartier et emplacement idéal juste derrière Central Park et un block du métro.

Great space in an awesome neighborhood! The place itself was clean and tidy, with pretty much everything you could need during a stay there. The only thing was that the shower was pretty touchy (going from hot to cold suddenly), but Brian warned us about it beforehand and was very apologetic. We felt like we got a real New York city experience there. Brian was a great host!

Brian was quick to respond to any questions, and kindly helped me by bringing my suitcase up the two flights of stairs (he’s younger & stronger than me!)
Very nice, clean apartment, great neigjborhood...
The only negative is the shower, a bit tricky to maintain pressure & temperature. Other than that, this was a very nice stay!

Brian hat uns sehr herzlich begrüßt als wir in seinem Apartment ankamen und uns gleich noch ein paar praktische Tipps für NYC gegeben. This place is in a great location! 20 mins walk to time square, train is 2 blocks away and takes you everywhere!! Would come again!
It is the best choice for me in NYC! perfect location, cozy arrangement, extremely soft bedding, and nice taste. will definitely recommend it to all my friends who plan an NY trip.

For the most part, this is a great place to stay in Manhattan. Great location, clean, affordable and Brian is a great host. 

But I can’t say that I would stay there again because it’s nearly impossible to have a consistently warm shower. It would go from freezing to boiling without being touched. This may not be a big deal to some, but it was tough for us. 

Everything else was great, Brian was nice, he gave us our privacy and answered any questions I had. It’s perfect walking distance to the Subway and Central Park.

Brian is a wonderful, thoughtful, friendly and communicative host. His place is well located on the Upper West Side, with restaurants, the subway, and Central Park all within a short walk. The apartment is clean and quite spacious, and suited my needs well. I had some issues with the shower temperature, but Brian did raise that upon check in. All in all, I would be happy to stay here again upon returning to NYC!
Excellent location, well-kept and nicely appointed apartment. Brian's delightful.

Brian was a really nice host, waiting for me quite late in the evening.

This is a very old building but the flat is nicely maintained and fitted.

Sunny little studio in the best residential neighborhood in New York, walking easily to subways, supermarket, Central Park, and Lincoln Center. It's pretty simple, but has everything you would need and is decorated nicely. The bed is very comfortable too. The studio faces Columbus avenue, so if you're not used to NYC, bring earplugs (was not a problem for me, though), but otherwise the building is very quiet and relaxing. Lots of places in the neighborhood to go out/ to eat as well, from quick to fancy.

Brian’s place was perfect for a 5 night stay in NYC. Clean, equipped, and the location was perfect!
Brian is a great host, quick responses and thoughtful.
I’ll definitely stay there again!
Location is great, the place is cozy, the room is clean, the bed is comfy, the kitchen is equipped and the host is warm, nice and welcoming. Definitely and highly recommend Brian’s place.
Great apartment, Strongly recommend

Great overall experience. The place was exactly as advertised and the location was great; shops, cafes and transportation are within few steps.  Brian is the greatest host I've ever had. Great place, excellent location! Brian is very responsive and communicative

We were extremely pleased with Brian’s AirBnb. The neighborhood was very nice and near the subway, Central Park, and a number of great restaurants and shops without the crowds of Time Square. The apartment was clean and well maintained.

Brian is by far the best host I've met through airbnb. He was there in person when we arrived to hand over the keys and give us some tips about the neighborhood. Also, he responded back to all of my texts within 10 minutes! The location of the apartment is very nice and safe. I would highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to enjoy a safe, peaceful NYC vacation.

We spent 3 nights at Brian’s fantastic apartment. He met us at the apartment even though we were arriving very late (he even got us milk for a cup of tea!). Incredibly helpful both showing us around the apartment and also top tips for NY (use MetroCards!).

Great location and wonderful hospitality!

Brian is an impeccable host, and a lovely guy.  The place is perfectly set up for visitors, and is just as Brian promises in the listing.  The location is literally one of the best in NYC - ready access to Central Park, shopping, lovely Upper West side neighborhoods, and one of the express stops on the 1,2,3 subway lines at W. 72nd St.  We are return visitors, and expect to be coming back often. Ellen and Jen
We loved our stay at Brian’s place! It was clean, comfortable and in a fantastic location - close to many shops, restaurants and transit. We will definitely recommend to anyone visiting NYC.

My wife and I stayed at Brian's place for 8 nights last June. Although the apartment is in an old building (which is something to be expected in New York City), the location is absolutely great! You're two blocks away from Strawberry Fields in Central Park and pretty close to the American Museum of Natural History. Subway services 1, 2, 3 are also within walking distance.
This is a stylish, well-maintained apartment, with all amenities you may need, and the host promptly replied to every message I sent him.
The only downside I can think of is the shower. The water pressure is low and we couldn't take a shower without constantly adjusting the knobs for water temperature, which varies a lot for no apparent reason.
As for everything else, our stay was amazing and we'd recommend this place to other travelers.
Brian is a super friendly guy too.

Brian foi um excelente anfitrião, nos recebeu pessoalmente, passou dicas e se ofereceu para resolver qualquer problema que pudéssemos ter. The apartment is in a great neighborhood, quiet but easy to get to places. The bed was very comfy so we slept well. Thanks for a great stay!

L'endroit rêvé pour profiter au maximum de Manhattan. En plus d'être très réactif, Brian est un hôte honnête et saura répondre à toutes vos demandes. Brian's place was amazing. The location was incredible and the space was really comfortable. We had everything we needed in the place and Brian was a super friendly guy. He made the whole process very easy and was always ready to answer questions and help.

JT and Tippi were wonderful hosts and their home is beautiful! Thanks again!

JT and Tippi helped us find a great place for dinner and even called a cab for us to get to the airport in the morning. Although we didn't have much time to stay with them, we enjoyed their hospitality. Tippi made us coffee in the morning before we left and JT was available for help with directions and was waiting for us when we arrived. The house is close to the subway and easy to find.
I had a great stay here at Jt and Tiziana's place. Very comfortable stay, I felt like i was at my own house. I would definitely consider staying here next time I need to sublet a place.
Great place, nice people. If your looking for a big and quiet place in Brooklyn area it´s the place to go.

Beautiful home in a very interesting neighbourhood. Very close to subway. Tippi is an awesome hostess and puts in great effort to ensure her guests are comfortable and enjoy their stay in New York. Would definitely stay again. Reasonable rates + private kitchen and bathroom + cute kitties.

What a spectacular place !!! Jt and Tippy's home is very warm and cozy, filled with beautiful art, sculptures, and figurines. JT and Tippy are very sweet and what an adorable home! Our room was cute and comfortable and the house is very close to the subway. The place was great.  The house is filled with a lot of culture. The purple room was a really nice size for 2 couples. Tippy and JT were really nice hosts so were the cats.
