I, my wife, and our two boys (3 and 6 years old) thoroughly enjoyed our weeklong stay here. The place was very homey and comfortable. Jeanne was very responsive to all questions. There was even a small collection of books and toys appropriate for our kids. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

We had a nice week stay at Greenpoint. 25 minutes to Times Square with subway and then back to a quiet place in Brooklyn, perfect! Apartment nice and clean, have all you need for a stay where you bring most of your time in town. We made our breakfast and once a dinner in the apartment which was full equipped.

Jeanne and her husband George were excellent hosts! They checked in with us as soon as we arrived and were very kind. Jeanne was very responsive to Airbnb messages as well as text messages. As a previous reviewer said, they made the experience like staying with friends.

The apartment is exactly as pictured, kept very clean, and well stocked. The design of the space is gorgeous. And Jeanne had everything we could need! We had four people stay in the apartment. There were plenty of towels, linens, pillows, blankets, shampoo, kitchen supplies- dishes, pots, pans, toaster, etc. The door is on a code, so there is no need to worry about keys. I immediately felt at home in the space!

The location is great! It is a quick walk to the G train or over the Pulaski Bridge to the 7 train. There are plenty of great restaurants and corner groceries to pick from in the area. We walked every day to get coffee at the nearby Starbucks or Dunkin Donuts (there is a coffee maker in the kitchen if you prefer your own). Check out the Polish Bakery too! It is excellent! Jeanne left a list of recommended restaurants and groceries in the apartment too, which was helpful. Overall, a great neighborhood.

This was our second visit to this lovely apartment.  Jeanne and George are excellent hosts, available and helpful in every way.  We have everything we need when we stay here.  Located on a nice quiet residential street, the location is close to fantastic restaurants and shops.  It's our home away from home when we visit our son and daughter-in-law and we look forward to future visits.  Thank you Jeanne and George for everything.  Josie and Gary

Jeanne was a phenomenal host. She was very accessible and helpful when it comes to where to go, what to eat, etc. The neighborhood and home were both extremely cozy. We couldn't have picked a better spot. Also, the fact that Lobster Joint is right down the street is just an added bonus :)

Speckless clean, charming, very practical.  Sweet kitchen and coubter. Our kids loved playing with the toys. Convenient to the train. What a great place for our stay in NYC.  Look forward to staying there again one day hopefully.  Thank you to Jeanne!

Jeanne was a wonderful host continually communicating to make sure we had everything we needed. Her place was nicely furnished and decorated....a real nice, cozy apt with a new feel...a separate entrance with an automated lock so no need to hassle with keys. A very quiet place on a quiet street convenient to restaurants and grocery. Look forward to staying with her again.

Jeanne et Georges sont trés bien.
L'appartement est trés bien, comme sur les photos.
Le Subway est a 10 minutes à pied de L'appartement.
Time Square est a 35 minutes en Subway.
Merci de nous avoir reçu.
Meilleurs salutations 
Laurent
Great location close to everything in Greenpoint and easy to get to Manhattan. Jeanne was welcoming and accommodating. We were visiting for a wedding in Greenpoint and this was a great base for us.

My aunt and I stayed at Jeanne's apartment for a few nights while traveling in New York. We were most impressed with the location and would definitely choose to stay in Brooklyn if we are to travel in NY again. It was very handy having access to a 24 hour small store which is just down the road and there are lots of lovely places to eat within walking distance. The apartment itself was okay. The keyless entry was great! I wouldn't recommend for anyone to stay on the pullout sofa though as it's not very comfortable. All in all a comfortable enough stay and Jeanne is a good communicator who was always happy to answer any of our questions. 
We thought the USD50 cleaning fee was a bit cheeky though.

The apartment was spotless with lots of character.  Quiet residential neighbourhood with cafes, restaurants and groceries within a short walk.  We walked in late evenings and felt quite safe. The host lives on the premises and was available if required.   On street parking only, and difficult to get spot close by though and walked 4 blocks with our luggage, we left the car parked our entire stay. Host however offered up their spot. Subway was a 10 minute walk away, for a another 10 minute ride into Manhattan, super easy. All amenities needed for a comfortable longer term stay, however no laundry facilities. Perc coffee and all the fixings available to make...nice touch since we got in late and did not have time to get groceries.  Jeanne did offer to pick us up some groceries if we needed them.  All in all very pleasant stay and location.

Nous sommes arrivés à Brooklyn en fin de journée. 
Nous avions échangé avec Jeanne, qui nous avait communiqué toutes les précisions pour accéder à notre hébergement. 
Nous avons pu rencontrer Jeanne et Georges le lendemain. 
Ils sont absolument charmants et très accueillants. 
Georges a pris du temps pour vérifier que je m'étais stationné correctement  (ce qui évite certaines surprises !).
Il s'agit d'un appartement en sous-sol disposant de sa propre entrée. 
L'hébergement est très propre et correctement équipé. Nous n'avons manqué de rien.
Il est vraiment idéalement situé : à 10-12 minutes de marche vous accédez à une station de métro qui vous place à une station de Manhattan ; vous en avez une autre pour descendre dans le coeur de Brooklyn.
Je vous conseille d'acheter les Metrocard Illimités (31 $) pour voyager tranquillement. 
Du pont Pulaski, vous aurez une vue magnifique sur Manhattan.
Niveau commerces : vous avez un supermarché C-Town à 7-8 minutes, très bien achalandé et une petite épicerie juste au coin de la rue (+ chère).
C'est vraiment un lieu idéal pour poser des bagages avant de partir découvrir NYC !!!
Vraiment chouette !
Liked having our own space.....didn't have to share closet space, etc. Nice space!

Jeanne was very welcoming and easy to communicate with. She was a pleasure to meet and speak to. Her place was perfect for our 2 week stay had everything we needeed. Apartment has access to 2 main subways G & 7 which will take you to Manhattan within minutes! Jeanne  was accommodating when our flights were due out late in the evening and was very kind to hold our luggage for a few hours. We really appreciated this. Highly recommend her place it's away from the hussle and bustle of Manhattan but close enough to get to. Greenpoint the neighbourhood has a lot to offer and would stay here again.
Great space, great location, close to everything. It had everything we needed for our week in New York. Jeanne is a great host, super helpful, really easy to contact. Highly recommend.

We had a fantastic stay at Jeanne's apartment. We traveled with our children and Jeanne was so kind to allow us to use her pack 'n play.  She also knew we would be arriving late at night so she set up the fold out bed for us. The apartment was perfect. Clean, cozy, comfortable. We have no complaints and would heartily recommend anyone to stay here. Thank you for a great time Jeanne and George!

My husband, two children and I arrived JFK quite late in the evening but Jeanne gave us the code to the door so we had no problems getting in. Jeanne even made the bed in the livingroom for us so that we didn´t have to do that first thing when we got there. The apartment is perfect  - with everything you need. Fully-equipped kitchen, great WIFI, maps, books and toys and a clean and nice bathroom. 
There are a lot of cozy cafés close by and the apartment has access to 2 main subways G & 7 which will take you to Manhattan in about 15-20 minute. 
We had a great stay! Thank you so much!
Jeanne's place was just perfect for our trip to visit family.  Hope to stay there again in the future.  Very cozy apartment with most everything you need!

We stayed for 3 nights in this perfectly located apartment. The neighbourhood was great, with everything you need on our doorstep from quirky coffee shops, to grocery stores to some lovely bars and restaurants. Then a short 10 minute walk to either the subway or the East River ferry will get you into Manhattan in no time. The apartment was lovely, clean and given the freezing weather, it was comfortably warm and cosy. Jeanne is a great host and was extremely accommodating when we needed to check out late as our flight wasn't until late at night. Overall, after staying in Manhattan once before, I would definitely stay in Brooklyn again, for a slightly different view of NYC.

This was the best air Bnb I've ever stayed in! The place was very charming and cozy. Jeanne was an amazing host and made sure we had everything we needed in a timely manner. It almost felt like we were just staying with family or friends because she was so welcoming. We will definitely be staying here on our next visit to Brooklyn.

This place was lovely to arrive to - it was clean and well furnished, more beautiful than in the pictures and spacious enough for four people considering it being in NYC. It's relatively convenient to walk to the subway to get to Manhattan, and living in Brooklyn offers a slightly different vibe that we wouldn't have otherwise experienced. Greenpoint is also a relatively safe neighbourhood as well. Lastly, it's also reasonably priced considering the cost of living in NYC. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and was really thankful that we chose this apartment!

Jeanne's place is in a good spot in Brooklyn walkable from the subway and near plenty of shops and restaurants. I also felt very safe in the neighborhood. The apartment is also very nice to relax in and play board games, read, or make coffee - things you don't always have a lot of room for in a hotel. It feels much more like a home away from home than a hotel would. We were even able to iron clothes and hang them up. I loved walking to a bagel shop in the morning and picking up some bagels and then having a refrigerator in which to store them. Thanks for a great stay in Brooklyn!

I would absolutely recommend Jeanne’s place! This was our first time using Airbnb and our entire experience was wonderful! Jeanne even messaged us to make sure we were doing ok our first day there and was very responsive to messages when we did have a question. The house has a private entry and everything you could possibly need for a stay! It is conveniently located, with a grocery store about 5 blocks away and it's near many restaurants!

Jeanne was a terrific host. Very easy communication and she was accommodating and helpful with all. The place was very convenient - great location, clean, and easy check in and check out. We stayed there with friends who were visiting NY for the first time. They walked everywhere. Felt very safe and easy to come and go. Highly recommend.

El apartamento-sotano para acceder a él es muy estrecho y pequeña. Tiene sus pros y sus contras. 
Sus pros son la ubicación aunque el fin de semana una de las bocas del metro no funcionaban. El cuarto de baño esta muy bien , equipado con todo, y el agua siempre caliente, no habia que esperar. 
Sus contras:
Las hormigas; tuvimos hormigas durante 7 noches y eso que teniamos cuidado con la comida y la guardabamos en la nevera. 
Espacio: los armarios del apartamento estan casi todos ocupados con cosas de los propietarios con lo cual estar cuatro personas con cuatro maletas mas cuatro maletas de cabina pues fatal.... 
Los techos en algunos lados bajos, si mide 1,80 cm te puedes dar con una de las vigas en la cabeza.
Algunos utensilios de cocina , como una cacerola tenia el fondo marron de estar estropeada. 

En lineas generales bien pero para dos personas por que para cuatro personas no lo recomiendo en absoluto. 

He de decir que ella se comportó muy bien anterior al viaje y nos preguntó por el tema hormigas...

Het verblijf bij Jeanne was super. Het huisje is volledig uitgerust. We misten werkelijk niks. Omdat het warm was tijdens ons verblijf, werd er meteen een airco geregeld. Jeanne reageert snel als je iets vraagt. De laatste dag mochten we onze koffers achterlaten in haar eigen huis omdat er weer volgende gasten kwamen en wij pas een late terugvlucht hadden. Als we ooit nog naar NY gaan dan komen we hier zeker terug! Aanrader is zeker om de ferry naar Manhattan te nemen; veel leuker dan de metro.

In May we stopped for two days and two nights to see the city. My husband, I and my sister. Our host Jeanne's apartment was clean, decorated with tastefully. Everything was provided that was necessary for travelers. The place was located on the lower level of the home and though there is low ceiling it was still and enjoyable experience. One thing to consider is the soundproofing between the upper and lower level. We are sensitive to noise in the morning, so unfortunately when the family awoke up at 6 am we heard every step. Otherwise, it was good.
The apartment is located relatively close to Manhattan - 15 minutes to the metro on foot and just a couple of stops from Times Square. As far as price, it was quite affordable. The cleaning fee was not included in the main amount of Airbnb and do not forget to pay it in cash.

My parents and my sister stayed at Jeanne's place when visiting me in NY. I live in the same street and I was happy to have them close to me in my beloved neighborhood that has so much to offer.  The place was very clean and complied to Airbnb pictures. We loved having a code on the door instead of keys ! Jeanne and her family live upstairs in the house and the apartment has it own entrance above the main stairs. It is very easy to communicate with her. I will definitely recommend staying in their place.

L'appartement de Jeanne était exactement comme on l'imaginait, très cosy. Nous étions quatre pendant une semaine et l'espace est largement suffisant. L'emplacement est parfait à quelques minutes du métro et du ferry pour une traversée extraordinaire jusqu'à Manhattan en passant sous le pont de Brooklyn. Le quartier est calme mais avec tout ce qu'on a besoin pour le séjour (supermarché, restaurant...)
Jeanne a été très discrète et présente à la fois, en nous envoyant dès notre arrivée un petit message pour savoir si tout allait bien. On a eu la chance de la rencontrer elle et son mari, ce sont des personnes charmantes et attentionnées avec leur invités. Je recommande cette adresse et y retournerai avec plaisir.
Fin leilighet. Rolig strøk. Kort vei til Manhattan. Veldig greie verter. De er nøyaktige og svarer raskt på spørsmål. Anbefales!

It's true, Greenpoint really has it all! Jeanne's place is located on a very cute residential street that's just minutes away from delicious restaurants, night life and great shops. It's also a beautiful and comfortable apartment. I absolutely recommend staying there.

Pour éviter certaines correspondances en métro, n hésitez pas à prendre le ferry sur le east River... Il y a un arrêt sur la 34eme pour l empire state building, un pour Wall Street et un autre pour Brooklyn. C est d ailleurs très sympa de le prendre la nuit.
Rue India côte ouest. La rue est en travaux mais c est bien au fond, malgré le panneau ! Danger...
Cout 2,75$ par pers. Vous pouvez les prendre avant de partir sur le quai, via une application ou à bord...

Greenpoint is a charming neighborhood. This place is in a great location on a quiet street. Very clean. Jeanne was a wonderful host who communicated with us promptly and let us store our bags before/after check in, which was really helpful. I highly recommend this place.

The apartment in Greenpoint has the perfect location for exploring New York City. Just a short walk over the Pulaski Bridge to Long Island City and the 7th train puts right on 42th street. Or walk the other way to the river and take the East River ferry for a scenic tour down to Brooklyn bridge / Wall Street. 
We had a great stay in the apartment and It was easy to communicate with Jeanne.

Good location, very easy to get into Manhattan on ferry.

Not best for tall people (I'm 6ft 3), I did bang my head a few times on a low beam 

Hosts very friendly

Our two boys (ages 8 and 9) and us really enjoyed our stay in Greenpoint. It was a very close walk to the subway and many stores. About a five minute walk to the ferry to head over for some delicious pizza at Julianas. It was a nice quiet stay at night away from it all after an exhausting day touring Manhattan. We would definitely stay again!
First class stay at Greenpoint with Jeanne. Attention to every detail!  Fell in love with 172. Highly recommend!

Clean and many thoughtful amenities-
We were right where we needed to be for an event in Long Island City.  Tasteful apartment.
Great little place for your stay in Greenpoint, Brooklyn. Just make sure you read the rules and are prepared to leave $50 cash for cleaning service. Other than that, the apartment was cute and clean!

Good communication and seamless check- in. Nicely decorated and clean accommodation. Had a small kitchenette with basic amenities. A small grocery store was just around the corner from where we got stuff to fix up a quick breakfast.
Located in a quite , residential neighbourhood. 
It took us around 10 - 15 minutes to walk down to their place from the nearest sub station ( which seemed like a lot when you had a lot of luggage!). Times Square was just 2 stops away. 
There was a separate $50 cleaning fee which we had to pay in cash.
Enjoyed the stay there. Apt is below the host’s apt. Not real noisy.  Can here foot steps. The apt is spotless and looks freshly remodeled.  Tks

Wir haben 4 Tage bei Jeanne im Apartment verbracht und hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt. Die Lage ist top. Greenpoint ist etwas ruhiger als Manhatten, es gibt viele Supermärkte und Restaurants und man erreicht die Grand Central Station in etwa 20 Minuten. Das Apartment an sich ist recht klein und hellhörig und deshalb wurde es doch etwas eng. Dadurch dass es im Kellergeschoss ist, ist es auch sehr dunkel aber für die 4 Tage hat alles gereicht. Schade fand ich auch dass wir von den Gastgebern nicht empfangen wurden bzw. gar keinen Kontakt zu ihnen hatten und somit uns auch keine Tipps oder ähnliches abholen konnten. Außerdem kamen wir zu fünft und mussten $100 extra zahlen obwohl die fünfte Person auf dem Boden schlafen musste. Aber alles in allem ein Apartment welches wir für einen Kurztrip nach New York weiter empfehlen können.
This apartment is a great option. Jeanne is great at communicating and very welcoming and helpful.

Jeanne and her husband are wonderful.  It was such a wonderful little place for my two children and I to stay.  The apartment was perfect. Jeanne even had set up a second bed for my daughter prior to a late arrival.  She helped us get settled and we're so friendly. Will absolutely recommend to friends and return the next time we are in the area.

I am second hand writing this review due to booking this space and having the pass the reservation on to my mother/grandmother due to illness. However, from their experience this place is spot on. Wonderful hospitality, clean, comfortable and walking distance to everything! My grandmother cannot walk far distances, but this place was extremely close to the ferry, transit, shopping and dining. She was able to fully enjoy herself "in the city" and have a comfortable place to stay at the end of it all. Everything felt right at home, like a special guest. You just can't beat this place. Wonderful for children through grandparents :)
Great place in great neighborhood. Perfect size and location for four people. Everything was as expected and better. Host is very helpful. Will go again.

The apartment was ideally located and the subway was nearby and easy to use-2 stops to Times Square!!! The apartment is a basement apartment so does have limited ventilation and not many windows but is perfect if you are just using it as a base to sleep.
I didn’t actually meet the host but communication was easy and was she replied quickly. She also helped us with our check in/out requests.
This is a great place to stay if you are looking for affordable and peaceful place near New York. It is close to almost everything and it’s very comfortable.

My stay at Jeanne's place was fantastic!  The apartment was clean, cozy and well equip.  It was perfectly located with easy access to the G & 7 trains as well as many great shops, restaurants & bars easily walkable.  The neighborhood has the perfect balance of energy and peacefulness.  Jeanne and George were very welcoming, offering great recommendations for local spots and any advice needed throughout my stay.  Communication and access to the apartment were as easy as it gets!  I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would love to stay there again on my next trip to NY.  Thanks Jeanne & George!

Definitely one of the best airbnb buys in Brooklyn! Outstanding value, clean, welcoming, GREAT location in an old Polish residential row house neighborhood with easy safe access to subway, oodles of delicious restaurants and bakeries. We'll definitely go there again, but book well in advance because I noticed they fill up fast. Lynn

Jeanne is an excellent host. The apartment is well equipped with everything you need for your time spent in NYC. It's location is close to transit and local Brooklyn sites. We will definitely be back when we visit again!

Jeanne's apartment is well equipped for anyone, like me, who likes to cater occasionally for themselves while on hols.  The local shops are well equipped with fresh produce, there are bakeries, gourmet shops, fruit & veg shops near by.    It's very easy to find and is near the local subway stations and a number of coffee shops.  It is only a short trip to Manhattan.   There is also a water taxi to the Financial District or boat to Staten Island.  Jeanne had everything you need in the apartment you needed, phone charger/hair dryer etc.  I would definitely stay there again!

Cozy comfort, responsive hosts, a quiet neighborhood with flower shops & Polish bakeries.  Walk to India Street ferry slip & take a ride under Brooklyn Bridge while viewing Manhattan skyline for the price of a ferry ticket: $2.50.   Wow.
Excellent communication, very clean! Jeanne and her husband were beyond helpful! Highly recommend

This is an awesome space.  Our first time in an airbnb, and we are now officially converts.  The apartment was cozy, very functional, well-maintained and incredibly clean!  Location was great - lovely neighborhood convenient to shops, restaurants and public transportation.  We discovered we enjoyed the trek to the G line station rather than the Pulaski Bridge to the 7 line, which gave us a nice trip through the neighborhood.  (Although make at least one trip over Pulaski - GREAT view of the Manhattan skyline, including the Empire State Building!)  A lot of care has been given to the small touches in the apartment, and our host Jeanne was so friendly and provided great information.  We would stay there again, no doubt.  Overall, a great experience!

This was our first Airbnb experience and it couldn’t have been better!  Jeanne is not only an amazing host who made us immediately feel welcome but her place is safe, beautifully decorated and in a great area!  We were traveling with two small children and the commute into Manhattan every day wasn’t tough at all...we took the subway half the time and it only took us about 20 minutes.  We also took the ferry a few times which is a short 10 minute walk away!  Two quick ferry stops and it brings you right into midtown!   My kids loved playing with all the toys and also loved putting our little pin on the map and seeing where all her other visitors had traveled from.  This spot is a perfect place to slow down the pace after a busy day in the city, yet still close to shops, restaurants and laundry!  There was also always a good amount of available parking on the street!  We will definitely be back on our next trip to New York!

Preis-/ Leistungsverhältnis ist super. Kommunikation mit Jeanne war hervorragend . Der Jahreswechsel 2017/2018 war sehr kalt und Jeanne in Toronto bei ihrer Familie. Sie hat sich immer gemeldet , ob es uns in ihrer Wohnung warm genug sei. Der Empfang war sehr herzlich. Immer wieder gern.
Danke

My wife and I stayed here two nights and we think it's a great value. It's a little off the beaten path but the G line gets you only a couple blocks away. The street is quiet and we had luck parking very close by. Left the car there and took subway everywhere. Plenty of room for us in the apartment. Great kitchen with anything you need. Nice shower. Comfy bed. Plenty of closet space. Great WIFI.

Jeanne’s place is very cozy and clean - she has paid lots of attention to detail! Just be aware it is a basement apartment and you will hear all noises from upstairs including children playing, footsteps, a piano, etc.
Had an excellent time at Jeanne's place!  Her communication was fantastic and the space was perfect to come back to after a long day of exploring the city.

We just arrived home after our stay at Jeanne's apartment, and we're still raving about how perfect her home was.  The apartment is located on a beautiful, tree-lined street, where parking was suprisingly super easy!  It was within walking distance to all of the shops and restaurants in Greenpoint.  The apartment itself was so tastefully decorated and clean.  Jeanne has such great attention to detail, and she thought of everything!  Coffee, tea, shampoo, conditioner, soap, we barely had to touch our own supplies.   While the apartment is classy and clean, it was also very child-friendly.  We were traveling with my young daughter, and upon arrival, she had the pack-n-play already set up, sheets and all!  Further, she has toys in the apartment that my daughter loved.  It was super safe and comfortable for everyone.  Lastly, Jeanne is super responsive and attentive, so you never have to worry about a thing.  It was nice to know that we could feel so comfortable and safe in a big city.  We will definitely stay there again on our next visit to Brooklyn.  Thank you, Jeanne!

Greenpoint is a great base to explore New York. Great to return to a laidback area after a day on Manhattan. Fantastic views across to midtown Manhattan with a range of bars and restaurants to visit. 

Jeanne always very quick to respond to queries and the place was ideally located. Very clean apartment with everything you need. Some great NY books to browse in the apartment too!
The host canceled this reservation 115 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jeanne’s place was easy to park at and take the train in and out of Manhattan from. Value is great if you care about a safe neighborhood, especially to keep your car parked in, easiness to get into Manhattan and overall quaintness.

L'appartement de Jeanne est bien équipé, parfaitement adapté pour un séjour de 4 personnes dont 2 enfants (8 - 10 ans). Tout était prêt pour notre arrivée (lits, serviette de bain...) et très propre. Les indications pour localiser l'appartement ainsi que celles laissées dans l'appartement sont très claires et utiles. En cas de besoin Jeanne est très facile à joindre, réactive et toujours agréable.

L'appartement est bien situé, à 10 mn à pied de 2 stations de métro permettant de rejoindre Manhattan en quelques minutes.

Nous recommandons cet appartement avec enthousiasme !

A very comfortable and very clean apartment with lots of extras and an excellent location.  So close to the 7 and G trains, plenty of buses and of course the ferry to Manhattan too.  The host is a very good communicator with quick responses to questions and friendly too. So nice to have a chat on the stoop.
Jeanne was a great host, very helpful ! Super nice flat, very clean with a great location ! We definitely loved the neighboorhood and the ferry to go to Brooklyn and Manhattan !
Great place, walking distance to subway, lots of shops/restaurants right around the corner and had no problem finding parking right out front.
Jeanne is the perfect host. This place is convenient too all we needed, is clean and well kept and offers all the amenities you need for a fun stay in Brooklyn!

You want to stay here! The apartment was super cute, so clean, perfect location and we had an amazing stay! Jeanne had a pack n play for my baby to sleep in so perfect if you need a place for a family. She was so accommodating to any need we had😃👍🏻 ! We did hear it when someone would walk over the floor above us like mentioned , but it was not a problem for us. We will be back for sure!
Beautiful cozy room with everything we need! Recommend

This is a fantastic apartment with everything you need. I stayed for 5 days with my grown up daughter and although Jeanne was on her holiday for most of the time, everything was ready for our arrival and Jeanne kept us very much in touch  to make sure we were fully informed.  One thing we loved was the location - it was a quiet location with loads of food outlets and grocery shops just round the corner.  Even better was that it was only a 10 minute walk to India Street to catch the ferry across the East River to Manhattan, only $2.75 a journey. We used this every day, one way to 34th Street and the other way to Wall Street.  We met Jeanne before we left and she was a delightful person who obviously wants to do only the best for her guests.  We loved this accommodation and could not praise it any higher.

The apartment was very cute and perfect for my friend and I. It was lovely and clean and in the best location - we loved Greenpoint! Jeanne was fantastic at answering questions and giving us tips, I’d definitely stay again!
Very good accomodation for sightseeing New York

Our staying in Francesca's apartment was simply great. It was exactly as the expectations we had. Cozy, quiet, clean and very well situated. She is a kind person and she was really attentive to our needs. We have had a great experience in NYC in every way and strongly recomend Francesca as a host !!!

Francesca's apartment is charming, clean and cumfortable. It has an ideal location in the city. Francesca is a good host, nice and available. 
Recommanded.

Excellent location, there are nice restaurants and bars nearby.
Not enough blankets, the climate was cold and she only had 2 blankets for 4 people. The apartment was full of things, there is no space to place things in the bathroom and only 4 hangers in the closet!!! You can unpack your clothe because there is no space to leave it.
The room smells to naphthalene  and the living room to dog (franchesca has a dog) we found two cockroaches, one in the kitchen and the other in the living room. In conclusion it was dirty and with no space.

The apartment contains everything that was announced, the hostess is very friendly and helpful. The apartment has a good space for 4 people and is in a good location for those looking to visit the attractions of Manhattan.

Appartement conforme à la description.
Très bien situé pour visiter Manhattan et Brooklyn.

Nous remercions Francesca de nous avoir aider à trouver un taxi pour notre retour à l'aéroport JFK.

Conseil pour les futurs hôtes : pour fixer le 1er RDV avec Francesca, tenir compte du temps des formalités douanières et du trajet depuis l'aéroport (5 heures pour nous!).
Idem, si vous êtes un peu frileux, demander des couvertures dès votre arrivée.

Ce voyage à NYC restera pour nous un souvenir exceptionnel.
The apartment was great. Plenty of light and spacious. And in a very convenient spot. Francesca was very flexible and a pleasure to interact with.

It's a wonderful experience to stay in Francesca's apartment located in Gramercy. One of the best neighborhood of NY.  The place is well equipped with everything a home needs.  Francesca was a great communicator and very amicable. Hope to return!

Era nuestra primera vez en Nueva York y la verdad es que el alojamiento de Francesca está muy bien ubicado. Es un barrio tranquilo, rodeado de todo lo necesario y con una ubicación muy céntrica. El metro más cercano está a menos de 10 minutos caminando y hay supermercados y restaurantes en la misma manzana.
El apartamento es como se muestra en las fotos. Es cómodo y tiene todo lo necesario. Lo que nos pareció un poco raro es que hubiese una webcam en el salón, pero la dueña nos dijo que no estaba encendida. Tuvimos un problema con la cisterna y nos lo solucionó. La cama es cómoda y el salón también tiene un sofá cama. Nos pidieron que fuésemos muy discretos con los vecinos, para que no percibiesen el tema del subarrendamiento. Por el resto, todo bien

Lo más parecido a tener un conocido en NY. Comunicativa al instante y resolutiva, dispuesta a ayudarte en todo. Kit d bienvenida. El piso como muestran las imágenes. Zona tranquila l con un montón d super y restaurantes. A menos d 10 min. dl metro, Flatiron y Empire. Gran TV. El único pero es que hay muchas cosas suyas x la casa y te resta un poco d espacio, sobre todo en la cocina. 

Recomendable. 

Is like to have a friend in NY. She is very comunicative, answers at the moment and give you all you need. Welcome pack. In less than 10 min. you are in the metro, Flatiron or Empire. Quiet area with a lot of markets and restaurants. Great TV. Not to many espace to let your things, especially in the kitchen, but not a problem.

Recommendable.
Quaint apartment in an excellent location.

Not only was Francesca's apartment in such a convenient location, but she truly was the best host.  She made the entire checking in process such a breeze and she even left a treat for our dog for when we arrived.  She also went above and beyond and mailed something back to us that we forgot in her apartment. Overall, it was a great experience and we can't thank Francesca enough for her hospitality!

Très bel appartement new-yorkais  tout en longueur avec ses briques rouges typiques et son parquet , très bien situé avec une hôte Francesca très disponible. 
Je suis ravie de notre séjour et recommanderai Francesca et son appartement à mes amis 
Au coeur de Manhattan , proche du métro et de lignes de bus.
 De plus ce qui ne gâche rien  ,  Patrizia's of Manhattan et Street Taco sont deux restaurants à côté et excellents ; très pratique après une journée de visite

Francesca's place is awesome.  It is exactly as she describes.   

If you are looking for a one bedroom in Manhattan, this is the place you want to stay.
The host canceled this reservation 140 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location, in the center of Manhattan and near the metro (green line). the house is perfect for two persons. Easy comunication with Francesca!

Jo was an excellent host -- very helpful/resourceful and always willing to assist if help was needed. The apartment itself was spacious, bright and comfortable, and perfectly located in the heart of Williamsburg. It was a short walk to the very trendy Bedford Avenue, and just across the bridge on the subway to Manhattan. We enjoyed our stay very much, and would highly recommend the apartment!

We had great time at Jo's apartment which was cozy, cute and clean.. It was close to subway so you are just one stop to Manhattan . She was also a very kind and helpful host. I would highly recommend.
Jo's apartment was very comfortable.  She accommodated me on a last minute trip to NYC.  I will definitely use her place again and recommend her to others.

My girlfriend and I had an amazing time at Joanna's apartment. She was really good with communication, her place was really comfortable and clean. We were a few blocks away from the subway station and only one stop from Manhattan. I highly recommend staying at her place.

jo was an excellent host, easy to communicate with, and very helpful when our travel plans went a bit awry. her apt is beautiful, clean, and located in a great spot in williamsburg. we had a wonderful time! thanks joanna!

We had a really wonderful weekend. It was a surprise birthday present for my husband and he loved it. It was really fun to be in Brooklyn, the location was fantastic--very close to Manhattan. The apartment was beautiful and very clean. It really made our weekend special!!! Thank you!

We had a wonderful time there. The apartment was great and she was very helpful. Thanks a lot Joanna for everything. The train station was walking distance. We would definately go there again and recommend the apartment.

Thanks again Joanna !!

Joanna was a terrific host!!  She had helpful information for us about the neighborhood, transportation, places to eat and see.  Her apartment was in a great location.  We could be anywhere we wanted to be in a very short time!!  Her apartment was also very comfortable and clean.  We really felt like we were in our "home away from home." 
Thanks for a wonderful experience!!
Christi & Julie

Joanna's place was amazing and she is a very thoughtful and welcoming hostess! The apartment was a great refuge during the snow storm and a wonderful place to work during the day. It was cozy, warm, and well-stocked with blankets. The location was also perfect and very close the both the L and JMZ trains. Joanna thought of everything: she met me in advance to give me the key, left detailed notes in the house and even left some homemade chocolates in the fridge!

The apartment was pretty much exactly as shown in the pictures -- bright, colorful, and comfortable. I was especially grateful for the small desk to sit at and do work in the evenings, and for the apartment's proximity to the the train for easy access to Manhattan. Unfortunately I was working most of the time I was in town, so I didn't get to explore the neighborhood as I'd have liked, but Joanna was great about leaving helpful advice about finding food and services around the neighborhood.

I didn't get to meet Joanna, but she was *incredibly* communicative leading up to my stay. She checked in via email to make sure I got into the apartment OK, and then again later in the week to make sure everything was going well. 

If you're looking for a nice place to call home for a few days, this place is great. I look forward to staying there again if I get a chance.

My boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay in Joanna's apartment. It's warm and bright and looks exactly like the photos. It's in a perfect location for Williamsberg, which is such a great neighbourhood. Joanna was very accommodating and friendly and made us feel very relaxed in her apartment before leaving us to do our own thing. Thanks Joanna for your tips of the local area too - they were really handy!
It was perfect, clean, and we appreciated the note to enjoy the coffee and eggs. Great location.

Joanna was an amazing host.  She was very helpful, and had great communication.  Her incredibly clean and ample apartment is in a fun and accessible neighborhood, with plenty of subway lines around, and a ton of restaurantes and bars near by.  Rent this Apartment!

We loved staying at this beautiful apartment.  Located between the two trains we constantly used to get in and out of our Manhattan activities, and also right in the middle of wonderful Williamsburg, it was quite perfect.  Joanna was great to deal with, the apartment was clean and organized.  Only problem: so many great and unique little restaurants in the neighborhood I think I gained 10 pounds.

Joanna's place is perfect for a comfortable weekend away with all the mod cons. We were only there for 2 nights, but felt right at home: air conditioning (2 units, critical with 100 degrees outside!), nice TV, comfortable bed etc. It was easy to find and really convenient to 2 different subway lines which made it a snap to get into Manhattan, no matter where we were going.

Joanna is an excellent and responsible host. I've had the chance to meet her personally. She's really nice and with an interesting background.
The communication was quick and easy all the time. She gave lots of tips about restaurants, bars and things to do in Brooklyn, including some free and outdoors activities that have been very helpful during my stay in NYC.
The apartment is exactly as you can see in the pictures: clean, well equipped and stylishly decorated.
The location is also great if someone is planning to stay in Williamsburg. There are two subway stations near the apartment (Marcy Av. and Bedford - less than 10 mins walking-) that go to Manhattan directly. The apartment is just a few blocks from Bedford Avenue, where you can find all kind of restaurants, cool bars and trendy shops.
Joanna's apartment has made my staying in nyc very pleasant and comfortable. If I ever come back to NYC I definitely will stay again and I highly recommend it to anyone who want to visit the city.

Joanna was a terrific host and went above and beyond what I would hope for from an Airbnb situation. She kept in close contact and made sure I had everything I needed. Her apartment is large, comfortable, well designed, and above all exceedingly clean and tidy. It was also very quiet during my trip. I felt like I was living in luxury. The neighborhood is close to transportation and convenient. Highly recommended.

Joanna was a great host! Very accommodating and always available if we had any questions. Her place was beautiful, clean, and quiet. I can't say enough good things about our experience working with her. Thanks again, Joanna!

We very much enjoyed our stay at this apartment. Joanna was an excellent host (we didn't meet her but she was easy to communicate with, left us maps and information about restaurants/cafes in the neighbourhood, a note about how the TV works etc .), The apartment was very clean and cosy. Perfect for a couple. The neighbourhood is very lively and a short walk to various subway stops. The only minor point was the noise of a fan of a neighbour but it didn't keep us awake even though we're light sleepers. I'd definitely recommend staying in Joanna's apartment.

La mia amica Silvia ed io abbiamo trascorso una settimana incantevole a casa di Joanna. L'appartamento, davvero grazioso, è situato in una zona comodissima per le principali linee della metropolitana. Joanna, inoltre è sempre stata molto gentile e sollecita ad ogni nostra domanda o richiesta. 
La via dove si trova l'appartamento non è bellissima, ma tutto sommato tranquilla e soprattutto molto vicina ai supermercati. Con una breve passeggiata si arriva nel centro di Williamsburg, che è un quartiere giovane, ricco di ristoranti e negozi molto alternativi ed interessantissimi.
Spero di poter tornare presto a NY e sicuramente sceglierei ancora questo quartiere di Brooklyn e la casa di Joanna come alloggio!
We had a great stay at Joanna's place. It was really clean, great situation, everything was perfectly set up for our arrival and we felt really well taken care of. Highly recommend it, thanks Joanna!

Joanna was an excellent host. From the beginning she was very communicative and very flexible with the checking and checkout times. She also offered very useful information about restaurants, neighbor shops, etc... at the moment of arrival. She offered me help for whatever I could need during the trip, which I really appreciate. Also it was a pleasure to talk to her.

Her apartment is very nice and cozy, and perfectly clean... also it has cable tv, a full kitchen... you will have a really good time in this apartment.

The apartment was great, nice layout, nicely decorated, very clean, and we had everything we needed to prepare meals. The bed was comfortable, the neighborhood is nice and the location is convenient for grocery shopping, etc. I have no complaints at all. 
Thanks Joanna!
Great host, very flexible. Good, clean apartment and for me at a great location. Recommended!

Joanna was such an easy and reliable host to get on to. Replied as soon as she could and even posted a Key to us Prior to our trip in Aus! The Apartment was spotless, clean, and fresh when we arrived. The Decor was Cheerful, and made the place feel at home. Perfect location to all the Hip bars, and places to eat in Willaimsburg. Subway's to manhattan so easy to get to. Great and easy stay all round.

Joana est une tres bonne hôte,
Elle fait attention au confort de ces locataires et il est très facile de communiqué avec elle, elle répond tout de suite à toutes les questions que l'on peut se poser. Nous devions arriver a NY le jour de la tempête Sandy et Joana a été très réactive pour que l'on puisse gérer la situation ensemble.
Son appartement est très agréable, pratique et confortable et la décoration est sympa. Après une bonne journée de marche dans Manhattan, ce fut un plaisir d'avoir un petit cocon douillet à Williamsburg, de vivre un peu comme un New Yorkais! 
L'appartement est bien situé, a 5min du metro qui va directement sur les plus grand site de Manhattan et en s'enfonçant un peu plus dans le quartier, il y a pleins de restos et de petites boutiques de fringues et de créateurs. Ainsi qu'un petit parc avec un vu sur Manhattan !!
Pour les parisiens, je comparerais williamsburg au quartiers Bastille/ Oberkampf/ Menilmontant.

Ce fut notre première experience avec air bnb et nous n'avons vraiment pas été déçu!

Bon voyage!

Joana is a very good host,
She pays attention on the tenants comfort and it's very easy to communicate with her, she answers quickly at all your question. We had to arrive has NY the day of the Sandy storm and Joana was very reactive so that we can manage the situation together.

Her apartment is very pleasant, practical and comfortable and the decoration is nice. After a good day of walking in Manhattan, it was a pleasure to have a small cosy cocoon to Williamsburg, to live a little as a New Yorker! 

The apartment is at 5min of the metro station which goes directly on the biggest site of Manhattan and by sinking a little more into the district, there are lots of restaurant and of small store of clothes and creators. And a small park with Manhattan view!

It was our first experience with air bnb and we were not really disappointed!

Have good trip !!

Camille et Leo

Very nice little place. Much like the pictures. Close to Marcy Ave station.  The place is modest, really clean inside  and equipped with everything you may need for your stay in NYC.  Joanna was an attentive host checking in with us via email a number of times to ensure everything went well. She even left some of her devine home made chocolates out for us! 
Overall we had a great stay here.

We really enjoyed our week at Joanna's apartment in Brooklyn. Despite not meeting her in person, she communicated with us during our stay and we felt she was always there to offer help if any were needed. We arrived earlier than planned, due to unexpectedly sailing through Customs & Immigration at the airport, but we were able to get into the apartment early, rather than wait on the street.

The apartment is easy to find, head out of the Havemeyer exit of Marcy Avenue subway, turn right and walk up Havemeyer keeping the McDonalds on your right, go under the enormous freeway flyover, and turn left at the next street you come to. The photos are very accurate, the bed is very comfortable and we enjoyed having wifi internet to help plan what we were going to do in New York.

The neighbourhood is great, further along Havemeyer are loads of cool bars and restaurants - Rye is amazing, also Dram, Post Office, Roebling Tea Room, High Horse Saloon and Fette Sau are highly recommended. There's a supermarket on S 1st St, and the Bagel Store on the corner of S 4th and Bedford is a great way to fill up cheaply in the mornings.

Overall, a great apartment, easy to get into the city from, and a great host - what more could you want?

The apartment is as adorable and clean as it looks online. The Bed is SO comfy, one of the best i have had in all of my stays anywhere! The kitchen is really nice too. Joanna is one kind host for sure! She made sure i got in OK and checked to make sure everything was OK during the stay. The location is great too!!!
The reservation was canceled 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Stayed in Joanna's apartment during a snowy February weekend and found it to be a wonderfully clean and cozy sanctuary. Very comfortable bed, plenty of heat, clean bathroom with plenty of hot water, cozy living room, sunny kitchen, all surrounded by a wonderful neighborhood packed with amazing restaurants, shops, and bars. 
When I arrived very hungry after a much delayed flight, Joanna even helped me find a place that was still serving food at 2:00 a.m.

Five Stars for Joanna. She was out of town when we arrived, but she had mailed  us keys two weeks in advance by registered mail so we had no trouble getting in. The place was roomy, well-lit, nicely decorated and spotless. Bed was comfortable, and there was plenty of hot water and good water pressure for showers.
 Joanna left complete instructions on how things work, plus a nice page of local recommendations. There was also a warning about potentially noisy neighbors, but that was never a problem. She emailed us several times to ask how our stay was going, and promptly replied to our questions.  
We have stayed at AirBNB properties about five times, and this one was the best by far.
Only downside was was not actually getting to meet our host :-( Maybe next time.
Highly recommended.

This was our first time with Airbnb and out experience was very positive. Joanna was an excellent host. She was easy to communicate with and responded to messages promptly. Her apartment was clean, comfortable, and in a great location in Brooklyn with lots of bars/restaurants. Joanna was very flexible with arrival and departure times with us which was a great bonus. I would certainly stay with Joanna again in the future.

We stayed at Joanna's apartment for a whole week this August. Due to a short notice cancellation of our original booking, we arranged everything less than 2 weeks before we arrived. Joanna managed to prepare everything as if it was planned months ahead. She mailed us the keys to Germany to ensure a smooth and flexible check-in. She was very responsive and caring throughout our stay, even though she was in Europe by the time we were there. The apartment is wonderful, exactly as described in the listing. Very spacious, very comfy. Super clean. Love the area! Highly recommended. Will definitely be in touch for our next stay in the city.

We spent 3 days at Joanna's apartment in August and had a lovely time.  The place was spotlessly clean, loads of character and everything there you could possibly need.  Joanna even left us some delicious chocolates in the fridge for our arrival, as well as a really helpful list of bars and restaurants in the area.  The apartment itself is really well located in the heart of Williamsburg, so we only had a short walk to all the shops and cafes on Bedford Avenue, as well as only a few blocks to the subway.  

Overall, we totally enjoyed our stay and would recommend Joanna's apartment to anyone.

We had a great time in Williamsburg at Joanna's place! She was an attentive host and made the whole process very easy. Her place was very comfortable and clean and the location was good for access to the subway and loads of bars and restaurants.  Thanks, Joanna!

Joanna's apartment was a perfect place for a weekend stay in Williamsburg! Super close to so many great bars and restaurants! The apartment was very comfortable, and also amazingly quiet at all times both day and night! Joanna was also a perfect host. Definitely our best Airbnb experience so far!

We spent 5 days in Joanna's apartment. Apartment is very comfortable, exactly as on the pictures. Location is good, very easy access to Manhattan. very good for those who are in new york for less than a week, but do not want to pay a fortune for apartment on Manhattan.
Joanna is a very good host and made overall process very smooth. I would definitely recommend Joanna's apartment to my friends.

This was our first experience with AirBnB and it was great, thanks to Joanna we will definitely do it again! Joanna was great about communicating with us and coordinating our arrival, she gave very helpful detailed instructions before we arrived which was great after a long day of traveling. The apartment was spotless, well-kept and very comfortable. We loved having a little piece of Brooklyn to ourselves for the long weekend. It was in a great location, very easy subway ride from Penn Station and close to several subway lines going into Manhattan, also very close to the center of Williamsburg. We split our time between Brooklyn and Manhattan and it was very easy to get both places from her location.
We highly recommend staying in Joanna's flat, it was fantastic!!!!!

Joanna couldn't have been more wonderful and her apt couldn't have been more perfect!  The place was bright and clean with great decor and every amenity (including hair dryer and bag of toiletries Joanna supplies for her guests).  The location was brilliant and Joanna was there for us responding to texts throughout our stay whenever we asked her for tips of places to go. 

Joanna was there to meet us and let us leave our bags at the apt even after she had returned home at the end of our visit so that we could make even more of our last day in Williamsburg. 

We had a wonderful time in every respect and Joanna was a complete star.  We will be back for sure!

We had a great experience with Joanna and her apartment during our recent stay in NY. The location is fantastic; great for wandering around Williamsburg as well as simple access to Manhattan. 

The apartment was perfect for our needs; comfortable, clean and very well appointed (sharp knives in the kitchen - amazing!). 

Joanna is a terrific host as well. She was very quick to respond to questions and laid out a wonderfully helpful 'instruction manual' which we referred to quite often.

Highly recommended!

We had à wonderful stay in lovely Joanna apartment ! It´s à very cosy place very well located. The neighbourood is awesome with many bars and restaurants. Joanna is a great host, she gave us many advices for the restaurants and she was very easy to contact.

Joanna was a very great host! She left us some home made chocolate as a welcome gift and many instructions for our stay. She provides some adresses in the neighbouroud to eat or take a drink.
The apartment is really great : cleaned, cosy and well decorated. The area is quiet but animated and the subway is just one block away. The Williamsburg bridge is not far away and it can be crossed on foot easily.
We spent 3 great days in the apartment with all we need on site.
We really recommand Joanna as host and her apartment for a nice stay in NYC.
Joanna was always there when we need, by email. All our questions before the stay have found a quick answer. There was no problem.
I really thank Joanna for the great experience, our first one with airbnb ;)
We had a great stay at Joanna's place. The apartment was in great condition and very well located. The neighbourhood is great and has many restaurants and bars.

This was my first experience with Airbnb, and I don't think I'll ever get a hotel room again. (Yeah, it was that great!) Joanna was a fantastic host - great communication, very comfortable and clean apartment, and she even had a list of things to do in the neighborhood which was very helpful to someone who has never been there. I felt very much at home during my short stay in an unfamiliar city. The neighborhood is great! The business owners were very friendly and attentive, and the food was amazing. I will definitely visit Williamsburg again.
Joanna's place was very nice and close to all the  happening places. Would defiinitely recommend it.

We had a very pleasant stay in Joanna's apartment. The place is really nice, quiet and clean.
Many bars and restaurant in this animated neighborhood, and access to Manhattan is very quick.

Joanna was a great host, easy to communicate and friendly.

We highly recommend it.
The apartment is fantastic.  It was so clean. The location was perfect. Lots of restaurants and very easy to get around.  Joanna left a very helpful guide.

The home was very welcoming and very neat and clean. The neighborhood is quiet with easy walking access to the subway station, even late in the night. The grocery stores and restaurants are nearby. The home was very comfortable to stay.
Check in/out was seem less. The place is charming. My wife liked the decorations. The bed was very comfortable after a long day of touring the city. Thanks Joanna!

Joanna was the best host and her apartment is amazing. We loved it! It's in a great location in Williamsburg - really central and close to the subway! The place is so warm and inviting that it really felt like home away from home. We had the best trip and will definitely be back.
Just as pictured and described. Perfectly clean, comfy, and the bed is divine!!
muy lindo el deartamento ,todo ok y Joanna ha sido muy atenta.

Joanna met me at the door with homemade cheese danishes and even helped me with my bags! The apartment is spacious and charming with greenery outside of every window. This was actually our first airbnb experience- and she made it a good one!

Joanna and her apartment were an absolute delight. She was there when we arrived and showed us the place (which was spacious, cute and well-equipped), and offered us a host of great advice on restaurants and bars in the area to try (we took her up on a quite a few, and they did not disappoint). If we had any questions, she was always just a text away. She'd even left us flowers and champagne for our anniversary, which was incredibly sweet.

The area is perfectly situated (just a walk away from shopping and restaurants on Bedford Ave, a short subway ride into the city for Broadway). There are a lot of amenities in the area, like bodegas and laundromats (though we didn't take advantage of those). 

Air conditioning in the bedroom was a wonderful relief from the hot New York summer. The place also comes with Roku, etc., but you probably won't use it since you're in the heart of Williamsburg.

All in all, the whole experience was charming. We'd absolutely stay here again.

Great apartment in Williamsburg. All arrangements were simple and straightforward. Apartment exactly as described and good value for New York. Joanna also left very clear information on the apartment and the local area. Subway 5 mins walk. Ferry to Pier 11/Wall St a 15 minute walk and a nice change from the subway. The immediate area has plenty of bars and restaurants. Laundry a couple of doors away. Appreciated the lovely chocolates left for us as a welcome gift. Would definitely recommend Joannas apartment.

Extremely organized instructions and easy to get in contact with. Superior location and felt at home. So many lovely notes on where to go, what to do, how things operate in the house, etc. It was so easy, painless.
Our host was very welcoming and helpful.  The neighborhood is transitioning. The apartment description was completely accurate.
Joanna made us feel very welcome in her apartment. The apartment was very accurately described in the listing and the neighbourhood was very pleasant.

Joanna was able to accommodate us over the Christmas weekend with little notice and it was such a seamless experience. The apartment was cute, cozy and close to everything especially the subway. The J and Z are about 5 minutes in one direction and the L is less than 10 in the other. Her apartment is quite literally surrounded by great restaurants and just a couple blocks away from amazing coffee, and great antique stores. An Uber ride from the city was $15. The neighborhood is great and there is even an old woman across the way who leans out her window and watches the street from (Website hidden by Airbnb) NY. Thanks, Joanna!
Great apartment, beautiful kitchen. Very happy with our 2 night stay

Joanna was a great host, communicative and friendly (she even made us chocolate). The apartment was lovely...clean, warm and bright. The location was perfect for our needs, central to everything we needed. Would definitely stay again!

Joanna is an amazing host with a superb apartment. It's location was the best - close to all the best coffee and food spots - her recommendations were awesome. Most importantly, the bed was so comfortable we slept in every morning!
Such a wonderful experience, Johanna was so hospitable. I highly recommend staying here if you want a great Williamsburg location!

Joanna was very easy to communicate with leading up to my stay and very nice to accommodate me on short notice. Her place was great: very clean and comfortable, had everything I needed. Close to transportation and restaurants.

Joanna was an excellent host. The building was quiet, the bed was soft and the air conditioning worked, just the things my boyfriend and I needed for an excellent weekend in Brooklyn! The neighborhood has lots of cute coffee shops and bars within walking distance.
Everything was as shown and described. I had a late night flight and I got the keys ahead of time so that I'd have no problems getting in, even with any delays. It worked perfectly.

Joanna's charming apartment had everything we needed for our three night stay. The location is very convenient with street parking and walking distance to many shops, restaurants and the train. We even enjoyed a walk to Manhattan via the Williamsburg bridge. The apartment was clean and comfortable and Joanna provided us with thoughtful and detailed information to make our stay as easy as possible. She even provided some delicious homemade chocolate!

Joanna was an amazing host and we had no problems whilst staying at her Brooklyn apartment. Everything was easy and well catered for.

Awesome response time and friendly too! 

The apartment was in an amazing location and was never more than a 15 minute walk from anywhere that we had on our Brooklyn bucket list.

I would highly recommend staying here. New York was having a bit of a heatwave whilst we stayed there and the AC was ideal!
The location is great and Joanna's restaurant recommendations were spot on. Cute apartment. I would recommend.

It was a great place to stay.  It was close to everything you need from shops to restaurants to supermarkets and wine bars!  Joanna was communicative all through out and followed up on how we were doing during our stay.  Fantastic host.  Definitely recommend to anyone.
Joanna's is a nice and cozy apartment which has basically everything you need during a trip. It's ten-minute walk from metro and the neighborhood is pretty.

Her home was very clean, bright and cute! Very spacious for Williamsburg! It was very quiet and a short walk to shops and restaurants. Joanne met with my daughter before our arrival and gave her the keys since she would be gone the day we arrived.

Joanna's place is well located in Williamsburg. It is very close to the subway stops that we needed to get into Manhattan, there was no shortage of places to eat/go out, and Joanna's apartment had everything we needed for our short stay. She left us a helpful guide of where to go/places to eat, which was perfect for my boyfriend and I to avoid spending hours bickering over where to go. 
The apartment itself contained everything we needed, had enough space for the both of us to move about comfortably/relax, the bed was super comfortable, and there was sufficient lighting/mirrors (something I struggle to find in most airbnbs). Overall, I have zero complaints about Joanna's cozy home.

I absolutely loved my stay here--Joanna was super communicative and we had everything we needed. It was also great that she left the keys at a KeyCafe so there was no need to arrange a meet-up. I just hope Joanna's apartment is available the next time I'm in town!

Un super appartement bien placé avec le métro à 5mn à pied. L'appartement est assez grand, le lit est très confortable et surtout Joanna à été joignable tout le long du séjour et très agreable :-) un grand merci a elle 😊 le quartier est vraiment bien aussi avec de nombreux bars et restaurants à proximité. Je le conseille !!

Joanna's apartment was perfect for our stay.  A good size for 2 people sharing a bedroom and though it is centrally located in Williamsburg it was quiet at night which I really appreciated.  A lot of things in the Williamsburg area were very walkable as well as the access to the L line which was great.

Joanna's apartment is exactly as advertised. Great location. Spacious and clean. A comfortable bed. Effective AC window units for summer heat. Plus, she has a great system for getting you a key that makes the whole check-in-check-out process a breeze.

Joanna's place is really charming. The building is very old and has that NY charm about it. Her apartment is very comfortable and she is a meticulous host. Recommend.
: )

Nous avons passé 5 jours formidables dans cet appartement idéalement situé tant pour visiter Manhattan que Williamsburg ou même Brooklyn!

L'appartement est hyper propre, grand, confortable, la literie au top. De plus Joanna est une hôte super!
En bref nous y retournerions avec plaisir!

Joanna was a terrific host. She made sure our stay was comfortable and was readily available to answer any questions. The apartment was just right, very clean and the location was great! If you are driving parking is limited and can be an issue. Would stay here again.
Lovely apartment with easy access to loads of bars, restaurants and shops. Also very close to subway with quick link into Manhattan.
The place is great. She’s a great host. The bed is a bit soft so if you like a firm mattress maybe try another place.
Great location !
Joanna’s place was really nice and clean! Friendly host. The key drop off was a little confusing for me.

Had a minor hiccup with the key pick up but Joanna was immediate in her assistance and it quickly became a non-issue. The place was clean, within walking distance to virtually anything one would need. All in all an excellent value and totally worth it.

Lovely and comfortable apartment at great location. She assisted us a lot. We went to her house in extremely cold whether, the living room was a little bit cold. Anyway we had great time in Williamvurgs.

Great find- was a lovely apartment and PERFECT location. While in a fun and hip area, was also very quiet and peaceful inside the apartment. We were initially concerned about driving our car as we heard parking can be tricky- we ended up parking a few blocks away and leaving our car there throughout the weekend without any issues. We hope to stay here again in the future.

This was a  great place in good old Williamsburg, For getting around the city it's about a 5 minute walk from the J and a 10 minute walk from the L trains, and it's NYC so taxis are very affordable too of course.

We liked the decorations, it felt super comfortable to stay at Joanna's. Some of the pleasant surprises were the beautiful trees just outside the window which were already green (it's late winter here in NY), and that the place was decently quiet which is definitely not always the case in the neighbourhood.  I found it easy to focus on my reading and get my things done before heading out into the city to catch up with friends.

Would stay again
The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location. Just minutes to walk to the subway station. Really awesome value for staying just a few minutes from Manhattan. Some good local eateries close by as well. Host was quick to respond and very accommodating. Would definitely recommend.

The place was perfect for our stay. It is clean, we slept well and we felt safe. Excellent place for the price. It is easy to walk around and get to public transport. We drove from Montreal and found street parking not too far (street parking is a bit of a mess in Williamsburg on Thursday and Friday morning). 
Joanna was very kind and accessible. 
We totaly recommend her place and we wouldn’t hesitate to rent it again.

Joanna’s place was great. The location couldn’t have been better. There are tons of great bars and restaurants within walking distance and it was a short subway ride into Manhattan. Joanna was very responsive to text messages and made the check in process a breeze. Would definitely stay again!

Joanna is the greatest AirBNB host of all time. Her place was great and very clean. Had no issues getting in contact with her and she was very accommodating. If you're ever in NYC and need an AirBNB I highly reccomend staying here!

All around, a great experience! This air bnb was clean, spacious, and centrally located in Williamsburg. Joanna had WiFi, coffee, clean sheets, and AIR CONDITIONING... because it was 90 degrees over the weekend, this was a life saver. We walked everywhere, found all types of food (NYC Bagels, Mediterranean, Italian, Mexican, Georgian, Pizza...). Overall, very easy to communicate with Joanna, and she was extremely laid back.

Top Appartement, super Lage, Williamsburg ist ein tolles Viertel. Restaurant Tipps Zenkichi.
Lg Ali

Joanna's place was a really nice, spacious and clean AirBNB for two people. It was right in the heart of Brooklyn, and provided a nice place to stay while my friend and I visited both Queens and Manhattan quite often during our stay. The air conditioning was definitely an added bonus, and her home was well-kept, well-furnished, and very tidy and clean. I'd definitely recommend people stay here. Thanks again, Joanna!
The room is really nice and giana is a great host. A really good way to experience ny. We will def stay there again. Recommended.

This was my first time in NY.  Giana made me and my girlfriend feel very welcomed from the start.  She is a great hostess.  She was very engaging and helpful with giving us ideas and direction on how to experience he city while maintaining our privacy.  The room was magnificent; beautiful hardwood floors and a sun/moonlight that is simply magical.  I heartily recommend this oasis in the heart of New York city.  You won't be disappointed.

This house is located in an area with beautiful mansions, very safe and just 3 blocks away from the train. The place is beautiful and immaculately clean, hosts were friendly and even thought ahead of time how to handle a language barrier if there were to be any. There is a service dog but he's always with the hosts.

Staying in Giana's home was a lovely experience. The room was just as pictured, the bed was extra comfortable, and I was able to make a nice breakfast for my boyfriend and I in the kitchenette made available to us. Giana was a very pleasant and upbeat host, willing to assist with anything we needed, including ideas for our daily activities. As my sole purpose for going to New York was to do all the touristy things that one could dream of, I worried that staying in Brooklyn may prove to be inconvenient, which didn't turn out to be the case at all. The subway was so close, I could feel it under my feet. I enjoyed trying a good bit of the food places in and around the plaza (especially Gyro King!) All in all, the only thing I didn't enjoy was having to wait on the bathroom at times. Haha! I highly suggest this house to anyone looking for a New York getaway.

My hosts were not available upon my arrival as they were going to be out of town.  However they went over and beyond and made arrangements to go over the specifics with my son who lives in the city.  They also emailed me upon my arrival to ensure that everything was ok and to see if I had any questions.  They made me feel at home.

This is a truly excellent place to stay in NYC. I lived in NY up until 2 years ago and grew up just blocks away, so I was immediately comfortable and knew my way around. However, the hosts were always there for me when I needed them. They were very interesting people who I enjoyed spending time with. They were completely ok with my dog staying with me and even watched him for a night when I went out.

The room is portrayed 100% accurately in the photos. The bathroom was just amazing. I really enjoyed using the claw-foot tub. The rest of the house is furnished beautifully, the back deck was a real plus.

I will definitely be staying with these folks again and recommend them highly to anyone visiting the area.

Spacious apartment with good subway access  Host Jan was very accommodating and moved in a chair for my tall husband. Well equipped kitchen and even a small dishwasher!  Bathtub was very high off the floor but a grab bar was installed during our stay. We found the rate a bit high for the neighborhood and amenities provided.

We had a wonderful time in this lovely area of Brooklyn. We actually did not know that such a lovely area would exist: with wonderful houses right in the middle of the big city. Everything at our stay was great: from the house, to the host, to Luigi - the wonderful dog. We will come again!

Giana was very nice and welcoming. We rented the place for our elderly parents, and it worked out very well for them.

That being said, be sure to READ THE DESCRIPTION THOROUGHLY.  You are renting the 2nd and 3rd floor of the home (not the ENTIRE home), and Giana stays on the first floor. 

Also, note that the NY tax of 14.75% is to be paid SEPARATELY to Giana. This is IN ADDITION to AirBnb fees.

Again, they had a very pleasant stay. Just be aware of the 'fine print'.

We had a fantastic time here.  Home was SPOTLESS; very comfortable, friendly and welcoming.  Only 3 blocks from the subway.  Easy to get all around New York, Coney Island and Brooklyn.  This was our first experience with AirBnB and it was wonderful.  Would stay here again in a heartbeat.  Thank you.

My wife and I spent a most enjoyable and comfortable visit with Chanoch & Giana in their lovely Victorian home conveniently located with easy access to everything New York City has to offer.  Chanoch & Giana were very helpful and gracious hosts, providing us with everything we needed to truly experience the area and feel at home.  The metro was a five minute walk, and the historic homes in the neighborhood filled with overhanging trees was a treat to appreciate during our daily walks.  We highly recommend them and are already making plans for a return visit.  Steven & Ana
Beautiful location, home and host.  We had just the right amount of support and privacy.  I would highly recommend enjoying this amazing home.

Had a wonderful stay at Gianna's beautiful home.  From swings on the front porch to walks in the shady neighborhood, my stay was delightful and the hostess was, too.  Just want to mention that the in room air conditioner was great and cooled the room down immediately and the room was squeaky clean and comfortable.  Can't wait to visit again!

6 dagars mycket gott boeende i Brooklyn. Kontakten med ägarna fungerade utmärkt. Ingenting som inte motsvarade det som utlovats. De är mycket sympatiska och trevliga. Kom med tips och förslag på saker. Respekterade vår intigritet och var absolut inte påträngande. Rummet ligger på 3 planet och var precis som på bilden. Rent, frächt .Sängen var stor och konfortabel. Tempurmadrass. Köket låg en trappa ner och innehöll allt man behöver. Toalett och duschutrymmet var extra fint. Fina detaljer vackert kakel. 
Att åka till och från deras hus till New York var smidigt. Det kanske tog 6-7 minuter att gå till tunnelbanan. Det var direktlinje till många platser vi besökte. Det finns affärer och lite olika typer   restauranger. Alla var väldigt trevliga. Kändes tryggt och bra. Vi har bara gott och positivt att säga om vår vistelse hos dem. Åker  i fler gånger så är det ingen tvekan om vart vi vill bo.

B&B as advertised, very clean, interesting Victorian home good neighborhood. Many might want to walk to coutelyou road with its restaurants, coffee bars, etc. The hosts try be accomodating.
Like many B&B's this is a shared bathroom experience. The bathrooms are very clean and interestingly decorated. One of the bathrooms does not have a lock but uses an occupied sign which might put off some. Also the home is over a hundred years old which lends to its charm but also makes for some creaky staircases late at night. If you like the B&B experience it's a fine place.

Giana's home is a delightful old three story home in a residential neighborhood in Brooklyn. Giana is a welcoming and friendly host who will interact with you as much or as little as you want.  She is very accessible through whichever form of communication is easiest and will help you through your arrival.  She made our arrival very easy. Her home has easy access to the subway which is a short walk away.  All guest bedrooms are on the third floor.  A nice kitchen and sitting room is on the second floor for use by guests. A very important member of the household is Luigi, a beautiful black Labrador who takes care of guests almost as well as Giana. 

Some observations: no shoes in the house, so be prepared to walk in socks or bring indoor slippers. 3rd floor accommodations might present issues if you have bad knees or some other physical problem. Bathroom facilities are excellent but may have to share depending on number of other guests. Also, old house - sensitive plumbing - check with host about this. Wi-fi accessible but no cable or basic tv - other options available are Netflix, YouTube, etc. on large tv screen in kitchen-sitting room, if you wish - check with host.

Thank you, Giana, for a wonderful stay.

This is a super place to stay when visiting NYC.  Ditmas Park is a charming neighborhood and JK’s place was the perfect place to settle in for the week.  We went into Manhattan daily, which was very easy, given the proximity to the subway stop and the B/Q lines.  Comfy foam mattress, lovely room, and big bath with both a new shower and a clawfoot tub.  We would stay again, in a minute.

The Roost is a charming house with very comfortable bedrooms, bathrooms and other living spaces.  The Hostess Jan cannot do enough to make your stay enjoyable. Also there are some good places for breakfast and other meals plus easy access to the subway. Highly recommended.  Sue J

My stay at Bianca's was lovely! The flat is cool and the bedroom was clean, comfy and a really good size.
Bianca is fun and really easy to get along with.
I'd recommend staying at Bianca's!
fue una excelente experiencia,el departamento es comodo el barrio estupendo y Bianca nos ha hecho sentir como en (Website hidden by Airbnb) recomendamos plenamente, Alejandra y Quique

Bianca is a great host and nice to hang out with, we had very nice talks about NYC, art and music.
I had a wonderful time at her apt. The room is big and the apt was clean. The location is very nice, close to the L-line and great restaurants and shops.
I would want to stay there again next time I'm in NYC.

Bianca is a great host, very frindly and allways willing to help. 
The place is great and in a great location.
Will repeat.


Bianca es una estupenda anfitriona, amigable y siempre dispuesta a yudar en todo lo que pueda.
El piso es estupendo y en una localizacion inmejorable.
Repetire.

E' stato un grandissimo piacere trascorrere il mio soggiorno a New York a casa di Bianca.
