Una persona molto attiva ma sempre presente nei momenti di bisogno, sempre pronta a darti consigli e dritte per vivere al meglio questa fantastica esperienza. La camera si è rivelata ottima anche per due persone (ero con un amico): dimensioni adeguate, luminosa, ma soprattutto pulita. Sicuramente la terrò ancora presente per eventuali viaggi in futuro (ci tornerò, assolutamente). Magico lo spettacolo visto a broadway in sua compagnia... Grazie Bianca! A presto

The room is spacious and open, with a comfortable bed and more than adequate heating during the colder days. The apartment is fantastically located, right in the heart of the East Village, with easy access to all the fine dining, entertainment and bars you could ever want, just downtown from Manhattan's more major attractions.

Bianca is a welcoming and friendly host, and is quick with suggestions and help to ease traveling and seeing an unfamiliar city.

Highly recommended!

Bianca is a lovely lady and very friendly.  Her apartment is in a great location and was highly enjoyable to stay in.  It was exactly what I was looking for and would definitely stay there again if I had the opportunity.  Thanks again Bianca! :)

Bianca's listing is in a great location and definately value for money. Plenty of restaurants, coffee shops, bars and the Subway is within a 10 minute walk. The apartment is clean with a very spacious bedroom. 
Bianca is a gracious, talented lady and a wonderful host. She is extremely accommodating and allowed me to look after her plants while she was away!
I would not hesitate in returning to this apartment.
Thank you Bianca!

Bianca is a very nice host! I was busy all the time so we didn't have much time to spend together but she was always up for a chat every time we met in the apartment.
The place is clean and warm, with a very big room and plenty of storage space.
The location is the best you could get, right in the heart of the EV, close to everything you might need.
100% suggested, grazie Bianca :)

My stay at Bianca's was super! I'd never tried airbnb before but I knew it was the perfect choice for me when Bianca made me feel like home right away I walked in. She's really easy going and great fun! I stayed at Bianca's for two weeks and Bianca did absolutely her best to help me to find all the coolest restaurants, shops and places to hang out. The room was very cosy and spacious and I slept really well in the double bed. The location of her apartment could have not been better. I could walk anywhere and many different subway lines and buses were just few minutes walk away. There're amazing brunch and dinner places just nearby and East Village night life never disappointed me. I really enjoyed my stay and definitely will contact Bianca when I'll go again. Miss you already!! Xxx
I had a wonderful time at Bianca's.  It's a tidy space & she's a friendly, helpful host.  I hope to return.

Bianca was wonderful. Super helpful with how to get places/where to go and the room was amazing!
She makes a great Italian coffee too!

Esta fue mi primera experiencia en alojarme en casa de alguien, y la verdad estuvo fantástica. No sólo Bianca es una persona realmente muy hospitalaria,  siempre atenta y dando ideas de dónde ir, o cómo ir a determinado lugar,  con su sonrisa en todo momento, el barrio me encantó, es muy pintoresco lleno de barcitos, negocios, con mucha identidad, y movimiento todo el tiempo. La habitación es tal como se ve en las fotos, es espaciosa e iluminada., y tiene total privacidad. Definitivamente, volvería a vivir allí, pasé unos días muy felices en ese lugar.
The host canceled my reservation 29 days before arrival.
Bianca is the nicest host, her place is very conveniently located (you can access 3 different metro lines in 5 minutes), street is quiet. The flat is very clean and well equiped
Very comfortable room. Rafael mothers very nice person.  I enjoy my vacations and if i can return thats the place that i want to stay again.  Thanks.

My boyfriend and I stayed for 9 days. We didn't meet Rafael during our stay but Martha gave us a warm welcome and an orientation of the basement. The place had everything we needed and was private, which was what we we looking for. Martha and Rafael are sensitive to what guests need. Their place was equipped with everything, even the little things for guests to have an enjoyable stay. There were movies, take-out menus, towels, 

The location is nice and convenient. It's about a 10 min walk to the subway. We were usually out in the morning and return late at night but the neighbourhood is pretty safe. The convenience stores around the area open till late too. There are a great variety of food, so no worries to cure any hunger pangs! 

All in all, it was very comfortable and delightful stay at Rafael's place. Would definitely recommend this place!
Had a great stay. Felt at home and was very comfortablE. love the neighborhood!
I stayed here for 3 month. Very clean and confortable appartment in a safe area. Highly recommended.

Hi y'all - we are currently deep in the heart of Texas! We immensly enjoyed our time in New York and were only a 10 minute walk from Times Square. We were part of the New Years Eve celebrations - it was certainly an experience. We met with Clebers friend Eric who kindly waited for us to arrive. (I hope you made your flight Eric).
The apartment was small but adequate and arm. We can also recommend the pizza from 2Brothers up the road. damn cheap at $8 for a HUGE pizza.

thanks Cleber for letting us use your apartment.

cheers
Marcel and family (4 in all)
Australia.

Indeed best location in NYC. 

Walking distance to everything, clean place and host very friendly. I found this place for my female friends. They were delighted about the place and also about Cleber, the host, who made them feel very welcomed. 

You have Times Square less than 5 minutes walk. All the trains get you close to the apartment.  

Definitely will recommend this place to anyone coming to NY.

Cleber is a good and friendly host. And the location is very good - it's close to everything, though Midtown West is not exactly my favorite place in the world. 

Cleber advertises this, so there's no surprise, but  you should be fully aware of the quirks of his place: the toilet is not in the same room as the shower (and indeed, is outside the apartment), and the AC didn't work when I was there. 

All in all, a fair price for an okay apartment in a good location with a nice host.
The host canceled my reservation.

Cleber is such a friendly and lovely person, the room (and apartment) was neat and comfortable and the private TV was  welcomed late night company when having to rest up from walking all over NYC! The location was perfect for me, so close to the subway, Times Square and Broadway. I would recommend Cleber and his abode to anyone.

Cleber was a down to earth nice guy. Very clean and giving. Offered me coffee & food graciously. Location of unit is very good. Close to E train. 42nd St transfers to almost all subway trains. Located on 2nd floor, easy to get to... quiet too. Lots of eat options. I liked the Thai food place nearby. I really liked my private flat screen TV for local news & weather.

This room is great for one person. The host is charming and warm. I read the ad wrong and was under the assumption that I would be renting a small apt. and not just a room in somebody's apt.-Totally my fault. The apt. is very clean and well taken care of.It's very convenient to get around. More than one person would be very difficult.
Cleber! Muito obrigado! This guy is the bomb! I will definitely stay back at this place next time!

He was really a nice guy. I was not in the home much. But when I was, he was great. I would stay again.

Justin
The host canceled my reservation 49 days before arrival.
great guy - very welcoming - ended up changing plans - was very cool with last minute changes.  small place but perfect to crash!  would stay again!

Cleber's apartment is amazingly well located, just few from the heart of Times Square and all the subway lines (A, C, E, N, Q, R, W, S, 1, 2, 3, 7 and 9). If you are coming from JFK, LaGuardia or Newark Airports, just take the shuttle bus to Port Authority Bus Terminal and walk four short blocks to get to his place. Despite this proximity with this evermoving touristic center, the place is very quiet. Cleber is a very nice, polite, helpful and discreet host. For sure I will stay at his place on my next trip to NYC!

I had one of my colleagues stay with Cleber (I already had an another place lined up). My colleague told me that Cleber is very friendly and that his place is nice and clean. He also said that he would like to stay there again whenever he has an opening while we are in NYC.

Cleber is a nice guy and helpful with some traveler information or good places for shopping or eating. The apartment is near the Time Square and so in a very good place. The room was clean and had a own TV. The bad was a bit small, but OK, the restroom was on the floor, outside the apartment and also very small. For me it was a good time. Thank you Cleber for all.

Perfect location
Clean, quite room with AC
Comfy bed
Cleber is a helpfull and concerned host
Would stay there again :)
a short walking distance from times squere , right in the heart of everything. Clever was very very friendly and helpfull.
Además de que el punto es increíblemente practico, el anfitrión es insuperable. Amable, practico, amigable y muy empático. Y el lugar esta colocado estregicamente para salir de rumba. Gracias Cleber.

Cleber is a great host - he arranged to pass the keys on when my flight got delayed, the place is spotless, the room has a double bed, clean sheets, big wardrobe and a TV. Working aircon. Cleber is a very very helpful and lovely guy. OK, toilet is outside - so what, it's two steps away and for exclusive use. 

Location perfect - short walk to Penn St and Port Authority Bus Station. Best pizza ever on the corner 2 blocks up. Times Sq 10 min walk. 

Would recommend to anyone - even 2 ppl if someone doesn't need vast space (nor has tons of luggage).

Great location, great apartment and a good price for the size of the room. Very comfortable for 1 person and possibly for 2 persons. Cleber was very friendly, relaxed and easy going. I felt very comfortable at his place. Thanks!
The host canceled my reservation 29 days before arrival.
Cleber was a great host! His Appartment is a great location to start your adventures in New York :)

Cleber is a warm, friendly host who made my stay in NYC a wonderful experience. He is very helpful and gave me great tips about the places I wanted to visit - he is an all-round lovely person. The spotless apartment has a lovely vibe to it. The room I stayed in has a comfortable bed, silky smooth bed linen, ample wardrobe space and a flat screen TV. The location is absolutely perfect - close to Broadway theatres, subway stations, a bus terminal and countless restaurants. I enjoyed every moment in NYC, even though my trip was cut short, as my original flight got canceled. I'd love to stay there again. Thank you Cleber!!

I chose Cleber and his place to stay because of the location and was not disappointed - it is indeed 5 minutes walk from Times Square and other significant NYC landmarks and 1 minute walk to major bus and subway hub (Port Authority Bus Station).
The room is really small and that would trouble those who travel with lots of stuff, but for me it was perfect.

In short: if you are on a tight budget (or just are not into overspending) but still want to stay in the very heart of Manhattan, this is the perfect choice for you!

Mi estancia en el apartamento de Cleber fue una gran experiencia. No solo por que la locacion es perfecta, solo a unas cuadras de Times Square, sino que Cleber es un magnifico host y tambien un maravilloso ser humano. Mis vacaciones no solo fueron maravillosas sino que tambien me dieron la posibilidad de conocer a una gran persona. Definitivamente repetire la experiencia y por supuesto volvere a ser su huesped.
Cleber was really great with me. It is really a pleasant guy and host. I recommend cleber's place and can say that he is welcome in France.

It's a great location, for sure. Host is very nice and accommodating. As it says in the description, there is a private toilet but it's not in the apartment, so you have to walk down the hall to use it. Which is fine, unless you need to get up in the middle of the night… stumbling down a brightly lit hall, fumbling with the lock on the door to go to the bathroom isn't my favorite thing to do at 4am. BUT, given the price for a clean bed in a safe apartment in a great location in New York City, it's hard to argue!

I really enjoyed my stay at Cleber's place. Great location : close to Times Square and Port Authority Bus Terminal (very convenient if you need to take a Greyhound bus or a shuttle for airports); and quite apartment. Plus Cleber is the Perfect host: he is a very nice and funny guy!! Special thanks for the introduction to Bresilian food, really appreciated  ;-)   For sure, next time I go to NY I won't hesitate to contact him! 
Thanks again Cleber, and see you next time !

The room was very clean with a closet and hangers. Also provided was free wifi, a TV and free use of the kitchen. Cleber was a great host, very friendly and a joy to chat with. He provided a towel and an extra blanket. Would recommend this room to anyone
Good room, excellent location. Thoroughly enjoyed the stay. Highly recommended!

Excelente anfitrión, Cleber es una excelente persona, me sentí como en casa, muy amable y lleno de tips para disfrutar de una estadía placentera.  El lugar simplemente genial... cerca de todo puedes llegar a pie a lugares cheverisimos... la verdad fue una gran experiencia.  El servicio de Wifi y las toallas limpias es algo que realmente agradeces en un lugar lejano.  Muy muy feliz con esta experiencia y gracias a Cleber por permitirme hospedar en su casa.  Y no dudaría en volver a solicitarle hospedaje.

The apartment was very nice and cozy for a single, but not suitable for a couple. Be advice that the neat clean toilets are private but outside the flat - didn't bother me. The location is perfect - right in the heart of Manhattan.
Can't tell anything about Cleber himself, since he was out of town. He has been responsible in letting me know he will be out of town and in giving me his replacement's name - Gisela - who was just fantastic - very nice, friendly and helping.
Will be back anytime.

Cleber is a great guy, with a fantastic apt!  Located just steps from Time Square, you've got access to the heart of Manhattan, and you can jump on a subway in any direction. Most affordable apt in this area.  Cleber is a very accommodating host, and keeps a very clean and well organized place.  I highly recommend staying at Cleber's place!

The location is awesome. Subway stations and bus terminal are within 5 to 10 minutes' walk. The apartment is very close to Time Square and all the other hotspots in NYC, so I walked a lot instead of taking public transportations. Moreover, Cleber is such a hospitable host. He gave me a lot of suggestions about traveling and shopping. The bedroom, bathroom, and restroom are clean. The decoration is elegant. If I revisit NYC in the future, I will definitely choose here next time!

My friend and I had a great time in NY and Cleber's apartment was very conveniently located with Times square a couple of blocks away and restaurants and bars just down the street.

The flat was clean, comfortable and funky. Check in was very easy with Gisella being super helpful and accommodating. I would recommend CLeber's apartment to anyone looking for a place to stay in NY.

Thanks!

We were received by Gisela, a good friend of Cleber, and she was really nice and helpful. She gave us all the useful information about the flat and how to organize our stay in NYC.
That flat is at a really good place - 15/20' walking to Time Square or Central Park, good restaurants and pubs are just nearby, metro station is close as well - > As said : Best Location in NYC :)
We had a really pleasant stay in that flat for our stay in NYC !
Thanks again Gisela and Cleber !

Cleber apartment is really what we can see on Airbnb photos session.
Great place, closer to METRO, some blocks from Times Square.
Also, Gisela (who wait for us as Cleber was not there) is gently and available to guide us during our period at NYC. Thanks so much Gisela for your help and tips.
I recommend AIRBNB and Cleber's apartment. It's really great to stay there.

Great location - convenient walking distance to Times Square, many local restaurants, the Skyline and the Metro.  Bus connections excellent to Lincoln Center.  Very clean and functional apartment.  Only drawbacks are that the guest room is small and the (private) toilet is down the hall - a bit of a pain if you have to get up in the night.  

Cleber was out of town, but Gisela and Cindy handled the checkin and get me set up.  Would definately stay here again.

Great place to stay for one person!

We had an amazing stay at Cleber's place for 4 days. His place is very clean and 10 minutes walk from Times Square so is perfect for tourists like us.
I recommend Cleber's apartment. It's really a great place to stay.

Clean, safe and close (walking ditance) to any public transportation, to times square and to other hotspots in NYC. Cleber is always available, and a very hospitable host. Truly recommended place to stay, internet is fast, with AC, good sized bed, a wardrobe, and in general a very comfortable flat and nice decoration. Thanks Cleber!
Staying at Cleber's house was a great experience! A great location,  Cleber's  hospitality, neatness and communication impressed me. Thank you very much, Cleber!!!

Was my first time in NYC and so was apprehensive as to what to expect as well as it being my first stay through AirBNB. Finding the apartment was easy as was situated about 15 minutes from Penn Station if you got the train from Newark with the bus station 10 minutes in the other direction. As for the apartment it was basic but thats all you need as you are mostly exploring the city till late. I only slept in the apartment so all i needed was a bed. The room itself was good sized came with a sofa, drawers and a loft bed which i haven't slept on one of those since i was like 10 years old. There was a tv on the wall above the bed. The only weird thing was that the toilet was on the corridor but it is only used by that apartment so was fine. The bathroom was small aswell but i got used to it. The area itself was great. My fear were that i would not be safe walking the streets at night but was ok nobody bothered you and everyone was friendly and willing to help. Location wise it was perfect, Empire state building was about a 20 minute walk, Times Square about the same and Central Park about 30 mins with a short 10-15 minute subway ride to Statue of Liberty and the World Trade Centre. Easy access to shops with a food store 5 minutes down the road, Macys about 15 mins and Madison Square gardens aswell. Cleber was an excellent host and gave me some tips on the city and gave me a guide book to help me. Will definatly be staying here again

This was my first experience with Airbnb and it worked perfectly. The flat is exactly what you get in the pictures. It was very clean, organized and confy. I´ll probably be there again in my next visit to NY.

I had a great stay at Cleber's apartment. I was in NYC for a week and the apartment is conveniently located in Midtown. The neighborhood is full of nice restaurants and bars.  It's close to Time Square and other major attractions of NYC. Also most of the metro lines and Penn station are all within walking distance. What you see in the pictures is truly what you get and for me thats all I needed. The bed was comfy, there's airco, TV and it's clean. The only awkward thing about the apartment is that the toilet in the hallway, but it really didn't bother me at all.

Cleber is true host who takes great care in making sure that his guests have a pleasant stay is his apartment. I would recommend Cleber's apartment to anyone wanting to stay in NYC.  

Once again thanks for everything Cleber!
First time using airbnb.com, great experience!!! Thanks Cleber!! Nice bedroom and clean place. Very helpful host. Location is perfect!!! Short walk from port authority and Time square. Thanks again!

Clever was a fantastic host. He offered great advice on things to do and places to go, as well as hints and tips on other things like how best to travel to Boston and get an iPhone5!

His appartment was amazingly well located. I walked back from Times Square in about 10/15 minutes at a leisurely pace, the PABT is less than 5 minutes away, the Highline (you HAVE to visit this) can't be much more than 10minutes walk the other way too.

The appartment was also very clean, tidy and above all quiet. The street was busy (good for walking home late), but the appartment was completely shielded from any noise.

I stayed in the larger room which was amazing for chilling out and the bed was good and it's clever design made the room massive (the ceilings are high).

I highly recommend both Cleber and his appartment and thorough enjoyed my stay, THANK YOU!

The bedroom was really big, especially because of all the space below the loft space.
The apartment was very clean, and in easy walking distance of the Port Authority bus terminal, Penn Station, Times Square, Empire State Building and the High Line (highly recommended).

Wonderful location just a few minutes away from Times Square. Access to public transportation is very convenient as the place is 2 streets away from PABT station. You do not need to worry about food and entertainment with restaurant row nearby. 9th Ave has loads of restaurants as well.

Finally, a very welcoming and accommodating host (Cleber was out of town so Gisela was there to take care of everything). No fuss regarding check-in and out timings.

Highly Recommended!

The apartment of Cleber is nice. The room is big and the bed very comfortable. It was also very clean and tidy and it has everything you may need for your stay,

But the best thing by far is the location. You are really less than 5mins walking distance from Times square. You are also very close to the Penn station where you can get trains to/from instance to Newark airport, and also close to the Port authority bus station where you can find connections with JFK airport.

Cleber and Gisella are perfect!! Gisella received me in great apartment Cleber, was very, very helpful and made sure to make sure everything was according to our stay. A big hug for her. Cleber simply perfect, a great people I meet. The fourth, rather than the photos, lol. With a large space and a perfect bed for resting after long walks through NY. lol
The location 5 minutes from Times Square and literally next to the Port Authority Terminal that allows us to come and go without major complications. actually everything perfect. Cleber Amigo and Amiga Gisella, already counting the days to return to Big Apple and of course with the decision of where to stay already taken. A strong hug.

I met Gisela who was there cleaning the apartment and getting everything set while Cleber was away. The apartment was perfect! Amazing location, very comfortable bed, lots of room, and impeccably clean! Gisela was also an amazing person and even bought some coffee before she turned the apartment over. I had a great time, and I'd definitely stay there again!

Great location, Cleber is a generous host who does everything to ensure a comfortable stay. Room and bed were both spacious although kitchen and bathroom were rather small. Nevertheless I had a great time here. Once again the location is 5 minute walk from Times Square and 10 minute subway to almost anywhere in Manhattan!

Truly great location and extremely near Port Authority Terminal if you plan to get to and from JFK or LGA via the NYCAirporter Buses. Cleber was there at the time of check in and the room was in perfect condition and freshly cleaned. Loft bed was very comfy as long as you're nimble coming up and down. Thanks Cleber - I appreciate the coffee and chat when I first arrived!

Foram 04 dias incriveis em NY ,Cleber me deixou muito a vontade em sua casa, e ainda me deu dicas incriveis da cidade,o apartamento era muito limpo e agradavel e fica perto de tudo,muito obrigado por tudo Cléber.espero retornar em breve . abraços.

This is a great place to stay in the heart of NY!
It is a very safe area and a very easy to get to and from. The apartment is very neat and tidy and a perfect place to stay to experience NY living. 
Cleber was an amazing host, I didn't arrive until after midnight and he was very happy to wait up for me, and he was a very lovely guy!! Great communication leading into my booking.

This was a great place to visit NY near times square and subway.
The apartment was really like the description and very clean.
Cleber was a great host, he helped me for some problems and I thank him very much. This was a perfect place to enjoy your stay in NYC .

The area only seemed safe after getting used to it. I was approached for money twice the first day. 
If in the cold weather it's not for those who chill easily. The heater kicks on when the temp drops to 42. Wearing warm clothes was ok until the last few days.

OVERALL ... good location for the price

This is a great place to crash that is convenient to everywhere I needed to be (Times Square, Chelsea, W Vill, etc.). As a former NYC resident I appreciated the unique set up of the apt (toilet down the hall, tiny shower, etc.), but for me it's not a problem since I'm out and about and only used the apt. as a crash pad. Cleber is a great host because he's there when he says he'll be there, greets you, gives you the lowdown....then he's gone! ha haha Only used this place because my regular place where i stay for free was not available. This is an ideal alternative I will remember for future trips (I come to NYC about once a month).

Thank you Cleber. I had a great a stay at your place. It is clean, very quiet, safe and close to everything. 
The room is actually quite big and the bed is sooooo comfy :-) 
Thanks for answering my questions and helping me with the first important details.
Will definitely come back!

Cleber is an amazing host. He's very helpfull, easy going and friendly. Once you need him, he'll be there for you. We got along so well, almost like we've met years ago. The apartment is very comfy, clean and location is amazing. If you're worried about the bathroom being outside the apartment, just don't. You'll get used to it. I surely didn't see any problem. As for the neighborhood, I walked at night many times and I didn't have any problems with that. There are many restaurants in this street, so it's not a desert area at night. You'll be really close to Times Square, Broadway and Port Authority Bus Station, so you can take a bus or the subway to everywhere in NY. Highly recomend Cleber as a host and his apartment for people who really wanna experience NY.

Location. Location. Location. Nuff said. Cleber was also kind enough to wait for me during check in. Had an incident at airport with baggage mismanagement. I ended up checking in 5 hours late. Thanks for that Cleber.

Cleber's apartment was a fantastic place to stay during my visit to New York. It's quiet, clean, very very conveniently located and was the perfect size for my 5 day trip. Public transportation, shops, bars and restaurants are all nearby. Cleber was friendly and helpful, always responding very quickly to my questions via email and text message.

Clebers apartment is amazing. It's ideally situated to get all around town (especially Times Square) and being on 9th ave its very safe. The room was the perfect size, allowing me to have a feeling of having my own space. The whole apartment and separate toilet were super clean (I witnessed Cleber giving it a spruce up after each guest left). Cleber himself was a lovely guy, willing to assist in any way. Highly recommended.

Cleber was a great host! The Apartment is clean and quiet. Location is ideal to get anywhere in Manhattan. I will definitely be asking to stay again, or referring peeps to Cleber. This is a great deal!

Had an amazing stay in NYC - great location, walking distance to everything and very clean and comfortable.  Cleber was a great host and kept in contact for check in, etc. and was very understanding when my bus was 1 1/2 hours late (thanks so much). Highly recommended!!!

Very good location,a walk distance to everything in Mid-Manhattan, very good access to many means of transportation :
subway (Port Authority and Times Square), railway (Pen Station),
shuttles to/from airport (Port Authority),Piers 83 (Circle Cruises) and 39th street (to New Jersey,for taking beautiful photos of Mid-Manhattan).
Apartment is quiet,tidy and clean,with comfortable bed and full access to TV,fridge,bathroom and toilet.
Cleber is a very kind,discreet and helpful host,whenever necessary.
Bottom line,a highly recommended place for any tourist requiring basic conditions for visiting NYC and for recovery after long and tiring days.

This has been my very first experience with AIRBnB and I'm gladly surprised. Staying at Cleber's apartment really beats all the trouble one may have with costly hotels. The apartment itself is neat and tidy besides having a comfy kitchen with all the commodities you want. Cleber is such a figure! He's a happy person who can talk a lot so that you never get bored. I do recommend AIRBnB and, when in New York, staying at Cleber's is a great option.

I had a great time staying with Cleber. He was very helpful in providing information about stuff to do in the area and the shower and room were very clean. Best of all, the AC was strong and worked very well, which was an absolute necessity given the 95+ degree temperatures in NYC at the time. As some noted, the facilities are small, but they get the job done so I can go back out and explore the city. And the price is unbeatable. Definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to explore the city (only a few blocks from Times Square).

Cleber's appartment, located close to the Port Authority Terminal, Subways and Times Square was an ideal place for my stay in New York. The apartment was neat and clean and had all the amenities needed during my stay. Cleber was a charming and considerate host, answering all my emails prior to the stay promptly and providing any detail I requested. I spoke with Cleber several times during my stay and thoroughly enjoyed his company. I would recommend his accomodation to anyone travelling to New York.

Amazing host, a spacious and clean room. Cleber is such a welcoming person, a true warm-hearted Brazilian. Is also very flexible planning wise. I even added one more night there. The location of the apartment is hard to beat, close to times square and many theatres.
Will definitely first look up if Cleber's place is available the next time I come to NY.

Cleber was very communicative contacting me via email and text prior to my arrival.  The location was perfect for my purpose of visiting NYC showing in the Javitts two blocks away.  The apartment was very clean, the bed comfortable and the towels soft.   Right out the front door is a mass of restaurants and eateries, and New York life.  Staying here is a no brainer for the price, location and peace of mind knowing Cleber is a good guy, apartment very acceptable and totally convenient.  Already booked for my next trip in January!

Perfect location and Cleber is a perfect host!  The apartment was spotless and charming.  The bed was very comfortable, as was the whole apartment (not counting the toilet!).  Right next door to a small convenience shop and Irish pub; the location is on restaurant row.  Down the street from the Port Authority - everything you want to do in walking distance.  Cleber was very responsive to all my questions and requests.  Ladies, don't forget to pack your own hair dryer - this is important!
Cleber was an excellent host... Communication was spot on.  Apartment was great... perfect location... I will definitely stay here again.
Cleber is pleasant, friendly, helpful, very communicative. The apartment is clean and quiet. Good location.
Thanks a lot))) I spent in Clebers house wonderful days!!! Everything was perfect! Good host! Good location! Middle of Manhattan! Super! I enjoyed my vacations there!

Cleber canceled my sister's booking for his second bedroom which threw a spanner in the works for our reunion. He then offered her the couch in my room for an extra $30 a night without consultation with me. Not a great start.  Moving past that, the apartment was clean and well located.
Good Location! Clean and everything OK!

Great expérience! Cleber is a great host. His flat is really well located, close to Time Square. It is a very good alternative to the hotel.
I recommend the Cleber's flat extremely.
Its a great place to stay I really enjoyed to stay here. Cheap, clean and very well located

Another great stay! The room was great. Bed super comfy, clean and soft sheets, great quality towel.  Drawers to use and a surprising amount of space with the lofted bed. Very clean space - amazing location just minutes from Port Authority and Times Square and TONS of great restaurants and bars near by. Small bathroom but very clean.  Bathroom down the hall is different but not an issue. For the price and convenience, can not be beat!

It was a wonderful stay at New York in Cleber's Appartment. Cleber's friend Marco made me feel very welcome and showed me everything...from the towels to the keys... It was a very clean and nice home and I had everything I needed for a perfect stay. The appartment is located near Times Square, Broadway, Penn Station and Port Authority Bus Terminal. From the PABT you can reach the Jersey Gardens Outlet Center as good as the whole city by subway. The bed was comfort and the apt was very quiet during the night. Thank you so much and I would really like to com back!
And another tipp: The Highline is a great place in New York. You can reach it easily in a 10 minute walk from the apt!!!

Stayed at Cleber's apartment again for 4 days last month.  This time he was out of town, but his friend was there to meet me and check me in/out (he knew who I was when I showed up earlier than expected).  I was in the larger room with the loft bed; very neat and comfortable.  My stay was just as good as last year, and I'll come here on my visits to NYC in the future if there's room.  Thanks again, Cleber, and hope to see you next time!
Everything was great. The location is very convenient, the place is clean. I liked staying there and would come back if I am in NYC again!
Great App, very clean, perfect located; Cleber is a real nice host, very patient and funny. Would book this room definetely again

I stayed at Cleber's 3 nights and everything was perfect. Location is fantastic, apartment itself it super clean and cozy. And Cleber is nice as a person, professional with checking in and out. I would def recommend to stay here.

The location of the apartment is perfect. It is close to the Times Square and very close to the Port Authority station. The room is very nice. Good lights, good bed, it was very clean. We had an issue with the key hole of the bathroom, but Cleber answered very promptly and helped to solve it. I recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to have access to the main points of NYC and have a confortable stay.
It was really nice to stay at Cleber's place. The location of the apt is just perfect!
Great host. Met us earlier than check in time for our convenience. Very nice and friendly and easy to reach. Place was very clean and close to everything. Very enjoyable experience

Passei 6 noites em NY juntamente com uma amiga. Fomos muito bem acolhidas pelo Cleber, local era limpo e a localização perfeita !!!! Utilizamos o apartamento praticamente para tomar banho e dormir , mas como tinha cozinha pudemos tomar café da manha de forma mais econômica e saudável. O bairro não e o mais bonito de NY, mas para quem esta indo para " turistar" não tem local melhor . Fica pertissimo da Times Square e a poucos metros do metro. Fizemos praticamente tudo a pé . Cleber muito obrigada !!!! Vivemos momentos inesquecíveis !!!!

We had a wonderful time in New York City! This was the perfect location to explore the city as it was close to the Port Authority Bus/Subway station (2min walk) and close to the Time Square Subway (5min walk). The apartment was clean and the perfect amount of space for the two of us. The room's window did not face the street so it was rather quiet for New York standards as we could only hear the occasional siren. The location totally makes up for having to walk down the hall to the bathroom. Thanks Regina and Cleber.
Très bien reçu par Regina. Bonne situation de l'adresse,

We've stayed three nights at the Apartment, overall its a nice, clean, save and cosy place. The location, just 5mins from Times Square, is fabulouse! We didn't meet our host, but Regina was really nice! We would sleep der again.
Cleber was amazing and allowed me early check in and was so accomodating.. I wish he had properties everywhere. I would always stay at his place. Best experience and great price.

Um ótimo lugar,  muito limpo e organizado.  Localização excelente para quem deseja explorar Manhattan.  Anfitrião educado e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza será minha hospedagem de referência em NY, voltarei mais vezes.

My week here was really great. Cleber was awesome, and very helpful throughout the process. The location was unbelievable for the price - pretty short walk to Broadway and Times Square. I highly recommended this place!

Mon séjour fût des plus agréable, Cleber est très accueillant, avec de belles valeurs et m'a fait des suggestions de visites très intéressantes.  La chambre est très belle et tout est super propre! Le cartier est génial, plein de bon petits restos et vraiment prêt de Time Square, Empire States building, Lincoln Center (le New York Philharmonique en vaut vraiment la peine!), Carnegie Hall et bien plus.  Pour les autres destinations, le métro est à un coin de rue et très facile de se rendre partout.  Ce fût également un plaisir de discuter avec Walter qui louait la chambre voisine.  Je recommande sans hésiter cette chambre confortable.

Nossa primeira vez em NYC, eu e meu esposo nos hospedamos na casa do Cleber, lugar singelo, ótima localização pertinho da estação de metrô da Port Authority, fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Cleber, nos deixou super a vontade.
Great room. Clean and great value, plenty of space.

It was exactly what I needed! Super comfortable room. Cozy. Warm. Clean! The host, very polite. Saw him when I went and then when I left. The only thing is the restroom is outside of apt. But it is private. Convenient location. Perfect price. Thanks so much!

Luiz,gracias por tu recibimiento.
Pero a pesar de tu maravilloso recibimiento y la situación tan buena del apartamento, hay que decir,que al menos para la gente que tenemos algunos años más, es muy incómodo. 
El wc,no es que este , fuera al fondo del pasillo, es que no se coge de pequeño. 
El baño igual . mínimo. 
Y subirse al altillo de la cama o bajarse en plena noche,tiene su miga.
Habria que arreglar,la ducha,pues andas buscando por donde saldrá el agua, para poder ducharte.
Todo esto o adecuar un poco el precio a lo que se ofrece.
De todas formas, gracias de nuevo por tu amabilidad.

The apartement was awesome. The room was very large and confortable and everything was very clean. Luiz was very kind. The only problem is that the toilet is outside the apartement, so you always need to go out. It is very well connected to the rest of the city with the bus or the subway. I strongly recommend it!
I really recommend staying here! The Location is hard to beat and the room is clean and spaceous... Luiz was always reachable and made everything to ensure a nice stay! Anytime again!

Luiz's apartment is awesome! It's very clean and cozy. I felt like home! The location is very good as well. It's close to the subway, restaurants, 5minutes walk from the Time Square. Luiz is a very friendly person as well. It was very nice to meet him and have stayed in his place.

Thanks for the perfect stay. Cleber offered excellent communication prior to arrival. The room was exactly as described. It was easy to find and really easy to negotiate my way there from JFK using the subway for just 7$. The room and apartment was very clean and the bed was incredibly comfortable. Your sheets are the comfiest I have ever slept in !!  The location is perfect for access to the whole of the city. Thanks for a great stay and I hope to come back !! I would not hesitate to recommend this apartment.  Thanks.
Definitely the best location. The apartment is very clean and cozy. Luiz received me with attention and he is a great person. My first experience with airbnb was excellent.

Tuve una muy buena experiencia aquí. El cuarto es amplio y todo estaba muy limpio. Al principio dudé en escoger esta opción por lo de compartir el apartamento con una persona desconocida y el toilet afuera, pero los buenos reviews y el precio me convencieron. A la final el toilet afuera no fue gran inconveniente y casi ni vi a la otra persona. Definitivamente me quedaría de nuevo aquí si tengo la oportunidad de volver a nyc. Cleber es una persona simpática y muy amable.

I already miss New York! I had a really great time and a big factor to that is Luiz's place. I've stayed there for 6 nights and I'm really glad I did. The room is clean and cozy. There is a huge amount of space to place your things. The shower is inside the apartment, however, the toilet is a few steps outside. But hey, you can't really compare that to the convenience that the place will give you. Luiz's apartment is close to a lot of must see places in NY and to the subway & bus stations too! There's a lot of restaurants and cafes nearby as well. And the most important of all, Luiz is a great host and very accommodating. I will definitely stay at this room again when I go back to New York!
Very good location to travel in the city! The room is spacious, clean and surprisingly quiet in the night. Would strongly recommend to friends whoever need to travel to NYC.

A great place for a stay.Definitely.
Luiz is very welcoming.
The room is excactly as described  ( spatious , comfortable bed and very quiet ).
The flat is very clean, nice , with equipments.
The location is excellent ( very central,Times Square is close, and many subways to move everywhere through the city ). There are some shops very close to get some food,and a nice flea market on the week-ends.
I highly recommend that place for a stay in NYC

I had a great stay at New York and Luiz's place! Luiz place is just awesome, which is near to time square and Broadway! I can walk back home after I watched phantom of the opera! And I love the room so much! It's spacious and its great for girl like me who had a lot of stuffs! The bed which is upstairs is super comfortable! And you have a kitchen and bedroom just next to your room. Toilet is out of the room but it's ok for me~ everything was fine and I really enjoy the stay!

The trip which lived in Luiz's place is wonderful. I like the bedroom design and the bathroom is a little small but already enough for me. The best thing is the location is great and that helped me to save a lot of times. Overall, I like it.

luiz war ein sehr netter host, obwohl ich später ankam als erwartet,war er in wenigen Minuten nach meinem Anruf da.Das Zimmer war sehr süss und das Appartment zweckmässig. Das einzig mühsame war, dass das Wc nicht im Appartment selber war. Sonst war ich zufrieden.

Luis was an excellent host, and went out of his way to accommodate my schedule.  The apartment was exactly as depicted. The loft bed was comfortavle, and the place was clean, tidy, and quiet. Air conditioner was a plus.
Luis was a great and considerate host! Very caring and hospitable
The apartment is comfortable and the neighbourhood is safe and nice.

La estadia en la lo de Luiz fue magnifico! aunque Luiz por asuntos personales no pudo estar, siempre estuvo atento por mails y su amigo Marco que es muy amable me guio en todo momento! El lugar espectacular! queda todo cerca y con el subte te podes mover tranquilamente!

Luiz made me feel welcome right away. I loved the room, it was clean and just like on the pictures.  The location is convenient, close to Times Square and other main attractions in New York.  I felt safe and comfortable.  Would book it again ;)

This location was better than described! It was really was the perfect location for EVERYTHING that I needed. My stay was over a week, and it really felt like my own little apartment. I oriented very quickly and felt like a New Yorker.  Luiz is such a perfect host. Very accommodating and kind. He was there if you needed something but left you be otherwise. I will definitely stay here EVERY time I'm in nyc. 3
Excelente anfitrión. El departamento muy bien ubicado, en el centro de Manhattan. Muy fácil desplazarse desde Port Authority hasta cualquier punto. Lo recomiendo a quienes vayan por primera vez a NY.

Cleber foi incrivelmente simpático e acolhedor. O quarto no qual fiquei supriu todas as minhas necessidades, além do apartamento está super bem localizado. Me senti a vontade do primeiro momento até o final. Super recomendo e espero voltar sempre!
Nice apartment, great location :)
I enjoyed my time at Luiz's place. The pictures were accurate (the couch has been replaced with a newer one). Great location!
Luiz was a fantastic host. Very welcoming and Also helped me out on my last night in NYC.I hope to stay there again sometime in the future.location was perfect

Luiz is an awesome host!! He stayed in contact with me before my stay and throughout.  He helped me out on my last day, and is a really genuinely nice guy.  The apartment is adorable, and the loft bed was so much fun!  It was so close to Times Square, but very quiet so I could get a good night's sleep.  This was my first ever trip to NYC, and this place was the perfect location.  I did not ever feel unsafe, and the apartment is secure.  I will definitely stay here again!!

Was a awesome stay in the city. The location is truly amazing and very safe area. It was very clean and at a awesome price point. Was down in the city for photo expo and it was just about a 5 min walk away from the Jarvis center.
The host canceled this reservation 53 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

La situación del apartamento es muy buena, muy centrico, en cuanto a la habitación no era lo que esperaba en cuanto a calidad precio, entiendo que era la maratón.
El inodoro esta fuera del apartamento en el pasillo compartido y apenas te puedes sentar, la ducha y el lavabo están dentro.
El primer dia no había agua caliente ni calefacción, al dia siguiente estaba solucionado, ok, pero cuando funcionaba la calefacción las tuberias hacían mucho ruido.
No hay armario para colgar la ropa, hay un mueble con cajones.

Cleber is a very nice guy , flexible and let you feel welcome , the condo is very clean and the bad is comfortable ,location is excellent ! Close to time square and subways stations .
I have spent 6 days in NY and I had no problem staying in Claber's condo.
Thanks Cleber !
I hope to stay at your place again next time I came to NY
Best location! Súper clean and cozy. The apartment has everything you need! Thank you Luiz!!!

I had a great week at Luiz's apartment. I was in town for work and it was exactly where I needed it to be (short walk to Javits) at a great price. The room was large, the apartment as a whole impeccably clean, and very comfortable. Luiz was great to deal with, very communicative and flexible. I would highly recommend this for anyone looking for a good deal.

Great stay in fantastic, central location.  Luiz was great and kept in regular contact, clear instructions made getting from the airport to and from the apartment a breeze via subway, and perfect location to base yourself for all the sights and sounds NY has to offer. The mezzanine bed meant the room was spacious with lots of room to spread out bags etc. Bathroom/shower/toilet setup is a bit unusual, but totally workable - given the price, and location, it's a small inconvenience in the scheme of things! As solo female traveller, safety & security always a consideration but happy to report no probs at all. Thanks Luiz for a great stay!

Luiz is such a great host and the room is very comfortable.  
And the location is near the metro station that u can transfer to any sightseeing  spot eazliy. 
If I visit NYC next time I'll choose to rent the room again!
^++++++++++++^ bbbbbbbbbbbbb

Luiz was a pleasure to deal with from the moment of booking all the way through to leaving the apartment. He wasn't living onsite at the time, but was there to greet me and show me all the facilities. He is very easy to contact. Sharing the apartment with another traveller is no hassle and you have great privacy. The shower and basin are inside the apartment, and the toilet is only a few steps out on the hallway and is your apartments exclusive use. Don't let this put you off, it's really fine ( and I am usually very fussy). The apartment is spotless, and the room I booked was plenty big enough for me, and my luggage and to be able to do some work the as well. It took me around 10 mins to walk to the Javits centre for a convention, and it's about the same to the middle of Time Square. There are a ton of great places to eat right on your doorstep, and I highly recommend Scallywags the Irish pub next door for a drink and to meet some awesome people. This Partmemt is such a good price  brilliant location, and for the money, hard to beat.

Everything was awesome! Best Location in the Heart of Manhattan, Subway, pups and Restaurants all in the neighbourhood. Perfect to Discover Manhattan and have a Break before you go on. Cozy, clean Appartement. I recommend this to everyone. If you got the chance- go and get it. I loved this neighbourhood and will definitly go back there. Luiz Is a very good Host, he's friendly and if you got a question he will do his best to answer it. Thanks for everything luiz!

This room is exactly the same as described and pictured. Everything you need is provided, small but cozy and warm. The raised bed makes the room spacious. TV programs look awesome and WiFi connection is stable and fast. Bathroom is just next door, with shampoo and body wash. Although the toilet is not in the room, it is just a few meters away and private. It's not a problem at all. This location is great for people who want to explore the city in the day and night because it's quite central and has good public transport connection. There are many doors on the way to the room so I think it's very safe. Luiz is warm-hearted and always responses to your question. He is also caring the feeling of the people staying here and tries to do his best to be a great host. Thank you Luiz. I had a wonderful staying in NYC.

I stayed for 2 weeks in Luiz's place and it was a great experience. The location is perfect, everything is just few blocks away and there's a lot of good options to eat in the same street. The room is spacious and since the bed is on the upper level you got plenty of space to put your stuff. The external toilet is a bit weird but you get used to it and I never met with other people in the hallway. Overall it was a good experience and Luiz was available every time I needed him.

Luiz is quick to response.
The location is super convenient. 
The room is clean and well coordinated.
I will come back again!

Everything was excellent. The place was cozy, nice little kitchen. The bed is loft style, above the couch, and there is a large screen with movies etc...available above the bed. The toilet is outside the apt and down the hall. It was convenient and easy to stay there.mthanks Luiz and Marco!

I recommend this apartment!  Great location, clean, and all the space you need for a stay in NYC for a fair low price. Hosts kept in touch with me, met me when I arrived, and even carried my heavy bag up the stairs. They alerted me that the other tenant was arriving so I would know and not be alarmed. I felt safe, and the bathroom being outside and down the hallway did not bother me at all.  I will definitely rent from Luis again!

Luiz is friendly and helpful.

The bedroom is clean and cozy. Restroom and shower room are clean too, but kind of small. 

The price is good. 

The location is very convenient.

This was a good room at a very good location. Time Square was in walking distance and one would never get bored here. The apartment was in an old building but I got used to it very quickly. Luiz had kept the room and the toilet in super-clean condition. During my four nights here, there was no noise at all. Luiz was a very good host and answered all my questions and needs. I really would like to stay here again if I ever come back to Manhattan!

The room was exactly as described.  A great location in Hell's Kitchen.  A comfortable bed, and great kitchen facilities.  I really appreciated Luiz's care at providing a great room, meeting me and showing me the ropes.

I loved staying here and hope to stay here again. I just sent a friend a link to this page because I recommended this place to him and now he wants to stay here too. 

The location was within a 15 minute walk of every Broadway show I booked. The price is amazing (about 1/3 of what my friend paid at a hotel one block away). 

I didn't meet Luiz, but his place was clean and comfortable. I did meet Marcio who showed me around and was very helpful. I wish I had asked all my questions while Marcio was there (I had a little trouble finding towels, shampoo, where to take the trash out once I was on my own). I believe usually Luiz would be very easy to reach, but he had an illness while I was a guest so I didn't get all my questions answered as quickly as I would have if he had been well. 

Now I'll be mentioning some things that I didn't mind, but I feel if I had certain friends with me--they wouldn't have liked these elements. I thought it gave me a real experience of NYC as a local. I wasn't sheltered from the real NYC in a touristy hotel. 

1) Twice in the mornings, I had to knock on the front door of the building from the inside to get out because of inebriated gentlemen sitting on the steps. They were kind men who moved when I knocked, but I could see how some might find this disconcerting. 

2) There is construction right outside the windows of the larger bedroom ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) ). Construction is supposed to happen 8a-4p, but it started earlier while I was there. I didn't mind as I'm an early riser but some people might. 

3) The bathing room is tiny and right off the kitchen. If you're inside it with the door shut, it's a bit challenging to robe/disrobe and the water temperature wasn't consistent in the mornings (when I assume the other residents are also showering). 

AirBnB commercials aren't kidding when they say you'll live like a local. I loved it. 

If Luiz is open to it, I'd be interesting in renting both bedrooms next time. I'd have a friend stay with me and it wouldn't be as awkward to use the bathing room. I could walk from my bedroom to the bathing room in a towel or underwear and not have to change in the cramped space of the bathing room. Walking from room to room in a towel/underwear can be awkward if you don't know the person staying in the other bedroom. 

I don't find the above things negative, but I think those who might find them negative would want to know about them. 

Luiz was generous and kind when I asked to check out later. It worked out that he didn't have another renter right away. Thanks, Luiz, for making your place available. I enjoyed staying there and hope to again.

Luiz is a great host, very responsive, friendly and helpful. The room and apartment is as described and the location is very good for tourists or even business travelers, as it is right in the heart of Manhattan. Definitely a recommendation!
Luiz place was nice and clean!

Situation très centrale. Grande chambre claire et plutôt calme pour New York. Propreté parfaite. 
La climatisation est trop bruyante pour être laissée en fonctionnement durant la nuit, mais elle est efficace en cinq minutes.
It's a very lovely and comfortable room. Also very safe and quite. Walk to Time Square only need 5mins. I love it!

The area,  the location, the hospitality and the way the apartment was presented. Very neat and very tidy with everything you need to accommodate your stay. To top it off it is located in a very accessible area and has a very helpful host.

Best location!.. In the heart of time square and Madison square garden. Room was quiet and I slept well every night. Tv has movie channels which was awesome at the end of the day while resting after a tour in the city. Wifi was available so I was able to upload NYC pics immediately thru (Hidden by Airbnb) and IG. I would definitely book to this place again when I return to NY!

Luiz's place was perfect for my short 2 day stay in NYC, being my first time in the city it was great to have transportation and times square in such close proximity. Everything was extremely clean and tidy, and I was always comfortable in the unit. The washroom was a little different being outside the unit but it wasn't a problem at all. I would definitely stay here again and recommend friends to stay as well.

Great location and perfect for sightseeing on foot; I rarely got the metro in the 5 days I stayed. The room was surprisingly spacious and the bed was super comfy. Luiz was very friendly and welcomed me when I arrived.  Would highly recommend!

Everything was great and as expected. Especially for the price. Luis was very accommodating and patient as he waited for me to get to the place late at night. Will definitely use again when I am in town.

The apartment is kind of small, but it has an excellent location. In the neighborhood there are lots of bars, restaurants, stores and almost in front of the apartments there is a supermarket. 

It has a kitchen, refrigerator and microwave. All the tools for cooking, also some tools as screwdriver and a hair dryer.

It's very close from Times Square, Fifth Avenue and other touristic places such as Broadway, Central Park, Madison Square Garden, Empire State Building. You could went to this places walking from the apartment.

In the future, I will stay there again.
good location

The apartment was exactly as shown on the pictures: clean and tidy. The bed is super comfortable and cozy. Internet was reliable and fast. Neighborhood is safe and close to Broadway theaters, subway stations that can get you to anywhere in Manhattan and walking distance to Times Square.

I would recommend the place to other guests. I didn't get to meet Luiz but he was always available via Airbnb.

Room was quite spacious, cozy and tidy!! Bathroom and toilets are tiny but I find it quite an interesting experience to use. 

Location is convinient but there is construction work right outside the room while I was here.

The location of the apartment is really exceptional! The bedroom with the orange wall has an excellent size and a great bed. Also, it's definitely not loud, considering that you're in the middle of Manhattan.

On the other hand, I had problems with the heating's system and with the hot water (fault of the boiler of the building), which made it impossible for me to take some showers and made me feel very cold on some nights (the temperature was -15 ° C in NY and I only had 2 blankets available, so I had to sleep with my snow clothes), and with the lock of the house, which broke - because of that, I had to stay until 1 am involved in the repair, because the owner of the property was not in the city, just like the person he had indicated to be responsible. I also would say that the bathroom is uncomfortably small.

Despite this, the cost benefit pays off if you are going to spend a few nights close to everything and do not mind overcoming some uncomfortable mishaps.
Ótima localização, dormitório confortável, bairro tranquilo. O banheiro é pequeno, mas não chega a atrapalhar a estadia, minha experiência foi muito boa e recomendo a quem quiser passar uns dias.
Very nice loft, really cozy and confortable. Good position in silent quartier. Wi-Fi too slow and wc really too little ( at about 5mt from apt.).
Close to time square, bars and restuarants

High quality space for budget traveler.  Clean and well cared for place and great location.  Platform bed and small shower and small privaye hall toilet were not a problem for me at all
Great value for someone like me. Who wants clean and private place to stay wirhout breaking the bank.

Incredibly well priced location that is super close to the Javit's convention center. Lots of restaurants nearby and very convenient. Loved the trip and works well for single traveler looking to save some money. 
His small apartment is remarkably well stocked and he has thought of all things a business traveler might need like an iron / toiletries / internet etc. The check in / ot was simple as well.

Luiz is very nice. Thank you for the apt. the bathroom and toilet is a little small, but it have everything you need.  the location is wonderful, you can walk to many theatre only 10 minutes, don't need take subway. there are two bedroom, only you and another guest. the bed is very very comfortable.  If I come back to NYC, I hope can stay here again.

Luiz's place is a good choice if you want to be close to Times Square, but don't want the noise. The room is a perfect size for one or two travellers, and located in a quiet building. The shower room and bathroom are very small, but worked just fine. The bed was clean and comfortable. Luiz provided a towel, extra blankets and an umbrella just in case. Overall, I would recommend this place for someone not concerned about luxury, but interested in an authentic budget stay close to lots of sights.
wonderful, quite, well positioned place.

I visited New York to see Billy Joel in concert and needed a place to stay that wasn't too far from Madison Square Garden.  Luiz's place fit everything I was looking for.

I was to check in earlier, but there were problems with my initial flight from Chicago to New York.  I arrived later than expected, about midnight ET, and kept Luiz knowing where I was after my flight landed.  I arrived at his place at 1 AM ET, and Luiz still met me, asked how I was doing, and gave the keys.  He was nice and patient with me the entire time.

His place is as the pictures describe.  A room with a loft bed and small couch underneath it.  There are a lot of restaurants nearby, so you will not go hungry.  The subway is very close, with the 42nd Street-Port Authority station a few blocks up the road.  Times Square is nearly along with Madison Square Garden and the Empire State Building.

I would definitely stay at his place again if the opportunity presented itself.
This room couldn't better! I've felt cozy during my stay. I'll recommand others who wanna find good place to bnb.
Tutto ok,preciso,puntuale,gentile,consigliò vivamente
Everything was good! The location is perfect!
Great location, excellent friendly host, efficient communicator. As mentioned in other reviews the facilities are small but clean and all that is required for me.
Well located place to get to know the city. Great attention from the host.
Luiz was very pleasant and welcoming. I loved the room, it was clean and the bed was amazing. I would definitely come back.

This place was just as advertised, It was central to everywhere I wanted to be. Perfect for those who are just needing a place to crash in the evenings and get ready in the mornings. The bathroom is small, but large mirrors are provided in the room which was super helpful for getting ready in the morning. Absolutely a great value, and you get to live like a local!
Echt een aanrader. Prima matras. Dichtbij busstation. Douche en w.c. Inderdaad wat krap, maar prima te doen.

I had a wonderful stay at Luiz's!  Everything is as was described.  Centrally located, very quiet, clean... exactly what I needed!  I was surprised by how spacious the room was.  The loft bed really contributes to the feeling of having a nice sized room.  I am beyond pleased with my stay.  I would absolutely stay here again.  Thank you, Luiz!

I stayed here during a recent business trip to NYC. I prioritized location and price over other amenities. This apartment is close to Times Square and all of Midtown, making it convenient for my business trip. It's awkward to have the toilet down the hall, but the place is clean and quiet.
Such a great little apartment in the middle of everything! The place was small, but an excellent home base to get out and explore. The host was also very friendly and responsive.

Absolutely loved the location and my room. The bed was super comfortable and it felt like I was at home. I felt like a real New Yorker which made the trip that much better. I would definitely stay with Luiz again!

This airbnb has a very good location with many public transportation around, so you can get anywhere really quick. Bathroom was very small and a little bit smelly (no windows). The bed was very comfortable, but if you have a light sleep like I do, there are a few things you should be aware of: You can hear everything though the wall (there is another airbnb roommate in the apartment, who you share the bathroom and toilet with). The neighborhood is very busy on weekend nights, you can hear cars, music etc. There is a huge construction site right outside the room, and they start to work early in the morning on weekdays. 
Communication with Luiz was all ok, though he was not there when I checked in but his friend Carol, who was also very responsive thoughout the stay. All in all ok for a short stay.
The place is a much more affordable option than a hotel. The area is much more interesting than staying in midtown. It was a real comfortable & clean place to stay.
Everything worked out perfectly, Luiz is a great, flexible host and very welcoming! Good neighbourhood to explore NYC!

Great space in a great area. Close to so many places you want to visit! The toilet for this apartment is in the hall and is small. I had no difficulties and never saw anyone in the hallway. The bed was super comfy. It is a loft bed so make sure you can get up a ladder.
Great place! Great location. Great host! A nice clean apartment. True to pictures. Thanks Luiz. Definitely recommend! 😊
Communication from Luiz was quick and clear. The apartment, while small, was clean and well-equipped.
Great location. Room is pretty and clean. Bathroom is outside of the appartment, and shared with the guest from the other room.

Placed in a very central location, the apartment is cozy, clean and well equipped.
Only con: the bathroom and the toilet room (5 mt from the apartment, in the aisle) are both small, but serve their purpose.
It's close to Times Square, and bed  was so comfortable.
Right next to Time Square and loads of eating options all around. Good place to stay.

This place was perfect for me as I wanted to be in Manhattan for a nearby event. Luiz's place is very clean and the pictures are accurate. A small thing in the building was fixed and remedied right away when brought to Luiz's attention. I would recommend!
Perfect location, excellent host, great experience!
I booked the property for my traveling friend, he said that the place was clean, well maintained, and Luiz was extremely helpful and friendly. Would recommend to others!

저는 Luiz씨가 제공하는 두 방에서 모두 묵었어요. 화장실은 밖에 있고 욕실은 나눠서 써야해서 불편한 점은 있지만 그래도 괜찮았어요. 일단 위치가 포트 오소리티와 타임스퀘어 등과 매우 근처에 있어서 좋았구요. 웬만한 여행지 돌아다닐 때는 밤에 걸어서 집에 오고 그랬어요. 41번가인가에 merci market이라고 한국인 아저씨께서 하시는 마트가 있는데 거기에서 물이나 먹을 것 사서 먹고 그래서 먹고 자고 이동하는 데에는 하등 불편한 게 없었어요. 긁릵곩 이걵 핝국읹붅께만 말씀들릴게 있어서 잃럻겛 쓿겛욣. 쭈읹붅이 쬼 까탌쓻럽고 여쟈를 죰 뱕희는겄같아욥. 옂쟞분들이 묵으쓀떄는 죰 조싐하쒜요!
It's a really nice cosy private place. I enjoyed living here.
A great location and price! Luiz was accommodating and the place was nice. It is an old building so the bathroom and shower are small spaces.

I had absolutely no problem communicating with Luiz throughout my trip in NY! He was really nice and considerate. The apartment was accurate as the online pictures show. The only problem for me is that both the bathroom and the shared toilet are pretty small.

I had a great stay with Luiz.  In the heart of Hell's Kitchen so it is great for walking to many of the key sites.  Great A/C and secure building.  The area is noisy but it is also the heart of NYC so it is to be expected.  Thanks Luiz
Had a great time. It was as described and clean.

Awesome apartment in a centered location. 
Very well designed, nice and cool during humid days.
Luiz previred everything I need and was very kind and responsieve.
Thank you Luiz!

This is a nice place to sleep. The bed is really comfy, though it is loft style. Be aware that the bathroom is down the hall and you need a key (which is provided). The shower is in the apartment but is very tight and has a tiny sink. The best part about this apartment is the location. Very close to everything and the subway is just a few blocks away.

Luiz is an amazing person, I had easy contact with him from check in to check out. Great location in NY, close to public transport and Time Square, I did many things only on foot due to great location. I recommend it for sure.

Luiz was the best and allowed me to do an early check in. The apartment is in a great location close to everything.. the tiolet is out in the hall but it's not bad at all. I loved my room and experience at this location.

Luiz's place is really well located and really worth it for the price you're paying. 

The room is big. It was a sofa-bed on which I was able to work. The mattress and pillows are really, really good which made me sleep really well. The internet is also good, which made my work really smooth.

Only thing that I didn't expect was that the bathroom and toilet are really small, but I ignored that because of the price I was paying.

Luis is an awesome host. He helped me check in and answered all my questions. I'm definitely staying at his place again when I come back to NYC.

Luiz place is exactly as described in the photos, it might be weird or uncomfortable for some the fact that the toilet is outside of the apartment and the bathroom is really small but it's totally understandable for NYC-like spaces. The place was clean and bed was very comfortable, great location. Good deal for travelers looking for a place to crash after exploring NYC.
All good :)
Very kind. It is a suitable place for New York for the first time

Luiz' place was super close to all the action of NYC, the place was clean, I stayed in the bunk room and it was really big and the air con was great. Awesome value for money and I'd definitely stay again!
Die  Wohnung von Luiz ist eine prima Alternative zu den teuren Hotels in der Stadt. Darüber hinaus bekommt man auch mal einen Eindruck, wie die typischen Wohnverhältnisse in New York City sind.

Note: This review is for the room with the bunk-style bed.

I was pleasantly surprised by how wonderful my stay here at Luiz's place was. The room is a standard small room for NY but it felt so much bigger because the bed was not in the way. Since it is raised above, there was more space to maneuver and relax! I loved this feature the most because I could set up my laptop station at the sofa area under the bed which had a height clearance of probably 6' (maybe less)? I'm 5'3" so I was able to walk under the bunk area just fine.

Getting to the bed area was fine for me, but you will have to be very careful in watching where you step. There's not much to hold on to except for the railing of the bunk ladder and the side of the bed. Once there though, it is fantastic. The mattress was soft yet firm enough to offer plenty of back support. The sheets were soft and clean. There's a lamp next to the mattress for added light in the dark. Then the best part is the tv that is stationed right in front of you with so many channels to choose from a Roku system that is connected to the apartment's Netflix account (and a few others too).

Your sleep will be sound here! Of all the nights I stayed here in this room, I barely heard any outside noise! Usually the nightlife of NY is loud, especially in the bustling streets of Times Square! So I was rather surprised how quiet it was here despite the fantastic location. I think it was that the room's window was turned away from the streets, and the room is on the second floor of the building.

For those who make bathroom visits in the middle of the night, it may be a bit inconvenient as the toilet is actually outside the apartment in the hallway behind a locked door. So you'll have to climb down the bunkbed, remember to grab the keys, put shoes on, go out of the apartment and down the hall, and unlock the door to the toilet room. This didn't bother me much though, considering how lovely the rest of the stay is.

Right outside the apartment are so many convenient shops and lots of restaurants to choose from. I defaulted to the korean fried chicken joint during nights when I was too lazy to go on food adventures after a long day out. A couple blocks from Port Authority, this place was so easy to find when coming in from the airport. The reason of my stay here was for a convention at Javits so this place was the perfect location as it was a mere few blocks away from the convention center as well.

I definitely recommend staying here if you can. The stay was great and Luiz is a very kind, gracious host.

The best location and great host! You are 10min (aprox) walking distance from Times Square, and close to many of NY main attractions. A couple of things: The bed was on top of a small set of stairs, so it might not be very accessible for some people. The toilet is outside of the apartment and very small (the shower is inside the apartment though). If you are ok with these two things, then you'll have a great time. 

Everything else was as described so I would definitely recommend it.
Luiz was a great host! The only thing that kept me from giving the fifth star was the bathroom being in the hallway and the shower being a little bit small. All in all it was a great experience!

This was a great location, only 6 minute walk from Port Authority/Subway, with some nice dining options within a block or two. The apartment was small but very clean with super soft sheets and a very comfortable bed. The bathroom in the hall (outside of the apartment) wasn't ideal but it worked out. My only complaint was the construction going on at daylight on Saturday right next door. If you are an early riser, not a problem but if you like sleeping in, it's hard to do when the jack hammers get going. There were no workers on Sunday so it was quiet. Overall, I would stay again.
It was a great experience. The place was clean and bed was very comfortable. And great location, close to Time Square and all of Midtown. I did many things only on foot. I would like stay again.

Absolutely fabulous, very close to time sq and theatre district, easy to find, and easy to navigate away from here. A perfect host with great communication, very accommodating when my flight was delayed and I had to miss a night. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

1人で泊まれるのかと思っていたら寝室が2つあり、他の人とリビング・バスルーム・トイレが共通でした。(部屋説明の訳し方をこちらが間違ってしまったようです。)
写真に出ている部屋は広くて快適でしたが、チェックインの際にもう1つの、写真に載ってない狭い寝室を指示されたのが少し気になりました。(交渉の結果広い部屋を使えるようになりましたが…。)

Absolute perfect location, minutes away from fabulous restaurants, Times Square and central for getting around. I was nervous about sharing with a stranger - however having bedroom locks was added security. The loft bed was so comfortable, linen beautifully laundered including the towel. Spotlessly clean and suprisingly large space in the room. 
I felt like I was constantly asking Luiz questions however he promptly replied patiently to each. Would highly recommend staying here and a bargain for the price and location.

Luiz place is always amazing.  I always feel right at home.   It has everything you need.  So close to everything, trains, bus's and on the doorstep of Times Square!   My second time in NY and both at Luiz.   I would stay there again in a heart beat !!   Thanks Luiz !!
This place was perfect. Close to the subway, Hell’s Kitchen, Time Square. I had a great time. Would highly recommend it and would definitely book again

Great place to stay near Time Square!
The apartment is kind of small with toilet in the hallway, but it's so convenient to go everywhere and hangout late!
Great experience!
Great location. Great hosts. Great space. Thank you, Luiz and Tony!
Nice spot really close to Times Square and mass transit.

Really good location close to time square. The neighbourhood felt safe. There was some noise from construction work outside my bedroom window but it didn’t bother me much. The room was big and spacious and the bed was comfortable. Over all a pretty good place to stay. And Luiz was a very nice host :)
Good place to stay on a budget
Loved the location of this apartment! Super close to Times Square and the subway lines. The pizza place two blocks up was amazing and really cheap!

Location is central to the city and near to night life. If you are planning to spend most of the time in midtown, this is a great place to stay. I found it slightly pricey (but it may be midtown standard). Bathroom is very small in size and to access the toilet you need to go to hallway (outside apartment). The toilet is also very small and you need to unlock and lock it back when you use it. It is unconvineint but not a deal breaker.
Luis’s place was perfectly located, clean, well maintained and overall a perfect place for a couple of days’ stay. Highly recommended!
Luiz and his place are great. Would always come back :)
This was my second stay at Luiz’s place. It was a clean and quiet room and a good bet for an authentic apartment close to Times Square.

Although I didn't meet Luiz, I met his friend Tony who was helpful and available via text should I have any queries or concerns. As some other reviewers mentioned, neither Luiz nor Tony stay at the apartment, only the guests do.
The room is pretty spacious and clean, and they also provided towels for my stay, which I think was a nice touch. The kitchen is a decent size and clean, plus having access to its amenities makes any trip cheaper.
The bathroom is really small and the water pressure for the shower is a bit low, so if you have long hair like me you might be in there for a while. Also pointed out in the room posting is the fact that the toilet is outside the apartment, which can be inconvenient. But it was clean, although a bit cramped.
The location of the apartment is very good and I was able to walk pretty much anywhere in Midtown or just get the Subway two blocks away.
If you're travelling by yourself and don't mind the toilet issue, I'd say this place is ideal. I'd stay there again if ever back in NYC.
