On arrival Xiaomin greeted me and certainly made me feel very welcome.  He showed me my room and explained that Mark was working.  The apartment block is very old and modest so don't have high expectations.  If you are after ultra modern comfort then this is not the room for you.
The room I had was tiny, as was the whole apartment, and although there is a window there is no natural light.  I think the double room is brighter. This was a little disconcerting but I quickly adapted to the surroundings.  I found the bed very  comfortable.  There is a very pleasant outdoor area available for guests.
When I met Mark that evening he was also very friendly and hospitable.  As my stay progressed the relationship became more friendly and we had some very pleasant chats.  Thanks for that Mark.
The position is fantastic, 100 meters from the subway and right at Times Square.  I was keen to see as many Broadway shows as possible during my stay and I did this with just a short walk "home" afterwards among all the hoards of people.  I never ever felt unsafe.
I used the accommodation solely as sleeping quarters and suited me perfectly for my needs.
There are numerous restaurants and bars in the area plus all the theatres.  The TKTS booth is an eight minute walk away.  Penn Station is one stop away and the Port Authority Bus Station 2 minutes walk.

We had delayed because of tranporting to the city. When we arrived in Mark& Xiao's apartment they were waiting for us. There was nothing about delaying.  Mark gave us some information about our room and breakfast.
Mark & Xiao were great hosts and friendly and helpful. Mark gave us many information and recommendations almost everymorning in their lovely courtyard while we had delicious coffees.
The apartment is a great location, so close to Times Square, the subway, the Port Authority bus terminal and to almost everywhere in Manhattan. Our room is smaller than we looked at on photos but is a sufficiently convenient and very clean. The courtyard was so beautiful and it was surprising to find in the middle of Manhattan like this very quietly place. Wi fi was powerful in the apartment everywhere.
The district is very safe and there are a lot of nice restaurants , bars , coffees and theatres.
Mark  & Xiao made us feel like staying our home.

Thank you for everything Mark & Xiao !!
Première expérience airbnb réussie. La chambre est idéalement située tout près de Times square ainsi que du métro.  Les hôtes sont très accueillant et nous mettent à l'aise.
Welcoming, nice, interesting couple. Great location. Amazingly quiet, being so close to Times Square and 42nd street. Nice patio to enjoy in the warmer months. Great public transportation close by.

Mark and Xiao were phenomenal hosts! They made us feel welcome in their home and were extremely friendly to us at all times throughout our stay. They were both very compassionate and understanding individuals, especially when it came to my Tourette’s. The room was a bit smaller than I had expected, but that’s just a personal observation and wasn’t an issue at all. The bed was comfortable, the room was cozy, and the neighborhood was great — right near an awesome vegan place that my girlfriend and I both loved! I just want to add that as a New Yorker myself, I felt that people in Manhattan are generally not as friendly as people elsewhere, such as in Providence and Boston. However, Mark and Xiao were an incredible exception to that rule. They are genuinely caring and all-around amazing people, and I would definitely book again if my girlfriend and I come back! Thanks Mark and Xiao!

Mark and Xiao were very helpful and supportive during my stay (3 nights). It was the first time for airbnb and they made me impress and confident on using the website!! I recommend everyone who is looking for NY accommodation to stay here!! Not only is this place super convenient but the host are also give a warm welcome. The only bad thing I could find is the space but this is TIME SQUARE NEW YORK!! The rest are as displayed in website. Nice and clean.

It is great staying with Mark and Xiao, there's lots of interaction and communication with them. The room is rather small but their apartment is conveniently located - the street corner subway entrance, 5 min walk to port authority bus terminal and less than 15 min walks to most broadway theatre. The neighbourhood is safe. The laundry room is useful for us.

Mark and Xiao were fantastic hosts during my vacation to NYC. They were both extremely friendly and welcoming throughout the trip, and went out of their way to make sure I had everything I needed. The apartment was beautiful, and very clean. Their chihuahua mix is very high energy and very friendly. When I was out of the apartment I could always contact them when I had questions. Their apartment is in a terrific location, especially if your plans involve the theater. I was able to walk everywhere I needed to go within minutes. 

Overall, Mark's ad covers all the information you need to know before booking them. The only surprise was that Mark and Xiao sometimes have massage clients come to the apartment during which they want to maintain privacy. However, they are very good about letting you know in advance when they need the apartment. 

This was my longest stay in an Air B'n'B apartment, and Mark and Xiao made it an excellent experience. I highly recommend them!

Excellent location. This place has everything you need to have an incredible time in NewYork. It is super clean with very nice upkeep. Mark and Xiao were very helpful.They tell us where delicious fun, can help us to answer all the questions, and they give us to prepare breakfast. Their dog is very cute, and we love him.We had a great time  and really enjoyed our stay here. We recommend to all, and hope to return some day.

Mark was a great host he made me feel very welcome upon arrival. The room is nice with lots of places to put your things. There was also space for me in the kitchen and bathroom.I loved the neighborhood it was away from the choas of time square but close enough that you could walk everywhere from the apartment, the transport links were idea. The street 9th half a block from the flat has tons and tons of cute restaurants, cafes, and bars. Also shops if you need anything like clothes of pharmacy. Staying at this flat in particular made my stay in new york so relaxed and adaptable. I definitely recommend it for anyone who wants to be in the center but be able to get anywhere in the city at short notice. Mark was very flexible with my schedule and it felt like staying in a home. I highly recommend them for your trip.

The apartment was great! Mark and Xiao were very interested and helpful when we needed tips or when we just wanted to chat. Their dog, Franco, is very cute and playful. They made us feel at home and gave us a tour of the beautifully designed apartment!

Très bonne semaine à NY chez Mark et Xiaomin. Excellent accueil de la part de nos hôtes. Nous nous sommes sentis comme à la maison. L appartement est très agréable et très bien situé, proche du métro. Mark et Xiaomin( et Franco bien sûr) sauront très bien vous accueillir! Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse!

Tres bonne adresse que nous recommandons! Nous avons passés mon ami et moi un très agréable moment chez eux et en leur compagnie. 
Super emplacement, appartement confortable. 
Mark et Xiao sont des personnes très très sympa, très accueillantes avec qui on discute facilement. 
Leur petit chien Franco est trop mignon et gentil comme tout. 
Bref on s'y sent bien

J'ai passé un séjour chez Mark et Xiao très agréable , ces deux hôtes sont accueillants et vraiment sympathiques , et  toujours disponibles . J'ai passé d'excellents moments en leur compagnie et de très bonnes soirées, mais je n'oublie pas le petit Francki que j'ADORE  . Je suis sûre que nous nous reverrons .
L'appartement est convivial , chaleureux , calme et très bien situé  dans Manhattan ,vous pouvez faire tout à pied.
JE VOUS RECOMMANDE CETTE RESERVATION - TOUT EST EXCEPTIONNEL . Merci à vous

Magnifique séjour à NYC chez Marc et Xiao. Ils sont charmants, accueillants et toujours prêts à se rendre utile. Leur appart est petit mais très cosy et meublé avec gout (on s'y sent bien d'emblée) et le jardin est extra (je pense qu'un jardin de cette taille est rare dans ce quartier). Idéalement situé à 5 min à pied de Time Square et donc de Broadway et de ses shows et de toutes les facilités de transport. Étonnamment calme pour la situation. Je recommande vivement.

Really great experience! Marc and Xiaomin (and their dog Franko)  are very good host.
The apartment is comfortable and pretty close to Time Square.

Mark and Xiao were fantastic hosts, super friendly and nice. Their place is cute and clean and very well located, right in the heart of midtown. My stay with them was perfect, I only wish I could have stayed more. Their dog, Franco, was the most adorable bonus! Totally would stay with them again and again!

The flat is beautiful and its location unbeatable. The bed is also nice. The indications were clear and Mark was always willing to help me. The garden is really a piece of heaven.  

However, if you go in hot season the AC is very noisy. One day my host woke me up at 10 to get something out of the room while I was sleeping. I did no appreciate this.

My husband and I spend 5 wonderful days in New York with Mark and Xiao. Their apartment is stylish and comfortable in the most convenient location we could imagine -- just blocks from theatre district and great restaurants, right on a metro line, and a comfortable walk to Central Park. Their deck garden is FABULOUS; and Mark and Xiao are delightful company and wonderful hosts along with their dog Franco. Looking forward to staying with them again the next time we visit New York.
Hospitable, easy-going, and friendly. Clean place, great location. Thank you!

Séjour très sympathique chez Mark et Xiao.
Très discret et de bon conseil
Je recommande

I really enjoyed my stay with mark and xiao. The location was ideal and very easy to get around to everywhere in Manhattan from. I especially loved their large garden area to sit in an zone out after a big day of sightseeing. Mark always made me coffee fresh for breakfast with fresh fruit and English muffins which was very convenient and a nice way to start the day. Much better than a hotel!

Mark was a hospitable host with a fantastic partner and friendly little dog once he gets to know you. I was not around much but Mark never failed to provide me with anything I asked and always had a clean well maintained house.

Had the best time at Mark and Xiou place. Very easy going and flexible hosts. So hospitable and their outdoor space was pure heaven. Felt we had dropped into Asia instead of NYC. Fab location. Amazing decor. Designer heaven! 
Can walk everywhere or Subway is at corner of their street. Great food and theatre nearby. Franco very cute too! Def will visit again. ..our no 1 recommended place to stay in Nyc.

We had an amazing time in NYC, a large part of that experience was due to our stay with Mark and Xiou. The apartment was located in a amazing neighborhood in NYC, close to times square, empire state, a lot of good restaurants and metro/bus. Hosts are very friendly and flexible. The room is quite small but was big enough for us with enough space to store your baggage. Outside space was nice to eat breakfast in or relax after a long day in New York. Would recommend and come again if i'm ever in New York again!

Très chaleureux accueil de Mark, Xiaomin et Franco.
Toujours à notre écoute et de bon conseil pour nos visites au sein de New York.
Une bonne compréhension du Francais nous a permis de bien dialoguer.
Bon petit déjeuner avec thé ou café, les meilleurs muffins des Etats Unis, beurre, fruit et yogourt ...
L'appartement est très bien situé à 2 pas de toutes commodités métro, times square ...
Nous recommandons vivement.

Super accueil de la part de Mark et Xiao, tous les 2 sont très sympathiques (sans oublier le petit chien Franco). Dommage que Mark soit parti en voyage le lendemain de notre arrivée, mais Xiao a été de bonne compagnie et toujours prévenant.
L'appartement est très bien situé à 5 mn du métro et de Times Square. La chambre est petite mais c'est suffisant pour dormir. Le lit est très confortable.
Le plus est le petit jardin, en plein cœur de New York c'est rare... Un petit havre de paix après une longue journée de marche au milieu de la foule. Ainsi que le petit déjeuner dans le jardin, vraiment très appréciable.
Nous sommes restées 6 nuits avec ma fille et nous sommes vraiment enchantées.
It is really Heaven in Hell's kitchen !

Mark and Xiaomin's hospitality was really warm! 
The announcement was absolutely truthful: 
the house and my room were both cute and clean; the deck garden was also beautiful, a perfect place to have breakfast or take a rest.
I heard Mark by email in the weeks before my arrival, he was helpful and kind to provide me with information about the house and the airport transfer.
At home there was Xiaomin to welcome me, along with the dog Franco, a nice big chihuahua; during the week we better knew each other. Xiaomin was very kind and helpful providing me with info on the subway; at the same time he was discreet and respectful of my space and my moments of rest and reading. He also prepared delicious breakfast each morning, a luxury for airbnb ... I think.

The location was... perfect, so central, in the heart of Mid Town, so close to Times Square...

I felt like at home,and I felt moved when I leaved Xiaomin last Monday. I hope we will stay in touch ...
For sure I will recommend Mark and Xiaomin's house to friends who intend to visit New York.

Appartement super bien situé tout près de Time Square.  Si on veut sortir des zones hyper touristiques,  on est a 2 pas d'un spot avec plein de bons restaurants.  On a trippé sur le jazz bar le Birdland et le resto The Marshall.

Mark and Xiao were so great! Their place is super close to Times Square (like seriously two blocks away) and their restaurant recommendations were on point. They were kind enough to leave me brochures next to my bed with ideas of things to do and even a subway map - although I mostly relied on (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps, to be honest. Also, providing breakfast was great and unexpected and very much appreciated (especially since I got to eat it on the fantastic back porch). Overall, they were really nice and always made me feel welcome and never like I was imposing. I would definitely recommend staying with them, as I would do it again in a heartbeat!

Mark's apartment is the perfect base to visit NY Manhattan. My wife and I enjoyed 5 days staying in the apartment and everything was so close and convenient. 

We met Mark a few days before leaving and he couldn't have been more helpful or welcoming while simultaneously giving us space to enjoy our holiday independently.

The apartment is well decorated with some lovely features as well as all the conveniences you would expect.

Highly recommended!
The apartment is in a great location and Mark was a friendly host.

Très bonne 1ere fois avec airb&b.  Mark était très sympathique et toujours prêt a nous aider. Il parle français ce qui nous a grandement facilité le voyage.
Le logement est très bien situé dans manathan.
Je recommande vivement un séjour chez Mark.

Ils sont vraiment sympa et disponible. Nous avons beaucoup discuté avec eux. Ils sont de bons conseils.
L'appartement est très bien situé.

Appartement très bien situé pour un séjour à NYC, hôtes très accueillants et disponibles. Appartement chaleureux et intimité respectée. Un grand merci pour cette première expérience. Je recommande et je reviendrais avec plaisir.

Mark and Xiao are very hospitable and warm-hearted.  They gave us tips regarding good restaurants and were always very helpful if we had questions. We also had some nice conversations with them. As the apartment is centrally located, we didn't  have to use the subway often. We slept very good, the bed was comfortable and there was no noise. The breakfast was very good too. It's a  cosy and clean apartment in which we felt comfortable. Franco the little dog is cute and friendly. All in all we really enjoyed our stay there and definitely recommend it to everyone!

The flat is so well located in the midtown area of NYC and it's really cozy and nice! Considering how central it was the room was incredibly quiet and the bed heaven comfy. The hosts are really nice and welcoming! I was really busy visiting the city so I didn't have much time to spend with them but the little bit I talked to them was very pleasant! Their dog is also adorable! Finally, something I found amazing is the shower had really good water pressure and a shower head that could be moved around. I highly recommend this place to anyone interested in staying in Manhattan.

Great apartment really close to times square on foot. Really close to subway station and bus station.
The flat is not very big but it is calm and very quite.
Mark and Xiao are very friendly and Mark speaks french..We don't forget Franco a very nice small dog!
We  clearlyrecommend this apartment

This is the perfect location for exploring the city with very close proximity to subways and bus stations! Mark and Xiao were very hospitable and little doggie Franco was a delight. Highly recommendable.

El departamento te brinda lo que ofrece (calidez, linda decoración, silencio, excelente ubicación y cercanía de medios de transporte y un sabroso desayuno). Es cómodo, con un lindo patio en donde puedes ver el cielo y disfrutar de sus plantas. Mark y Xiao fueron amables, y Franco una simpática y juguetona compañía. Debido a mis paseos cotidianos y a sus ocupaciones laborales no tuvimos muchas ocasiones para conversar, pero cuando fue necesario me ayudaron a resolver problemas. El edificio apaga la calefacción de noche, y puede hacer algo de frío, pero ellos me aportaron otra manta con lo que estuvo todo bien. Departamento muy recomendable.

Location location location! This was a great little stay right in the heart of it all. Suited myself and my son perfectly as we were our most days and needed somewheee safe and comfortable to rest our heads! Very happy with our Airbnb choice!
Mark and Xiao are very great. It’s been an amazing time and I surely recommend it to anyone who intends to stay for a short or long time

Sara's Park Slope home is the place to be should you be visiting NYC or the surrounding area. Stepping off the private elevator and into the brightly lit home brings a warmth to the bustling city. The spacious two-story home is well decorated, clean and has two outside areas to enjoy the sites and the sounds of the city. Our summer visit allowed us to enjoy the fresh garden where we started the day picking fresh berries and listening to the laughter of the children playing in the nearby park. Views of the Statue of Liberty and lower Manhattan skyline from this patio, took our breath away. 

The Park Slope neighborhood is vibrant day and night. A fresh market on the weekend allowed us to enjoy some neighborhood delicacies. However we cannot overlook Bagel World which started each day with a true New York size breakfast. The night life in Park Slope has a wide variety of restaurants and pubs, truly something for everyone. Getting around the city couldn't have been easier with multiple subway stops close by getting us into Manhattan in less than 20 minutes. Car services and Uber were plentiful and reasonable as well. 

Even though I never met Sara as she herself was on vacation, communications was open and we felt welcomed into her home even before we arrived. Sara will be my first call when I travel into the City again.
Perfect place for to stay with children! Great location, well-appointed.

This is a wonderful home at an incredible value.  The neighborhood is one of the best with amazing food options literally around the corner.  The apartment is amazing!!! Beautiful and spacious, with two wonderful outdoor spaces.  We felt so at home and would certainly stay here again when we return!  Don't think twice about coming to this amazing home.

Sara's place was a great for our NYC needs. Plenty of room for 4 of us (2 parents & 2 teens) to spread out, and the views of the Statue of Liberty & Manhattan were great. It's right in between two subway stations, so it was easy to reach Manhattan. This was the first time we have stayed in a place where the hosts actually live (they were on vacation, so we were there instead of them, not with them), but their notes were helpful and we felt (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was great prior to arrival, and we had 3-4 phone numbers to contact them if there had been any need (there wasn't!). It's not a full-time rental, but if Sara's dates line up with your dates, it's a great value...take advantage!

I stayed in Reka's apartment for a week in mid August. The apartment is clean and quiet, in a safe neighborhood and super close to public transportation. Both Reka and her roommate Erin are really nice and friendly and I felt comfortable staying with them. I would be happy to stay again there.

I spent a week with my brother in Reka and Erin's apartment (August-September 2013) and it was a great experience. Lovely place (amazing terrace facing downtown), big bed, clean bathroom, good neighborhood... And these two girls are such kind hosts! Absolutely recommended.

This is a really wonderful apartment, with a spacious, comfy room and bed, clean bathroom, nice decor, AMAZING roofdeck. A real gem in the East Village, I've already booked another stay. Reka & Erin are wonderful hosts. Overall great experience.
A great place to stay, quiet, sunny, no to far from a subway station, cafes and shops around...and two very kind people who made us feel welcome. A nice place to rest after a walking day in NYC!!!

I enjoyed my stay at this apartment a lot. The place was spotless clean and the decoration very special. The shower was good enough. The hostesses were kind and welcomed us warmly. It's a 15, 20- minute walk to the subway but If you don't mind walking it's in a nice area to look around. I highly recommend it.

Killer place in a great, safe location with a lot of stuff to do all within walking distance. The house was constantly clean and the room was very comfortable. Almost too good to be true! Erin was lovely and would sometimes cook nice vegan meals (mostly kale) and hang out. I would come back.
Reka and Erin are friendly and courteous hosts  - so was Boo :-)  and it was a pleasure to stay in their apartment.

Reka and her housemate, Erin, were great hosts! Not fussy and most of the time, left me with the house where I could watch Netflix (if only I had time!). My room was spacious, considering NY's tight apartments, clean and i was given lotsa hangers for my clothes! The apartment was neat and tidy, and there's a deck where you can enjoy the sun and view during Spring and Summer (I was there in Winter).

I like the neighborhood, with lotsa awesome eateries (that Sandwich place Reka recommended), UpState (1st Ave), Wafles and Dinges (East Village)... you will never be left with lousy food options. I enjoyed the vibe of the neighborhood (you just gotta explore).

The place is 10-15min walk from the subway station, but walking is not a problem for me unless I have lotsa shopping, which i will take a bus. The block is surrounded by quite a few bus stops so it was easy for me to get around Manhatten with just 1 bus ride, if you choose to ride the bus. I almost never have to take the cab here in my 2+ wks stay.

Enjoy your stay at Reka!

In short: Great apartment, excellent location, and super nice hosts.
I recommend staying here to anybody enjoying the close location to the pulse of East Village while still in a quiet neighborhood for your night sleep in a fresh apartment with a great terrace.
Don't forget to ask for restaurant tips - this source beats all guide books and blogs our there.

Great area to stay in. Reka & Erin were very friendly & helpful with any questions I had. 

Room is a great size & bathroom with all amenities you would need. 

Would recommend! 

Thanks ladies!

Reka was a great host and we enjoyed our stay at her place a lot. The apartment is tidy and spacious and the rooftop view spectacular. East Village is a lovely neighborhood with heaps of nice cafes and restaurants, for which Reka always had some great recommendations.

Our stay with Reka & Erin in NY was nice :) The apartment is in a great location - walking distance to good bars, restaurants, shopping, etc. The apartment was clean & tidy - the rooftop patio was not in great condition but they assured us it's because they've just come out of a rough winter so I'm sure it will be nice to use during summer.  Reka was easy to communicate with and was flexible when we requested a late check out. The only down side is that the listing mentioned we'd be staying with Reka & her housemate Erin but when we got there, there was 2 more guests staying in another room next to us…also sharing the bathroom/living space & kitchen. Made for a couple awkward encounters with an older couple. Had we known there was going to be 6 people in the apartment at one time we may not have booked. Perhaps just confirm this with Reka before securing your booking. Aside from that, it was a comfortable stay - would recommend :)
Really nice district for this cool appartement! One of the best in downtown with lots of restaurant, bars and coffee!

The listing and the neighborhood was exactly what I expected - except better.  Quick access to the FDR and the waterfront.  An easy walk to anything East Village including 1 block to Thompson Square Park.   The host was able to quickly answer any questions and ensured that everything was in place upon arrival.  Definitely a recommended East Village destination.

We had a great time with Reka and Erin. Their apt is in a great location. Quiet, yet close to the Hustle and Bustle of the east village. They go about their normal life while you are there so you really feel like just living with them, They were really easy going and friendly. For us, the big,big bonus was that we could borrow their bikes. That really made our trip!
Great bedroom with a very comfortable bed and really cool view. Very clean and friendly apartment in a rather quiet neighborhood, but close to all the East Village fun places... Highly recommended!

Reka and Erin's apartment is in a great location. Quiet end of the street, a short walk from lots of cafés/bars and subway. Reka was very accommodating and flexible with check in/check out and storing my luggage for a few days while I was away.
The room is clean, has lots of natural light, a comfy bed and a good view. I highly recommend this apartment and would be happy to stay again should I return to NYC.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Thanks Reka for our wonderful stay. We warmly recommend this flat: quite, cool, confortable in east Village full of restaurants , green and nice people. You can walk safely anytime. The apartment was clean and exactly as described. Reka and her friend made our stay at home in the big apple. Don't forget to enjoy the amazing view from her terrace.

I enjoyed my stay with reka. GREAT location in alphabet city. Walking distance to anything you want.  Nearby L train.  I felt free to come and go as I pleased.  The room was cute and there is an ac unit if needed.

This was a great apartment in the east village, the bed was big & comfortable and felt very welcomed! Reka & Erin were great hosts & were great help when needed. The apartment is in a great area & loved every minute of it.

The apartment was absolutly perfect. Reka is a lovely hosts, always helpful, even if she's  on rush. The location is in a great part of the city, lot of food places and nightclub...but the apartment is in a strategic position,  so quiet with a great wiev. Thanks Reka!!!

Reka was a great host, she always made sure we had everything we needed (wifi, information on good restaurants, grocery stores,...). She was very busy with work so we basically had the appartment to ourselves all day. It was very nice to have our breakfast in the morning on her sunny rooftop balcony with a beautiful view on parts of Manhattan. The neighboorhood is really nice, with lots of good restaurants and bars. The appartment is close to a metro station (a 10 min walk) so all other neighboorhoods of Manhattan are in fact very close by!

Reka and Erin were both great hosts, my friend and I felt very comfortable at their appartment. The room and especially the terrace have a great view of the skyline, the appartment itself is in a cool part of the city with lots of bars and restaurant. We definetely enjoyed the experience of staying in East Village in this great appartment!
Reka and her room mate are really welcoming, and the room was great. Rooftop balcony was amazing and the local area had lots of bars, restaurants and cafes.

Reka was friendly. She was also helpful and attentive when we asked about a couple of things.  The area was fine though a bit further from the subway than we expected. Although the room was small, the bed was very comfortable.

Absolutely wonderful place to stay. Reka and Erin were super accommodating, friendly, interesting girls and their apartment was clean, well decorated and the room was super comfortable. The location was perfect and all the recommendations and advice on food, transport and shopping was appreciated greatly. I will treasure my one week stay with these gorgeous hosts forever and would stay there again if I was to ever return. This is an ideal air bnb situation for solo travelers. 10/10 from me :)

Reka was an excellent, welcoming host with a lot of information to share about the East Village and New York in general.  The place was exactly as appears in the photos and was clean and quiet. I'd happily stay there again.

Went to NYC for a few day Reka was very inviting  and kind. The space is super quite and peaceful everything was above and beyond what we had imagined. Gave us some tip on where to go how to get there. Most of all extremely friendly and hospitable. Reka and Erin are the perfect hosts.

Reka and her roommate Erin were very nice people. Although my arrival time has changed so many times, they were very nice and flexible. 
The room was just fabulous! I would love to stay longer next time!

I enjoyed my stay with Reka. She was friendly and helpful and the room was comfortable. It was a treat to sit on her sunny terrace after a hard days sightseeing! Convenient for bus/subway, food shops and restaurants. A great base in New York!
非常感谢！当我们赶到时，已经深夜12点，但一直等到我们到达，交代好住宿事项才休息。当我们离开那天赶飞机时，很热情的帮我们预约了去机场的出租车。

The apartment was exactly as appears in the photos and was clean, quiet, comfortable and well decorating. The location is perfect to explore New York. Réka and Erin are really friendly and helpful though I had a lot of questions  I'd happily stay there again and recommend it for anyone.

Not near to the station.
15minuts walk from the nearest station.
But Host is very kind and friendly and very cute.we had good time in NY.

Cuando llegamos a la casa Reka nos recibió muy bien y nos dió las llaves del piso en el momento. No hemos visto a Reka mucho porque fuimos de turismo y salíamos muy pronto de casa y volvíamos tarde. El barrio está bien pero bastante retirado de first avenue (parada de metro), teníamos que andar unos 20 minutos hasta la casa.
La cama de la habitación era muy cómoda y todo estaba limpio.

Reka was a super welcoming & friendly host. We loved the apartment, and Alphabet City is a great area to explore - loads of good cafe's and bars, and a great vibe. Bed was super comfortable and room had everything we needed. Would recommend to anyone wanting to stay in the area. Amazing rooftop - even though it was too cold to make the most of.

We absolutely loved our trip to NYC and the apartment is just how it looks... Perfect location, surrounded with cool bars and restaurants of all food types... The bedroom is a good size with plenty of storage and bed was soooo comfy. It also had a fantastic view of NYC skyline from the bedroom and the roof terrace which we went on a few times, despite the cold weather. Reka and Erin were lovely hosts, very friendly - they are more than happy to chat with you but equally will let you get on with your trip and can be discreet if needed. Really was a perfect holiday - thank you

We had a great time in NYC and liked our place to stay a lot. 
Our Hosts were great and we looooved the view from the balkony :-)
The area is great and you have a lot of bars and Restaurants just next to the place. 
We can recommend the accommodation very much and if we come back soon, we will for sure stay there again if possible.

Reka was a perfect host. She was very accommodating and helpful when I had questions about the city. The room was clean, the apartment looked just like the pictures and the checkin/check out was flexible which was nice. I would highly recommend Reka's posting for anyone looking to experience New York.

Reka was a great host. Her and her roommate were very kind and flexible. The room was very comfortable and beautiful. I enjoyed my stay at the apartment. This is a good location. There are a lot of restaurants near the apartment.

Reka is a great and friendly host! We really liked our place to stay a lot. Reka was very helpful with instructions about how to find the apartment and information about nice bars/restaurants in the area. We loved our stay in NYC and Reka's apartment is just the way it looks on the pictures. The room is clean and the bed really comfortable. We recommend this apartment for a great stay in NYC. Thanks Reka and Erin!

Leaving DUBAI in a hurry and not quite knowing when I'll land, Reka was concise and quick with her replies and made everything easy and comfortable.

The apartment is beautiful and the room I stayed in was comfortable and neat. The stay was short but very memorable.

The location is excellent and close to plenty of interesting places.

Overall my experience was outstanding!

What a great place!  Fresh baked pretzels and lively conversation on my arrival and a clean, quiet, comfortable room in a great location.  Reka was welcoming, flexible, and efficient.  I loved my stay in the city!

Great location, beautiful room and such a great host! Reka was really caring and helpful and wanted to help as much as she could with everything. I really enjoyed my stay, this is really the perfect place to stay in!

Reka is a great host. Told me some local bars to visit, the BEST bar/restaurant in her neighborhood is called Satsko (202 E. 7th st). The view from Reka's balcony is what sold me on the place... breathtaking! I would definitely stay with her again.

Thanks again Reka!

Perfect set up for an quick trip to NYC; the apartment was exactly as advertised, Reka waited for my arrival to greet me even if my flight was terribly delayed and remained available throughout the stay for tips, help, assistance, or just a nice conversation.

I plan to stay here again on my next trip to NYC

Reka and her roommate where absolutely fabulous hosts. As soon as I walked in, I was immediately enamored with the place: excellent taste, clean, and very welcoming! The description is accurate and in fact, better in real life. I would stay again at the drop of a hat. These two roommates are simply stellar in helping guests feel welcome.

And let's not forget the coffee nearby. Just across the street you have Ninth Street Espresso. They produced the best breve cortado I've had so far in Manhattan. Plenty of cool bars and restaurants in walking distance. 

I should also mention: the StairMaster in the gym  is awesome.
Reka and her room mate Erin are amazing host. I had a great stay at their place and I would highly recommend it to other travelers.
Fantastic Experience, great location, comfortable room, great host 10/10

Awesome place and awesome girls. REKA and Erin were both amazing on my trip. My flight got cancelled due to snow so I had to cancel 1 night at their place and REKA was happy to refund me my money. Also the airline lost my luggage and they let me stay there well past a normal checkout time to wait for my luggage to be delivered. Can't say how appreciative I was!!! Area is good, amazing coffee shop across the street!
Very easy access for me and perfect location for all things east village and les.
Wonderful stay! Excellent hosts.
Reka and her roommate were great hosts! The room and bathroom were clean and bright and pleasant. I had a quiet stay.

Reka and Erin were very welcoming and I felt at home straight away. The apartment is clean, comfortable and had all the amenities I needed. The room was warm with plenty of storage, and the bed was very comfy! East Village is quiet and peaceful yet with good access to attractions of Manhattan. Whole-heartedly recommend this airbnb listing!
Great place. Warm welcome. Good bed and a perfect view. Reka is a  uncomplicated host.

I stayed here with my boyfriend for two weeks and we absolutely loved it! Reka and Erin were very welcoming and had great recommendations. They also had some friends staying who were really nice too. It is a 15-20min walk from the nearest subway, which was the only downside but for us was worth it to be in such a great neighborhood. Loved all the bars and restaurants in the East Village and would definitely recommend staying in this neighborhood! Really comfortable bed too!
Great hosts - friendly, generous, interesting people. Very comfortable accommodations. Terrific location close to lots of restaurants, Thompkins Square & nightlife.

Reka and her roommate Erin were very pleasant and friendly hosts.  We arrived to NY earlier than we initially planned and Reka even let us drop off our bags early so that we would not have to pull them around the city.  And she was kind enough to drop us a text to let us know when the room was ready!  We felt quite at home staying in her apartment and we enjoyed conversation with both Reka and Erin quite a bit.  Both are highly interesting and women!  

The bed in our private room was incredibly comfy and the view of the city from the terrace was so lovely at night.  Reka gave us advice about where to eat (thank you our breakfast was delish!) and she even went out of her way to help us understand the subway and bus routes so we would not need to take a cab back to the airport.  Saved us $$$

If we ever find ourselves making a trip back to NY in the future we will certainly try and stay here again.  And when we hear of people who are making plans to visit, we will CERTAINLY tell them to look Reka and her listing up.  Thank you Reka and Erin for helping to make our trip so pleasant and enjoyable.  We wish you both well on your journey in Life!

Everything above expectations (hosts, chats,East River Park, terrace, movie database, room, view, hints, bed, ...) 
I felt very welcome and I am very thankful for such warm and relaxed stay....
couldn't have been better

Reka was a great host - she told me about all her favourite local haunts, so that I felt at home in the neighbourhood. The room was bright and airy and the house was homely and clean. Reka gave me great advice on what to do, and ensured that I had a relaxing and fun stay. 

I'd definitely come back and stay here again, and East Village is an awesome area!

Listing is exactly as posted. Excellent view from the roof terrace, room was very comfortable. Great location with lots of bars and eateries nearby. Reka was very friendly and welcoming, recommended places to go and directions round the city. Would highly recommend for anyone visiting NYC.

Reka and Erin were both great hosts. They gave us every time the feeling to being highly welcome and helped us a lot to settle down and orient ourselves. East Village is a great place with a lot of good restaurants and bars. One block away from the apartment is the next bus stop from where you get to all relevant subway stations around the area. The apartment was cozy and clean. The room has a sufficient size and you are of course allowed to use the kitchen and living room. The view from the roof terrace is stunning. 

All in all I can highly recommend the place and Reka and Erin being your hosts!

Reka and Erin were excellent hosts.  Erin met us upon arrival and talked us through the neighbourhood and the apartment.  The room was very comfortable and the flat is well equipped, clean and welcoming.  The balcony was extra special and we enjoyed our night drinks with the downtown view.  
The neighbourhood is lively and interesting.  We loved the vibe and explored many cafes and restaurants.  The apartment is a bit of a walk to the nearest subway but there is a bus stop really nearby which we used a couple of times with ease.  The only downside of the neighbourhood is the noise at night - especially with the windows open which was essential in the heat.  The apartment is worth it though and Reka and Erin are wonderful hosts - we would definitely recommend this apartment for a stay in New York and would return again.
This place was in a nice part of town, walking distance to subway, cafés and community gardens. Room was small but fine for a couple, hosts made us feel very welcome.

Reka was a very great host. We really can recommend this accommodation,we felt very welcome.
Everything was clean and the bed was very comfortable ;)

A perfect trip. Airy, sunlit space, great part of town, and lovely hosts. I especially appreciated the comfy bed and soft sheets, and the postcard views. 

A note that Alphabet City is on beyond the East Village--a big plus in my book, if you like community gardens, hipster happy hour, and a different part of Manhattan.

Reka was a really nice host, helpful and easy to communicate with. I had a great time in NY and the apartment was jus as announced. The rooftop is great! Really nice cafes and restaurants just around the corner. I warmly recommend Rekas place!

Très bonne expérience. Endroit calme, très proche des commerces resto/bars et à 10min du métro.
Terrasse avec vue sur le one world trade center qui s'illumine la nuit tombée.
Reka est dispo pour les petits renseignements du quotidien. Très facile d'approche elle sait vous mettre à l'aise.
Ma première expérience en Airbnb, certainement pas la dernière !!!

We really enjoyed our stay at Reka's and Erin's home - they always helped us finding the best places in the neighbourhood (which is central and really nice with all the bars, cafés, the parc...ask them for the great bagel place ;-) We could use the kitchen as well as the fridge and especially loved the amazing view on Manhattan from the terrace!

Since Reka knew I would be coming in while she was working, she texted me to let me know to get the key from the coffee shop across the street! Upon my arrival at Reka's East Village 6th floor apartment via elevator, I found a clean inviting apartment with an amazing view! The bedroom was perfect with a super comfortable and cozy bed, large window with an amazing skyline NYC view, and space for all of my things. There was also an excellent room air conditioner that cooled the room on a hot humid June night. Reka also helped me know what subways to take and looked up information on museums. The bed was very comfortable and I slept super well as I felt very safe. The neighborhood is filled with shops, and restaurants and easy access to other parts of then city. I liked walking to Soho to eat dinner and to Union Square to catch the subway uptown. I loved my stay and enjoyed living the East Village life for a couple days!! I highly recommend staying at Reka's apartment and get a feel for the East Village!

Reka and Erin made us feel very welcome. They couldn't have been more helpful. The room was small but comfortable. We had access to whatever bathroom and cooking facilities we required. There was a view across the city skyline.
We had a brilliant stay! Great East Village location and very comfortable bed :)

Reka and Erin were great hosts. They answered my questions about things to see in the city and made the trip better.
The bed was comfortable, the room was clean and air-conditioned.
The apartment is similar to the pictures.
Overall it was a great experience.

Reka was a great host, made all facilities available. Room was in a great location, one important thing for me was a good air conditioner which worked great on the warm nights. Both herself and Erin her room-mate were informative and helpful.

Reka and her roommate Erin were wonderful hosts to my daughter and me when we came to the city to see two shows. Reka told us about restaurants in the Lower East Side and was very accommodating when I had to change my arrival time. It is a fun area, just two blocks from the East River, with easy access to a path where you can run or walk. The apartment has an upstairs deck with a fantastic view of the city. The bed was comfortable and the apartment clean and cheerful. We shared their rather small living area with them, which was fine because none of us were around much.
Great location and wonderful bright room. Reka was helpful, hospitable, and showed me a great place to get a chicken sandwich. The was the perfect place to use  a home base as I wandered the city.
Reka and her roommate and friend were all welcoming and friendly. We found and were able to get into the apartment with no problem and it was just as advertised.
We had a great time in Reka's apartment. Very nice apartment and good location too! Thanks for everything :)
This is my second time staying with Reka and I absolutely loved it! Reka's place is nothing less than perfect.

Really enjoyed my stay in Alphabet city. Great neighbourhood with easy access to further Manhattan and Brooklyn on the L line. Very friendly, easy going hosts, I would defiantly stay again. Five stars! Thanks, Simon.

My stay at Reka's place was perfect. Reka is a wonderful host, with a positive attitude and never intrusive. The place is great, spacious, quiet, and the guest room is large with a very comfortable bed. I stayed at Reka's place with my dog Santo, and he was also very happy. Thanks a lot Reka !

La casa de reka es muy linda y prolija. Es tal cual se ve en las fotos. La cama es muy comoda y el cuarto tiene buen tamaño y buen placard. A media cuadra hay colectivo.
Reka es una excelente anfitriona

It was our first airbnb ever. Reka is a nice, easy going person. Checking in early in the morning was no problem. The appartment is cosy and comfortable, with an amazing view from the terrace. The room and bathroom were good with enough privacy. We liked it very much!

The apartment is in a great location in East Village! It's near the train and bus stops so you have access to transportation. There's really good restaurants nearby as well. Reka and Erin were friendly and hospitable hosts. I would definitely stay with them again.

This apartment was exactly what I expected. No problems to report. The room was clean, had its own lock, as well as a fresh towel and linens provided. Reka and Erin were friendly and answered any questions I had as well as gave recommendations. Was a great experience and would highly recommend

Reka is a considerate and welcoming host - it was a pleasure sharing the apartment with her. The room is comfortable and clean and I was made to feel completely at home. I have travelled to New York once before on business and had stayed midtown. So it was great to have an opportunity to see a different neighbourhood. The shops, cafes and restaurants of east village are just a block or so away. 

Perhaps if you have not travelled much previously, as this is not a tourist area, it may feel a little too far from the usual sights.  However I loved it! It felt like you were part of the city and its residents - the independent stores and eateries are wonderful and the people friendly.  I spent an hour one evening drinking red wine with some shop owners where I had just popped in for a gift for my little girl and we got chatting! If you prefer to stay somewhere a little different, I would thoroughly recommend this Airbnb. 

Top tips whilst you are there - The Bean cafe has good wifi and coffee if you need somewhere to work nearby. The Cuban takeout from cafecito was great and the thin crust pizzas from Gruppo were amazing. Breakfast at Clinton street bakery is good but expect long queues at the weekend.
Great place to stay and location is perfect to explore East Village. Reka was not there but able to help with an easy check in after a long flight.
Nice appartement at great location

Reka aceptó mi reserva inmediatamente y todo funcionó en forma perfecta! No tuve el gusto de conocer a mi huésped porque estaba fuera de la ciudad, pero la habitación estuvo disponible cuando lo necesitaba, la entrega de las llaves fue muy conveniente y el departamento es hermoso!!! Excelente ubicación, la zona es genial, muy cerca de todo y tranquila. El departamento está a solo unos metros de una estación de CitiBike para poder moverse por la ciudad en bicicleta. Lo que más me impresionó fue la terraza, muy linda y con una vista increíble!!! Muchas gracias, Reka, espero volver pronto!!!

We did not have opportunity to meet Reka, but her roommate, Erin could not have made us feel more welcome!  She was waiting for us when we arrived to welcome us and offer some great restaurant suggestions.  They had the WiFi password and other helpful information (local grocery store, ABC store, nearest transportation etc.) very clearly written down for us.  Erin genuinely seemed excited to interact with us for the brief periods of time that we saw her but she was also great about giving us space for our vacation.  We had a great stay in this apartment and found it to be a very convenient location.

Rena was not around but Erin was a fabulous host. She was very flexible with my late in the evening arrival.  She gave me a warm welcome when I arrived and made herself available for any questions I had.  She gave helpful suggestions for places in the neighborhood for coffee, food, drinks, etc.

The apartment is located on a quiet street, combined with a super comfortable bed made for a great space to get some sleep after very full and busy days and nights in NYC.  

I especially loved having a view of lower Manhattan as well as a terrace to enjoy some fresh air, sunshine with a view.

I felt safe, comfortable and would not hesitate to recommend this place for solo travelers seeking a comfortable place in a groovy, lively neighborhood.

I have been to New York many times, but this was one of my best trips - and staying in Reka's place played an important part. Reka wasn't there but her roommate Erin was great in welcoming me and making me feel at home ("What's ours is yours"). The apartment on the 6th floor is sunny and cosy and spotlessly clean, also quiet, my room wonderful, I even had the bath to myself most days. Checking in and out was easy, Erin was flexible. And when I asked how I could make coffee, she  went out and bought a French press. The neighborhood is great with so many Cafés and Restaurants and young people around. I loved talking to Erin and her friends, everything was so relaxed. I very much hope I can come back.

I had a great experience in the apartment. Erin, Reka's roommate, made me feel welcome. She was there to recommend on restaurants, and in general she was very nice and always asked me about my day. The greatest thing about the apartment is that it is sunny. It is not necessarily the case in many apartments in Manhattan. The room was very nice, not too big but not too small. I had a private bathroom, which is great, and the view from the terrace was absolutely stunning. The neighborhood is nice, quiet and calm, and there are places to hang out that are near. The only thing that was a bit of a disappointment for me was the distance to the metro, about fifteen minutes by foot, which is a bit far to my taste.

This was my second time to stay a Reka's place and was just as good as the first!  Warm reception, great location, clean, quiet, safe, comfortable room.  I feel very at home there and hope to be back soon!
Friendly, great food suggestions, great stay!
Reka's apartment was perfect. Lots of space and very user friendly. Looking forward to my next stay!

Reka is very organized, ensuring smooth entry and exit.
The building is beautiful with an original mosaic by Mosaic Man, a bit of Loisada history. Great location.
The apartment is clean and organized, the room spacious and tidy, with plenty of plugs and closet space.  The views are breathtaking.  Coffee was available as well as room in the fridge.

Reka was very helpful and friendly over phone, while she wasn't in town when I landed her flat mate Erin helped us out. Erin too was very friendly and warm. While not very close to the subway network the place is not very far from 2nd Av station. The room is small but clean and gives you a nice view to the empire estate building. Me and my 10 yr old daughter had a good stay and like most other Airbnb places I have stayed the host didn't provide breakfast. All in all a very good stay.
Reka and Erin were both incredibly nice and welcoming. I felt at home in their apartment and loved the location!
This was my third time staying with Reka & Erin. As always, nothing less than perfect!
Reka's place is really nice and she made me feel welcome. She's a great host! I will definitely come back to her place next time I'm visiting NYC!

Reka and Erin were fantastic hosts. Both are very warm and friendly. The room is exactly as described. Bright, spacious and lots of draw and closet space. Very large terrace with a fantastic downtown skyline view. 
The area has a great community feel. Lots of cool little bars and restaurants, and ABC is a fantastic bottle shop just around the corner for your drink in or take out beer needs. 
Will definitely stay there again if I'm back in the area. Cheers!

Great experience. Room was as described. Particularly liked the roof balcony and view of the city. Great recommendation on a fried chicken joint called Bob White. Reka was available and friendly. Definitely recommend to others.
Reka was very easy to communicate with, answered texts and emails very quickly, making it easy to make arrangements.
This was my first air BnB experience and it was great. Reka was really flexible with check in/out times and her housemate, Erin, was super friendly and lovely! Thanks guys!
Excellent location and friendly host

It is a great place to stay in a lovely area in East Village. The room is bright and spacious and the view from the rooftop terrace is amazing.

Reka is a great host, open and friendly.

I completely recommend to stay here for your NY visit!
Awesome! Reka was a great host and had great recommendations for our stay in NYC.
This is a wonderful place:  cozy, quiet and in a great neighborhood.  Coordinating with Reka was very easy.  A great place to stay!
Didn't get a chance to meet Reka but her room mate was really nice and the place was amazing. Very comfortable and chic, would absolutely stay there again.

Reka's apartment was a fantastic base for my short trip to New York. It is in a great location, awesome neighbourhood, with great coffee and restaurants right on the doorstep. The room itself is as described, comfy and quiet. Erin and Reka were welcoming hosts, even though we did not cross paths too often. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

It was lovely once again to stay with Reka - such a bright space, so clean and welcoming. Just like coming home. Arrangements for getting in and leaving my lugguage on the day of departure were easy. It's a great location in the East village. I have recommended it it to several friends. And I do hope to come back soon.

We spent a great week in NYC and it was very pleasant to benefit from Reka's apartment in the evenings / mornings to rest for a while before going out in this vibrant city!

The flat is well-maintened, the bedroom is nice and cosy, and above all, the district is really great: lots of restaurants, coffee shops and bars everywhere, in a young and lively atmosphere !

Even though we did not see much of Reka during our stay (busy worker!), she was very helpful and reactive when we asked for tips/questions. We therefore recommend Reka's apartment !

We had a good time staying at Reka's place. The appartment is in a very nice street and area, is cosy, has a great view and a very comfortable bed. Reka and Eryn gave us some good tips for restaurants in the neighbourhood.

Reka was very nice and welcoming and gave me good recommendations.  The room was very comfortable and clean. It was pretty quiet for NYC, but not far from good restaurants and stores.
Thank you Reka!

El barrio, fuera de los circuitos turísticos convencionales, es estupendo. Animado y bien comunicado además de tranquilo. La anfitriona muy amable y aunque la habitación es algo pequeña, la cama es muy buena y todo muy limpio. La terraza es un desahogo enorme que da momentos de relajo e intimidad. Lugar muy recomendable para estancias largas de más de cinco días.

Nice place, great neighborhood.  Loved the bedroom / bed.. very comfortable.  Fairly quiet (on tree lined street, 6th floor).. slept comfortably with the large window open (in June).  And near lots of great restaurants, bars, etc.. and a nice park 2 blocks away.  Reka was very pleasant, as were flat mates (couple that live on 2nd level).  I was only there 2 nights and one day (and was out most of the time), but felt very welcome.  Also appreciated they gave me a key to lock the bedroom.

Two issues:  Had a little trouble reaching Reka before arrival the first night, which caused some anxiety (how will I get in?), but after a few attempts, we did connect (her ringer was off).  And someone was soaking laundry in the bathroom sink for an afternoon thru the night, which meant I had to use the kitchen sink to wash face / brush teeth, etc.. not ideal.

Overall, had a good experience and would stay there again.  Thank you

Reka was a good host and provided everything I required during my stay. The only issue I faced was the wait upon arrival to her flat, as no one was in to let me in. Hence the 4 star rating. Other than that the stay was pleasant and the property was as expected.
Fantastic experience. I highly recommend it!

Reka was really flexible, on our last day she lets us leaving our luggage and took our time to check out so that was a really great positive as we were on different schedules and needed that flexibility. She was also very responsive to answer the questions.
Not much to add to the plethora of praise already made by other visitors. Great location, friendly hosts, clean room.
The best Airbnb I've stayed at this year. Very hospitable and accommodating on check in and helping on last minute request.

Reka was really nice and gave many useful advices AND!!!!! THE BED IS REALLY PRETTY,HUGE AND SOFT!!!! I literally just slept on the bed went I JUST came back from the outside; she gave me absolute privateness and safetiness to make me feel so. 
I highly recommend Reka's place, the location and everything is great!

Perfect apartment in a perfect location! Reka and Erin were nice and welcoming, we felt really comfortable at their place. And that rooftop is just the perfect way to end a long day of tourism in New York... would absolutely repeat this experience!

We've enjoyed our one-week-stay in East Village. 
The bed was really cozy and the a/c worked well.
The private rooftop was perfect after a long walk in the city but also in the morning with an amazing view.

I made this reservation for my niece and these are her comments:
I didn't get the chance to meet Reka because she was traveling but Erin and Rob (Erin's BF) were really nice and the place was amazing.  The bedroom was very comfortable.  I would absolutely stay there again.

We didn't meet Reka, but her housemates Erin and Rob were home for much of our 9 day stay. They were so easy going, helpful and kind, and were playful and incredibly patient with our one year old. They were happy to help 'baby proof' the apartment, and shift furniture in our bedroom to fit the portacot. They also made it easy for us to have hired baby gear delivered before we arrived.
Room Pros: The WiFi worked as expected, the aircon in the bedroom was a lifesaver, and the washer/dryer in the complex was very handy. Room Cons: The gym was very small (maybe 3 cardio?), and the curtains in the bedroom weren't very effective at blocking out the light. (Thankfully, Erin got us a thick rug which we draped over and it did the trick. She also kindly offered to get new curtains...we declined!)
The apartment location was wonderful- we felt safe walking around day and night, and there were so many great restaurants and bars within walking distance, of varying price levels. There aren't too many retail stores within a mile, but plenty of delis, pharmacies, and grocery stores. Both the bus and CityBike were super close, but we used neither - instead we walked to the subway (which was only about a 10 minute walk). Once you're on the subway, we found you can get anywhere in NYC very easily.

Great location and a great host!Right smack bang in the middle of East Village you are close to everything that part of New York has to offer and communication with Reka was smooth(as she was away with work for the week).And that view from the private balcony of the Manhattan skyline...wow!!
If ever you come to this part of the world make sure you stay with Reka...can't recommend it enough!!!
Reka is amazing - everything you want in an Airbnb host. Communicative, flexible and nice. Place was great - exactly as described.
It was an amazing stay! Reka is very nice and helped me a lot with everything:) the location of the apartment is perfect and I would definitely come back:)

It is located in a great neighborhood, with a park, a lot of nice restaurants, bars, coffee shops and stores within a walk distance. The hosts are all super friendly and helpful. The private balcony is a great place to relax. A great choice if you want to gain a direct experience of living in New York.
Reka was extremely accommodating and made me feel at home. I loved the private balcony she has that overlooking New York. Oh and the bed is extremely comfy!

Great location and fabulous host!  It was nice to chat with the housemates on the comfy couch and share a hotdog on the beautiful balcony.  Many thanks for a pleasant stay and definitely would recommend to others :)

Vous avons été merveilleusement bien accueillis par Reka et avons passé un agréable séjour. 
Le quartier d' East Village est atypique, très vivant, et on y trouve de nombreux commerces et restaurants.Nous avons également apprécié la proximité du Tompkins Park, un espace vert vivant et dynamique.
Le duplex équipé d'une superbe terrasse, avec une vue imprenable sur le One World Trade Center, nous a permis de nous ressourcer tous les soirs après des journées de visite bien remplies.
Nous recommandons ce logement pour une visite approfondie de New-York.

Reka and her room mates provided a very warm welcome. The place is well located and has all the amenities I needed. It was a bit of a flying visit for my part but the area would have been nice to explore a bit more.

This was my first AirBnB experience, and I could not have asked for better. Reka's place is in a great location, minutes away from fantastic coffee and a Citibike station (which made for a nice start to every day). Reka is a wonderful host, and knows the area very well. The neighbourhood is full of casual dining options, and she had a recommendation for whatever style of cuisine I could come up with. Every one was a winner! The apartment was clean & tidy and the room well appointed. And that roof deck! Such a great place to relax and reflect with a cold beer after a day of exploring the city. I will definitely stay again if I'm lucky enough to return to the East Village sometime.

Reka is really a good host. The room is comfortable and clear with quite neighborhood around. Lots of restaurants and bars are nearby. You could also enjoy your time at the balcony. Definitely would recommend it if you spend several days exploring NYC.
Really comfortable and tidy place with great host. Fabulous balcony that you could have cups of wine there. Lots of bars and restaurants are also nearby. Definitely would recommend it to others.

I felt comfortable during my staying. Reka is so kind and joyful host. The place is near city so we travel around city easily. Room is very cozy and comfortable. View for city is also very good. If I visit NYC again, I hope to stay again.
Good location.

The apartment is bright and cheery with a view worth much more than the price would suggest. The lobby has a mosaic by an internationally known tile artist of the twin towers of the World Trade Center. History.
The neighborhood is vibrant and all original - lots of restaurants, cafes, funky shops, community gardens and the iconic Thompson Sq Park. I even saw some chickens doing their strut.
The apartment is really nice, great location, and very nice people living there.
Everything was seamless! The place is super clean, comfy and in a unbeatable location. Reka and her roomates are lovely. I had a wonderful stay, would def stay again!
Great area, loved exploring it.

I had an excellent experience staying here. I relocated from AZ and stayed here for a few days while I found a long term option to live. My flight was delayed coming in by about 4 hours and the hosts stayed up late to let me in. The room was big with a cool view of The freedom tower. The bed was comfortable and had everything I needed. I wish I could have stayed the full week there but it was all booked up. Would def stay again.

I had great stay in east village.  
I was up and out all day so didn't meet host.    Her flat mate let me in on arrival 
Room perfect.   Nice terrace looking over New York skyline

My friend and I went to NY just for the weekend. We had a great time! Apartment is lovely - great view from the balcony and the room. Bed was comfy and everything was clean. Hosts are super friendly. Would def stay there again!
Clean, secure building in a great part of town. Very nice and comfortable room with great hosts. Would definitely stay there again.

Unfortunately I didn't cross paths with Reka during my 5 night stay however we kept in touch and her (Hidden by Airbnb) were super friendly & welcoming.  East Village is a great location with bars, restaurants & good coffee just down the road.  The room is indeed bright & sunny and the views of Lower Manhattan are fantastic.  I also loved the littleretro touch with the Top Gun & Star Wars videos in the bathroom!
Reka's room provided a great stay in NY.  She was very accommodating and communicative.
A lovely apartment with great view and friendly host.
Great neighbourhood - close to a ton of excellent restaurants.
Great place, as described, highly recommend :)
Great place to stay at in the village. Very friendly hosts. Nice clean room and comfy bed.
Such a great host! The room and bathroom were extremely clean, and Reka was especially helpful with questions about the area and transportation. Perfectly enjoyable.
Reka was a wonderful, communicative host, and her space was well-suited and well-appointed. Thanks!

The room at Reka's was very comfortable and had an interesting city-scape view.  The apartment was clean and cozy and delightful.  We enjoyed the terrace, too.  Reka was extremely accommodating (and very kind to host a child along with me).  We loved our stay!

The check-in was easy. Reka made everything clear through text messaging. This is our second time staying at this cozy place (with a very comfortable bed and good shower) and we would definitely stay again. We enjoy this neighborhood. There is good coffee across the street. If you are a runner or someone who likes to walk, it is close to a walkway that goes over the FDR drive to a pathway at the East River Park that goes alongside the river.

Reka is a wonderful host, always smiling and friendly.
The apartment is very well located near everything.
Recommended.
Great place, Erin and Rob (Reka's roommates) were really fun to hangout with
Reka's place was just right.  It was warm, cozy, clean and comfortable.  Reka was a welcoming, gracious and accommodating host.

Reka was very kind and a gracious host. Her place was clean, comfortable and convenient. The room she offers is spacious, for NY, and is well outfitted with a power strip for charging, closet to hang your clothes and a nice view of the city. Her building is safe, clean and even has a small gym equipped w. cardio or yoga space. Her place made my trip enjoyable...thanks!
Reka was a great host.  I enjoyed my stay and would be happy to stay next time I'm in town.  The room is comfortable with a great view of downtown.   Thanks for everything.
Great host and amazing apartment! I had a fantastic stay and if I was back in New York, I would definitely want to stay here again :) felt really comfortable and the view of the skyline is superb
Reka's place is a great for your NYC travels. In a cool spot within East Village, it has a nice view and everything is clean and modern.
Such amazing hosts, great location, super comfortable bed and a great experience! I suggest this place to anyone traveling in NYC!!!
Amazing and clean place, great amenities around and quiet Neighbourhood. Easy to get around parts of Manhatten, definitely a recommended place!

Reka was very welcoming and helpful. The bedroom was great and the bed very comfortable, and the bathroom was also great. I highly recommend this apartment, and will use it again if I get back over this way
Amazing apartment, wishing I could stay longer.

Nous avons passés d'excellentes vacances, Reka et quelqu'un d'adorable et de très pro, le lit est confortable et nous avons découvert des commerces très sympa dans le quartier. Il y a notamment un parc très agréable à 5 minutes. Un peu excentré, juste ce qu'il faut. East Village est très agréable pour des vacances.
Très bon sejour! Chambre propre et lit confortable. Appartement tres propre et terrasse avec superbe vue! Reka est très sympa et arrangeante!
This is my first time using Airbnb and my experience with Reka was  pleasant. The place is nice and well equipped. The room was clean and has a nice view of the city. I wish I could stay longer!

We had a very relaxing time at Reka's place. It's in a great location for public transport and there is an excellent cafe and bar at the end of the street. The apartment is in a quiet area and it has an elevator and laundry. So it's great when moving suitcases and trying to freshen up after a couple of weeks on the road.

Nice place, nice host! 
Reka was present just as needed. The appartement is well located and well furnished. 
I totally recommand you this place :)

Reka's apartment is clean, beautiful, and refreshing with cute plants and arts within the place. The neighborhood is lovely and quiet, a little far from the central manhattan but with a great view from the window and the terrace. Reka is super friendly and open to welcome us to her place and talking with guests. I would choose to stay here again!
Convenient location, nice roof terrace, good bed/matrasses. Definitely recommended!

Reka's place is terrific!  It's spacious (as NYC goes), super clean, and a wonderful neighborhood.  Reka is a friendly and helpful host - very relaxed and easy place to stay.  We'd definitely recommend.
Reka was very kind and her house was perfect.
She was very very kind. The cleanliness of the house was improved and the bathroom was very clean. I was able to make a good trip with ease.
Very nice flat, clean and cozy. Beautiful private roof terrace. Smooth communication. Thank you so much Reka, I would love to come back :)
Reka rocks! Her place is sunny and there are lots of plants. The apartment is also close to lots of great things.

Reka's apartment is an oasis in the east village. Very charming and neat, very light and welcoming. My room was rather small but with a very comfortable bed. In addition, it was always very quiet and private despite I just rented a room. Reka is very warm and friendly and also makes you feel at ease around her. I really recommend Reka's apartment and it is great experience!

Nice flat with a good view and a confortable bed. We didn't meet Reka but his friend Daniel was always available for us. The area of East Village is one of the best to eat or have a drink. A lot of good restaurants and bars.
Lovely host, great location!
It was really fun and pleasant to have a great apartment. A great balcony on the roof. Thank you very much for everything. you're great!
Great location near community garden and cafe (East Nine Espresso)  Saw live jazz at local bar. Place is clean and true to photos. Roof deck.... wow.  Will come back..
nice p la ce and nice host

Hello, traveler(s)!

It was my first experience booking and staying through airbnb, although I have experienced it before but my wife did the booking. 

The place was as advertised, clean and Reka was a great host. Communication was excellent and check in and out processes were smooth. 

The apartment is next to Tompkins square park and activities within this park were great! Basketball, ping pong, hanging out even for dogs, and even a live music once. 

Great restaurants and bars near by, so plenty of hangouts nearby. 

Expect 10-15 minutes walk each way to nearest train station. 

If host is not available at location during arrival, expect to possibly pick up keys at alternate location that will require 5-min walk each way. Plan your ride to drop you off at the key location instead of the apartment. Same routine in reverse when checking out. 

Overall, I would return and stay at this place again, if available. 

Happy travel!
Great location. Reka gave us really fun recommendations for food in the area. Everything was really easy. I had a phone conference for work and it was great to sit on the roof deck for it!
Amazing host, helpful, clean, and very private feel. 10/10 would recommend

This apartment comes highly recommended!
Reka is a great host, communication as well as check in were easy and she was really helpful.
The apartment is on the 6th floor, has three bedrooms (two of which are frequently rented via airbnb), and laundry and a small gym are in the house.
The bed is extremely comfortable, the room has more than enough space for all your things and the apartment is spotlessly clean and provides all that you need. Most importantly, the rooftop terrace is amazing and offers a beautiful view over lower Manhattan which rivals many of the rooftop bars in the area.
The neighborhood is lovely with many cafes, bars, and restaurants. Tompkins Square Park and East River Park are just a short walk away.

Such a fantastic apartment and what a wonderful host! Reka made me feel extremely welcome and at home from the moment I arrived and was incredibly kind and helpful when I needed to find a local medical clinic at the end of my trip, going above and beyond to make sure I was OK. Really couldn't have asked for a better host or a nicer a place to stay for the few days I was in the city! Such a great find and I would recommend to all!
Incredible view of Manhattan skyline.  Wish I could have stayed longer.
Reka is a great host
One of the best airbnb's I ever did. Will want to come back !!

Reka's place is really amazing! Its located in the heart of East Village, just two blocks from Thompkins Square Park. The aerea is surrounden by plenty cool restaurants and bars.
1rst Avenue Subway Station (From the L line) is just ten minute walking and will connect you so fast with williamsburg or midtown of manhattan. If you like to walk, you can also go walking to soho, just fifteen minutes!
The appartment is really nice! My bedroom was very comfortable (really big). Reka lives upstairs and has its own bathroom. So you just share the bathroom with another guest.
The building has elevator, this is awesome! If you are carrying heavy luggage this is amazing!
Reka helped me with some personal stuff, like returning amazon products! Im sorry for using too much tape ahahah! She is very generous and good vibes. 
I definetely come back again to rekas place.

El apartamento de Reka es tal cual viene descripto... luminoso, acogliente...un lugar que pude llamar "mi casa" mientras estuvimos en New York.  Todo en orden, limpieza 10 puntos...Reka esta presente en muchos pequeños detalles que hacen que tu estadia en su casa era optima. El apartamento esta ubicado en una zona maravillosa rodeada de pequeños negocios, bares, restoranes de todo tipo, es la segunda vez que tomo alojamiento en el East Village y que puedo decir? Es el barrio que mas amo! Otro plus del apartamento...edificio con ascensor! La estacion de metro mas cercana esta a unos 10 minutos (Website hidden by Airbnb) es cerca cerca però caminando esos "blocks " descubrimos muchos lugares interesantes que terminamos visitando!  Lo recomiendo  ampliamente! Thanks Reka!
Clean, safe privet room.  Very efficient interactions with Reka.

It’s wonderful house. 
The location and view, everything is perfect! Host is also good. If i will come to New York, i want stay again!!
She is very kind, and the bathroom and kitchen were also very clean. There was a German couple next to me, and they were so kind that I remember my first Airbnb in New York.
Una buena experiencia!
Very nice place in a great location and Reka is very responsive! Would recommend!
Reka was an excellent host. Commutative yet not intruding at all. 10/10 would stay again!
Easy, good value place to crash in alphabet city.
Reka’s apartment is excellent and a great option to stay close to Soho and downtown Manhattan, only downside is that the closest subway stations are 10-15 minutes away by walk.
Logement conforme, très propre, literie super !
Reka's place is close to everything in the city and an amazing value. Room has a great view of Manhattan.
I had a great stay at Reka's apartment.  Clean and quiet, plus there's an elevator in the building! Near Tompkins Square Park and a 10-15 minute walk to the L.
Reka's home provided me the most pleasant stay in NYC.

Very nice apartment with good view to South Manhatten from a lovely terrace. kitchen and living room could also be used freely. The only minus was the 10 minute walk to the nearest metro. But not the big problem. definitely somewhere I would rent if I came to NYC again. and the best recommendations from us.
good communication good location. enjoyed the stay. thanks Reka and Matthew
Great
I didn't meet Reka, but enjoyed the stay at her place.  It's tidy, laid back, and in a great location.  Check-in and everything else was smooth as well.
My parents stayed at Rekas place and really enjoyed it. They said the room was clean and bright and the rest of the apartment was cozy. I'm happy they were happy there!

Located in a good area of Manhattan 10 minutes from the metro with very good communication. Neighborhood with many restaurants in the area.
Comfortable apartment with very good central heating, everything very warm and pleasant. Very friendly service without missing anything
Nice place, and good tips for visit ny
