It's cold apartment, it's an old building (100+y), noise from streets and noise from warming batteries will not you let to sleep well (used earplugs).
I'd not stay here again.

Great location. Friendly host. Perfect neighborhood. Walk up 5 floors was good exercise for me. 2 subway lines are easy to access. Thank you for everything Lulu!
他2人とのシェアルームですが、とても快適。エリアも2つの地下鉄ラインが使えてとても便利。

Lulu's place is beautiful, in a great location, right near the heart of Williamsburg. She's one of the most welcoming and hospitable people I've met in New York, and is a great host - quick communication and great service. Definitely recommend.

Had an amazing time at Lulu's place - it's in an excellent location for getting around Brooklyn/Manhattan either by walking via the Williamsburg Bridge or taking the J/L trains. The apartment is clean, cozy and well stocked and I was lucky enough to have some great people staying in the other rooms whilst I was there. 
I'd love to stay here again the next time I visit New York - highly recommended.
Well situated (lively williamsburg!) and comfortable
Very nice host. Great location close to some bars and shops
Very nice place, located in a great area. Lulu is a wonderful host. I totally recommend

Lu fue una anfitriona excelente, cada día se comunicaba con nosotros para ver si necesitábamos algo, el departamento es bellisimo me sentí como en cada super equipado no deben preocuparse por la ropa ya que tiene una lavadora y secadora excelentes toda equipada la cocina baño perfecto y el estado general del departamento super confortable y accesible gracias Lu por tu tiempo y dedicación
Good place!feels like home!convenient to sights!
We had a very nice stay at Lulu's place, very comfortable, great neighbourhood, near subway station / one stop from manhattan. Definitely recommend !
The apartment was very clean and well kept. The room was great and the bed was very comfortable. Great location with a quick train ride over to Manhattan. Really enjoyed our stay.
Beste Lage. Schöne Wohnung.
We had such a great time at Lulú's place! Everything was as described and better! The apartment is small but very well decorated and cozy! We would definitely come back when returning to NYC!

Great place, super convenient to the metro and buses. Easy to get to and from Manhattan, however also enjoyed walking around the neighborhood in Williamsburg, came across a lot of great little restaurants and shops. Excellent stay!
Good spot!

Unser Zimmer in Lulu's Wohnung war super schön, gemütlich und sehr sauber. Die Wohnung selbst ist toll ausgestattet und die Küche läd zum kochen und verweilen ein. Die Umgebung und das Haus verdienen das Prädikat "orginal Brooklyn" und das frei zugängliche Dach bietet einen tollen Blick über die Stadt, inklusive Blick auf die Skyline von Manhatten. 

Nach einer Woche fühlten wir uns bereits wie echte Williamsburger inklusive Stammlokal und Lieblings-Deli...

Jederzeit wieder. ..

Nous avons passé un bon séjour chez Lulu. Il y a trois chambres qui sont loués donc il faut accepter de partager les espaces communs avec des inconnus. Les chambres ne ferment pas à clé.
Mais l'appartement est idéalement situé, à un arrêt de métro de Manhattan.

Lulú's apartment is everything claimed. A cozy, but comfortable, room in a fifth floor walk-up (pace yourself!). The neighborhood is fun with lots of great options for food, drinks, and party. Yet, it's just far enough off Bedford that it has a quiet Brooklyn neighborhood feel with an old-school family vibe. The bed in this room is comfortable and the windows offer fresh air and nice morning light. The apartment is comfortably furnished and well-appointed. The towels were nice- clean and fluffy. We didn't need it but the washer and dryer is a nice luxury in a NY apartment. The tap water was good to drink and the shower is hot fast. I definitely recommend staying here.

A comfortable and cozy appartment with its own special style. There is everything you need and the details of your stay are organised in advance with the host giving fast answers and making sure everything is okay. 
We definitely recommend staying here.

Superbe appartement, bien equipe, tres lumineux et idealement situe au coeur de williamsburg. A noter cependant que depuis notre chambre nous entendions beaucoup le bruit de la rue (mais peut etre pas plus que dans les autres appartements new yorkais ?) Lulu est tres reactive, toujours a disposition et l organisation de notre arrivee / depart a ete tres simple.
Bref, nous recommendons vivement ce lieu pour une visite de New York depuis Brooklyn.

Great place to stay for exploring New York City. The apartment was clean and the bedroom was comfortable. The Williamsburg neighborhood by itself has a ton to do and explore, places to eat, and its own unique vibe. It took almost no time at all to walk to the nearest subway station and Manhattan was only one stop away which was awesome. The place is located in an awesome spot for exploring and for transportation, we loved it. Lulu is a phenomenal host, she provided a number of recommendations for places to eat, and she was very quick to respond to any questions we had. 5/5 stars would stay again.
You’ll love the location!!

Muy linda experiencia, excelente decisión quedarnos en casa de Lulú. Volvería mil veces.

Gracias!
Super nice and cool place!
The reservation was canceled 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment was amazing! It is located perfectly in Bushwick close to Williamsburg a lot of cool bars and restaurants. Getting into Manhattan was also really easy. Augustin's roommate were so nice during our stay. Would love to come back!

This is a nice place in a central location in Brooklyn.  Getting around the city is easy because there is a train stop just a couple of blocks away from the house.  Augustin was not in town when my friend and I stayed here, but the roommates were very helpful, and friendly.  They were able to answer questions about getting around, and places to go in the city.  The roommates took us out with them on New Years Eve, and we had a good time.  Everyone living there is either an artist or musician, and they create a nice community.  The house itself has a large communal area, and a large kitchen.  For the most part the house was clean, but like most homes with a few roommates it is not perfectly clean.  The bedroom is large, but has a low ceiling.  There is a dog and a couple of cats, all of which are very friendly.  My friend and I had a great time, and we would def. stay here again.

Super lovely place - is as exciting-looking as the photos suggest. It's very close to the subway as well, which is useful for getting into Manhattan or elsewhere in Brooklyn. Didn't meet Augustin as he was away but his (Hidden by Airbnb) seemed friendly.

I had an amazing time in NY and coming home at the end of the night to this chill loft was a major plus. The pictures definitely do the place justice. The roommates in the house were all really nice and welcoming. Nearby delis open late into the night kept me fed. The subway was only a few minutes walk away, so my commute into Manhattan and DUMBO were made really simple.

If you're chill and looking for a cool Brooklyn place, you should be happy with this place.
Pretty good experience :)
Augustin's place as totally rad!  Just as cool as the photos.  Great location, comfortable bed.
Everything was great! Especially Kurt took excellent care of me :-)

Amazing artsy apartment in my favourite part of Brooklyn. I didn't stay in this room due to a mix up, but I did stay in two different rooms in this place and both were comfortable, big, spacious and perfect for my NYC stay. Would recommend to any one. Conveniently located really close to the Flushing Ave train stop. I would recommend to any one coming to this big city to stay here!!

What's your idea of cool loft in the heart of Brooklyn? Well, this place is exactly What you mean. The room is very spacious, like the living room, where sometimes movies are projected on the wall, the kitchen and the bathroom. All the loft is very sunny and fool of art pieces.  The position is perfect cause the subway stop is at two streets close, so very confortable, with two lines. The roommates are all very kind and helpful And a cool fact is that in every moment of the day there is someone with have a talk. Place super suggested, when I'll return in New York I'll return here for sure!
Great Experience... :)

The space is in a great location. The warehouse is huge and great to hang out in. The room is not as sunny or as open and clean as the pictures show and the ceiling is actually quite low meaning there is a lot of ducking that needs to be done. But the bed is super comfortable. The check in process was tough as Augustin could not be home till 10pm, he did give us a contact of his housemate who we could contact. We contacted his housemate and left a voicemail, which he did not receive, and then we did not hear anything back from Augustin or his housemate. We arrived leisurely and luckily his housemate had gotten home and was cleaning the room for our arrival.

I never met the host but his housemate John was a real star, Mark and Kurt were also super helpful. Lots of intelligent conversations around the huge kitchen table, live music and a great atmosphere. This is the neighborhood where Grandmaster Flash roamed in 1977 and the Opening Scene from French Connection ends. It feels more like recognizing than discovering. Great place. If you like interesting people and places, gritty culture and creativity: Go!
Really cool place. Augustin was really very reactive.

Great for Short-term stays.

Great artist loft, with some cool people there.  

However, a couple of the roommates were quite territorial and appeared to be aspiring bullies, completely disrespecting other people's space and items, rather than stating if there was some type of issue.  The fridge was a complete sh*t show, with everyone eating everyone else's food, moving it around, throwing it out, and idk what else - brand new items would completely disappear.  

Basically, a couple of bad apples brought down the ambiance of a great space for everyone else.

Awesome for a short stay, huge open communal spaces, low ceilings in room and only a canvas as a door to room didn't bug me! Most of the roommates were chill and accommodating, Kurt even helped me bring my huge bag up a few flights of stairs! I did have a couple weird interactions w/ a couple of the roommates when I was taking a few pictures in the awesome space w/ a photographer buddy...perhaps territorial of their home and my towel oddly disappeared from the bathroom. Other than that I enjoyed my stay!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

El sitio es genial y Agustín es muy simpático la casa es mucho mejor de lo que se ve en las fotos y tiene una energía especial, también el barrio es muy peculiar y merece conocerlo un poco.
En resumen el mejor sitio para pasar unos días en NY.

Very welcoming.
Completely accurate portrayal in pictures.
Wouldn't hesitate to come again!
Thank you!

Sean and Lynette where perfect hosts. They were more than welcoming for our arrival. The flat was immaculate and was exactly as described. It was perfect for my 3 friends and I, with lots of wardrobe space and comfortable beds. They even gave us English breakfast tea, which after being away from England for 6 weeks we really appreciated! 
The flat is close to multiple subway stations making it easy to get around both Brooklyn and to Manhattan. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone wanting to stay in Brooklyn and would return myself !

Nous avons été accueilli comme des amis.
Le logement est parfait, il est fonctionnel et il y a tout ce qui est necessaire.
Le quartier est bien, l'appartement est proche de toutes les commodités, transports et commerces.
Il y a toutes les lignes de métro pour se rendre rapidement partout à Manhattan.
Sean & Lynette sont aux petits soins de leurs hôtes.

This was our first airbnb experience and we loved it. The apartment was exactly as described and pictured. Very clean, spacious and functional. Sean and Lynette were helpful and attentive to our needs, without ever being in our way or intrusive. The location was perfect for us. It seems that everything you might need is within proximity, and you can easily access the subway to Manhattan, or walk to prospect park, go to Coney Island, etc... The necessities were all provided, and even included some child-appropriate plastic ware, which came in handy since we had a toddler with us. We even had a "welcome basket", which was a very nice touch. We would definitely recommend this airbnb and will likely stay there again, next time we come to Brooklyn/NYC. I rarely give anything 5/5 stars, but I don't see how this experience could have been much better.

Sean and Lynette's place was the absolute perfect choice for my two week trip to Brooklyn. I was working on archival research at several area libraries, and not only is the apartment centrally located in terms of public transportation, it's also in a quiet building, so I was able to work "at home" on my writing project. This was the most important part for me. The apartment is bright, clean, and breezy. Sean and Lynette were wonderful hosts and my experience with them was nothing but positive. They responded to my request promptly, Lynette greeted me upon my arrival and showed me around the apartment, Sean was available to help me get online, and both of them were around in case I needed anything during my long stay.
I didn't need anything because everything one might need was available in the apartment. If you, like me, like to shop at local markets and cook at home, you'll find cooking basics in the kitchen. If you, like me, need more than one towel, you'll find ample linens provided. If you, like me, enjoy a vibrant neighborhood, Prospect Heights and the neighboring Fort Greene offer plenty of amazing restaurants, bars, parks, and shops. You can walk to the Brooklyn Library, Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park. The Barclays Center is very close. The Atlantic Center train hub is minutes away should you want to go into Manhattan for any reason...not that you would, since Brooklyn offers the best of NYC. 
As a longtime Brooklyn resident prior to moving to Colorado, I was happily at home in this beautiful apartment. I will absolutely request to stay again and bring my family along so they can enjoy and get to know Brooklyn the way I did when I lived there.

The apartment was very well positioned, comfortable, rather calm and really spacious (We were 4 adults and had plenty of space). The building itself is a typical Brooklyn building that you would expect for enjoying a great NYC experience. Metro is a few blocks away and this makes easy any day-trip to Manhattan or journey to JFK airport. Sean & Lynette had prepared everything for our arrival and are really nice people. I definitely recommend this place.

We very much enjoyed our stay in Sean & Lynette's appartment. First of all,  Sean and Lynette were helpful and flexible when we arrived a few hours before check-in time and that they allowed us to put our luggage into the appartment until it was nicely cleaned up for us. The location of the appartment is great with only a few minutes walk to several subway lines. The appartment was definitely spacious enough for the four of us (including our two teenagers). Only, for a longer stay, 1-2 airbeds would represent a more comfortable alternative than the two sofa beds.

Idéal pour un séjour à New York à partir de Brooklyn , avec un point très important, la proximité d'une station de métro ou passent 6 lignes, permettant un accès rapide et facile aux différents quartiers de Manhatan- le quêtiez est agréable, pratique, le logement est très  fonctionnel et Sean et Lynette sont aux petits soins, très gentils et disponibles. Excellent choix a tout point de vue!

Sean and Lynette are perfect hosts, very welcoming!
 The apartment is exactly as described and pictured. Clean, spacious, functional and fulfilled with natural light. Sean and Lynette were helpful and attentive to our needs. We arrived early in the morning and in the last day we´ve left late at night, but they opened their house to leave our luggage without any problem. The location was perfect, excellent connected from airport and to Manhattan.

A five star location! We loved everything about our stay. The apartment was super clean and very quiet at night! The owners were lovely people and supplied every amenity. After days of walking in New York, returning to the apartment gave the feeling of "being back home". We will certainly rent again when back in Brooklyn!

Sean and Lynette were great hosts and very hospitable. They asked us all the time if everything was OK in the apartment. The apartment was large, bright , very comfortable, and located near the subway and shopping. The neighborhood was quiet and beautiful. Definitely. The hosts and the department are highly recommended.

Sean & lynette were great hosts. They welcomed us in their house on the first day and gave us a lot of infos about the place, the neighborhood and things to do in Brooklyn and in Manhattan. The appartment is spacious and well oriented so that there is a lot of light when it is sunny outside. The appartment is very well furnished with everything you need in the kitchen. It is also very clean and we appreciated it. The appartment is very close to the barclays center and its Metro station with several lines to go to Manhattan. We also enjoyed to spend time in Brooklyn and the appartment is well located to explore this place. We really recommand this place (5 stars without hesitation) and we look forward to come back to it next time we come to NYC.

Sean and Lynette could not have been more helpful.  Lovely place to stay with two small children (not greeted everywhere with smiles -- so it was lovely to have such a warm welcome!)  Easy dinner delivery from loads of good nearby restaurants, playground across the street for working off energy in the afternoon between "grown up" stuff.  Everything clean and well thought out.  Easy walk to the subway, no problem with taxis, uber, or shuttle to the airport from this location.

Lynette and Sean have a great place in Brooklyn, and we loved staying there. They were generous and gracious hosts that made every effort to make sure that we were comfortable and felt welcome. For us the location was perfect, affordable but close enough to transportation to easily reach Manhattan and walking distance to many fun areas in Brooklyn. The apartment was well equipt, beautiful, and spotless. (It was even nicer in reality than in the photos). So thank you, Sean and Lynette. We hope to be back soon.

The stay at Sean & Lynette's AirBnB was amazing! The apartment was exactly as presented in the photos, we had a little welcoming basket and they provided us with everything we needed, including very helpful restaurant tips. Our lovely hosts were always available and made our stay a truly great experience! Thank you! Sean even walked us to the subway station in the end so that we would get the best connection to the airport... couldn't imagine better hosts and I would definitely try to book with them again when I come back to NY.
Regarding the apartment: Its spacious and light and definitely big enough for four people to sleep in. The location is also very convenient, since its just a walk of a couple of minutes to the next subway station and we (three girls) always felt save in the neighborhood. I can surley recommend to stay with Sean & Lynette! It was wonderful!

Perfect location and great apartment! Lynette and Sean are great hosts, always willing to help...we really appreciated their help and their warm welcome. The apartment is really quiet. We would highly recommend this place! / Emplacement idéal et appartement super. Lynette et Sean sont des hotes parfaits, toujours prêts à aider...nous avons vraiment apprécié leur aide et leur accueil chaleureux. L'appartement est très calme. Nous recommendons sans réserve cet appartement.

Le logement correspond aux photos, vous n'aurez pas de mauvaises surprises. 
Le quartier est vraiment sympa, il y a deux stations de métro à 5 min de marche du logement et des fast food et restaurants à proximité pour les soirs ou vous n'avez pas envie de prendre le métro pour manger.
Sean et Lynette sont très sympatiques, à l écoute et prêt à vous aider en cas de problèmes ou questions.
En bref nous avons passé un excellent séjour et nous recommandons ce logement.

Sean & Lynette are fantastic, the house was spotless, warm and equipped with all the basic necessities including milk, water, biscuits, coffee, tea etc ...(unexpected!!) we arrived in the evening and we were able to rest immediately. Sean & Lynette are organized and always available, we communicated with the AIRbnb app  for everything and if necessary helped us in person. Council very much their home. I hope to see them again soon.

Sean and Lynette were both there to greet us even though we arrived quite a bit later than expected.  They were kind enough to provide excellent recommendations for a late dinner, showed us around, and even helped us up the stairs with our bags.  They were unfailingly kind and attentive throughout the remainder of our visit, occasionally checking in and responding immediately to any message.  They are fantastic hosts and meeting them was an unexpected highlight of the trip.  The apartment is lovely- clean, spacious, and well lit.  In my opinion it looks even nicer than the pictures.  The four of us were very comfortable there, and even though we didn't cook much we were very grateful for the keurig, kettle, and complementary coffee and tea for our morning drinks!  It's also very well connected, just minutes away from two subway stops, and with a ton of great restaurants and bars around the corner.  We will definitely stay here again when we return to NYC!

Well, Lynette and his husband were an excellent hosts. They gave you a warm welcome and they make you feel at home immediately. They offer you help in all what you need. Our experience in this airbnb was awesome, everything was perfect and more. The neighborhood is secure and calm. You got a lot of things close to the apartment: restaurants, supermarket, laundry, the subway (so you can move to all NYC). The apartment was very clean, its cozy and it has all the amenities you'll need (food, wifi, great beds, heating/air condicioner, good kitchen). Me and my family highly recommend this air bnb!! You'll no regret cause the owners will make you stay a pleasure.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Brooklyn at Sean and Lynette's even though the weather was less than cooperative with our plans to explore NYC.  We endured the worst storm to hit New York they said in 10 years and we couldn't have asked for better hosts to be snowed in with.  They were attentive to our every need, checking in with us via email to ensure we had everything we needed and personal visits to their place for this and that were pleasant and welcoming.
  
For the days we were able to get out everything was very accessible and convenient.  The subway a 5 minute walk, easy peasy to get to Manhattan and other great areas, great neighborhoods with fantastic restaurants and cafes within short walking distance, and the beautiful Prospect Park minutes away as well.

The apartment is exactly as shown in the photos, it is spacious, very clean, and has a fully stocked kitchen, they even had a few kitchen staples there for us when we arrived which was a very nice touch.

I can't say enough nice things about Sean and Lynette, they really made us feel comfortable in their place and really just salt of the earth type people that we feel so lucky to have met! We will be in contact with them for future visits to NYC!
Great location. Nice spacious and clean apartment.

Everything was ok! the apartment is very confortable and the neighbourhood is good!
Owners of the department are very hospitable and friendly.

The place was perfect and exactly as described. Sean and Lynette were very helpful and accommodating with any questions we had, and even stocked the kitchen with coffee, fresh fruit, and snacks for our stay. The apartment was very clean and comfortable and SO convenient to catching a bunch of different subway lines into Manhattan. The neighborhood itself had yummy restaurants and cute shops in easy walking distance.

Well, could this apartment have been handier or more spacious? No!  We had four very tall adults staying there over a long weekend, and we  were all very comfortable.  Sean and Lynette are friendly and welcoming and we really appreciated the pint of fresh milk, cheese, crackers and apples waiting for us in the fridge.  We loved Brooklyn--who knew? And this apartment was a tiny stone's throw from the Barclay's Centre, where we enjoyed a weekend of basketball and just as close to two subway stops, so we could nip into Manhattan really quickly for sight seeing.  Thank you Sean and Lynette, for being such gracious hosts and for sharing your spacious, bright and comfortable apartment with us.
Sean and Lynette are very nice people. The appartment is very well located in Brooklyn near public transport. It's nice, clean and well fournished. Very comfortable. A good choice to visit NYC.

Nous avons passé un magnifique séjour. L'endroit est charmant et idéalement placé. Le quartier vraiment sympathique et proche de tout. Magasins, transport en commun, connexion avec Manhattan super facile. C'est super agréable de rentrer dans un endroit calme et sympathique après une journée de visite à Manhattan. L'appartement est spacieux et très agréable. Sean et Lynette sont adorables. nous avons été accueilli magnifiquement et ils se sont montrés super flexible par rapport à nos horaires de voyage. Je le recommande vivement et y retournerai surement lors d'un prochain passage à NY.

Great apartment and location! Sean met us in the rain and made us feel very welcome. Sean and Lynette made our stay very easy. Look forward to visiting NY again, and will definitely look to stay with S&L!

L'accueil de Sean et Lynette est parfait. Du lait, de l'eau, des fruits, du fromage, des céréales nous attendaient dans à notre arrivée. Nous avons apprécié cette attention. L'appartement est très fonctionnel et propre, et idéalement situé près d'une importante station de métro (nombreuses lignes) qui  permet un accès simple à tous les lieux de visite de Manhattan et à JFK.

Nuestra experiencia en la casa fue maravillosa!!!! Estamos súper contentas de haberlos elegido! La casa es hermosa y muy muy cómoda... A un paso de todo! Llegas en subway a Manhattan rapidísimo y volves a descansar a un barrio muy tranquilo y seguro!!! Gracias a los dos por cuidarnos todo el tiempo siempre fueron muy atentos!!!! Saludos!!!

La casa está situada en pleno centro de Brookling, todo estaba muy limpio y ordenado.
Sean y Lynette son encantadores, te ayudan en todo lo que pueden.
Totalmente recomendable.

Sean & Lynette sont charmants et accuillants (du lait, du fromage de l'eau en bouteille et autre était disposés dans le frigo à note attention), discrets, agréables (ils ont pris de nos nouvelles par téléphone lors de notre séjour) et serviables (nous avons eu une clim en panne qui a été réparée dans la journée). Le quartier est très sure et fort agréable. On y trouve des rues animées et branchées avec beaucoup de bons restos, de bars et de boutiques tendances. Le métro à seulement 5 minutes à pied est parfait puisque presque toutes les lignes reliant Manhattan sont proposées (donc très peu de correspondances à utiliser durant le séjour) et la liaison avec l'aéroport est simple et assez rapide. L'appartement est très agréable et spacieux avec beaucoup de rangements. Seul petit point négatif, le frigo qui fait beaucoup de bruit donc la nuit pensez à vous munir de boules kies si vous dormez dans le salon (du coup on entend plus rien c'est parfait) et un matelas assez mou concernant le canapé lit du salon. Il manque également 1 ou 2 couverts de plus. 
Des hôtes et un appartement que nous recommandons et nous retournerons bien volontiers chez Sean et Lynette lors d'un prochain week-end à New York.
Very good place, great location, spend only five minutes you can arrive subway station. And the host is also very nice and help. The guid she gives to us is very useful!

Apologies for the delay, 20 hours flight and we have returned to my house. Thank you very much for your kindness, the apartment is great and the wonderful neighborhood. Lynette and Sean are very helpful, friendly, excellent hosts. The apartment is in perfect condition and they are available all day. It is very safe, 2 blocks from the subway, which runs all day. There are everything in the area, even if you do not want to go to Manhattan there are many options.
Brookyn is great!!! I recommend the place 100%!!!!
We will be back!!! Regards Daniel
Excellent accueil à notre arrivée malgré notre retard

Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable chez Sean et Lynette. L'appartement est sobre, pratique et bien situé pour se rendre à Manhattan par le métro.  Nos hôtes ont été de très bons conseils et toujours disponibles.

Le logement spacieux et confortable est idéalement situé à quelques pas de deux stations de métro. Le quartier est calme et une zone commerciale bien pratique est à proximité. Le matelas du canapé lit n'est pas parfait et un peu de vaisselle supplémentaire serait la bienvenue mais cela n'entache en rien notre grande satisfaction d'avoir choisi cet appartement. Pour parfaire le tout, Sean et Lynette ont été accueillants, disponibles et soucieux de notre bien être. Merci à eux.
We spent 3 days in New York, the appartment is very well located and very calm. Some shopping had been donne so we could take the breakfast the first morning. We recommand it.

Very nice flat in a safe and quiet place in brooklyn 6 mn walk from bar restaurant supermarket and metro station (from 15 to 30 mn to manhattan)
Beds and sofa are comfortable and we even had an extra mattress for our daughter
Sean and Lyne tte are very welcoming and available we had a minor issue to connect to wifi when we arrived and Sean fixed it immediately when we needed an iron Lyne tte brought it in 5 mn 
It was really a pleasure to discover new york staying in this apartment and place
Appartement très agréable dans un quartier sur et calme à brooklyn ambiance très agréable 
Tous les services et restaurants sont à 6mn à pied
Grosse station de métro qui permet d aller sans changement à manhattan entre 15 et 30 mn
Seam et Lyne tte sont très disponibles et particulièrement accueil amis
Excellent sejour

Quel accueil de Sean et Lynette, Tout est prévu, tout est sous contrôle, Bel appartement traversant, avec parquet et mur en brique dans un immeuble typique de NY, Il ne manque plus que l'escalier de secours en fer et tout y est.

Sean y Lynette siempre estuvieron al pendiente de nosotros y de ayudarnos en lo que necesitáramos, la comunicación fue excelente. La casa es tal como se muestra en las fotos, amplia y funcional. Muy bien ubicada y cerca de las estaciones del subway que te conectan a todos lados. Los restaurantes y tiendas de la zona muy buenas. El barrio muy seguro y tranquilo. Nos encantó!

We spent 3 nights in New York and thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Sean & Lynettes' place. Great flat and location. Big underground station within 5 min walk. Sean & Lynette are great hosts, very friendly and available at all time. Sean welcomed us despite our very late arrival. The smart "lock box" system allows very flexible arrivals. It was a touching surprise to discover apples, milk, cheese and coffee waiting for us. Lots of shops and restaurants in the area and a deli round the corner. Thank you Sean & Lynette, we had a great time in NY. We definitely recommend this flat and wouldn't hesitate to book it again.
Nous avons passé 3 nuits à New York avec nos deux filles (grandes ados). L'appartement était parfait, exactement comme sur les photos. Très bien situé, à 5 mn d'une grande station de métro, à 2 pas de nombreux commerces et restaurants et dans un quartier "safe" et sympathique. Les filles ont adoré le WiFi hyper performant ;-) Sean & Lynette sont des hôtes accueillants et disponibles. Sean nous a accueilli malgré notre arrivée très tardive. D'ailleurs un système ingénieux d'une "lock box" permet une grande flexibilité. Nous avons aussi beaucoup apprécié la gentille attention : pommes, lait, fromage, crackers dans le frigo. Un appartement que nous recommandons et n'hésiterions pas à choisir lors d'un future passage à NY à 4.

My parents and I just had a great week in Sean and Lynette's apartment. 

The spacious apartment has everything that a guest needs from complimentary tooth brushes and toothpaste to a little manual with all the important info about the apartment and the area from getting a taxi to eating out.

Sean and Lynette themselves were really nice and accommodating. They answered messages super swiftly and even let me stow my luggage in the closet and hold on to the key until long after check-out time.

All this helped my parents and me to have the perfect NY experience. 

Thank you, Sean & Lynette!

Lynette has been at great host. The apartment was nice and clean.
All infornamtin needed was being delivered. Like where to get key if coming late.

Sean et lynette sont des hôtes simples, discrets, mais accueillants, chaleureux et attachants de part leur gentillesse et leur dévouement au quotidien.
Ils ont été disponibles pour nous, jusqu à nous accompagner au train pour le retour vers l aéroport le dernier jour.
Quant à l appartement, conforme à la description, est proche de toutes commodités et à l écart de la vie tumultueuse de Manhattan et quelques denrées alimentaires nous y attendaient à notre arrivée.
Bref, rien a dire sauf recommander cet endroit pour un séjour à New York dans la simplicité!
Sean et lynette ne changez rien, vous êtes parfaits!

It was a great apartment, and Sean and Lynette was very nice. There was milk, chiese, 2 bier, coffee and more ind the kitchen. The apartment was like the photo and it was it was very good placed to downtown and subways in Brooklyn. Stay here, it´s much  better than Manhatten. It is easy to travel to Manhatten. And it is more silent and the "real" New York. 

Vi var meget glade for at bo her. Vores værtspar er meget søde, og det kan kun anbefales. Eneste kommentar kunne være, at der kun var rent, ikke superrent. Lejligheden er lidt slidt, men det gør faktisk ingenting. Dobbeltsengen var rigtig god at ligge i. Man skal dog være opmærksom på, at det er på 2 sal uden elevator med en ret smal trappe. Lejligheden er rigtig god til par med 2 børn.

Sean et Lynette ont vraiment été sympathiques lors de notre arrivée et tout au long du séjour. Echange très facile par message Air BnB. Appartement relativement calme, à proximité d'un quartier très vivant. L'accès à Manhattan est très facile (plusieurs lignes de métro au départ du Barclays Center). Les amateurs de basket ou de hockey pourront se rendre au Barclays Center situé à 200m.
Sean & Lynette's place was ideal for us.  Exactly as described, spacious and comfortable.  Great communication, easy access and the subway was only a five minute walk.  We would stay again.

Sean and Lynette checked with us before and during our visit to see if every part of our stay was going smoothly.  Since they couldn't be there when we checked in, there were detailed instructions on how to obtain the keys.  That went smoothly, no problems.  One evening, they came up to introduce themselves, and we thoroughly enjoyed talking with them.  We could have visited longer, but it was getting late!  I had a question on getting a dependable taxi very early in the morning, and after messaging on the AB&B site, Sean replied in a timely manner!  (The taxi was right on time, also!)  The apartment was fantastic!  Easy to walk to subway, good food nearby (Donut Plant, Gino's Pizza, Bergan's Bagels)! Shopping, too, if you want. Even a grocery store close if you need one! The neighborhood was quiet, safe to walk through.  We felt very secure and comfortable walking in the neighborhood both during the day and in the evening/after dark.  The apartment looked like the pictures!  Clean, neat, Keurig, coffee pods - they even had fruit, cheese, and crackers upon arrival!  I would definitely stay at their place again, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it!
Sean and Lynette have a lovely apartment that was perfect for three of us. They were very welcoming and the whole stay was very smooth. Would stay again if we were to return to New York.

This is a cozy apartment conveniently located to a Metro stop, grocery store, and local businesses.  The neighborhood was safe and clean.  Sean and Lynette were quick to respond to our communications and great at making suggestions for things to do in Brooklyn.
Host was very helpful when we had some problems with unknown devices (gas-oven). We felt very welcome, it was awesome!

This is a thoughtfully planned AirBnB place for travellers. It was spotlessly clean, all the essentials were provided, plus plenty of non-essentials like milk and pasta. Sean was attentive but not intrusive. And the place is great! Plenty of space for a family of four, just round the corner to the subway straight into Manhattan, but quiet (for New York). We loved it!
Very nice

We had a wonderful stay.  We felt home the minute we walked in. The apartment is very well located.  It is quiet but only a block away from the subway hub 'Atlantic Terminal'.  We managed to do all our visits strictly using the subway. (Most of the time with one single direct line.)
We really enjoyed meeting Sean, Lynette and their daughter.  They are a very nice and sweet family always available to help.
We would definitely recommend the place to New-York visitors.

Sean y  Lynette son dos personas amabilísimas. Correctas y siempre bien dispuestas. El apartamento es amplio, luminoso, cómodo. Cerca de muchas estaciones de Metro la ubicación en brookyn es ideal. En relación precio calidad es lo mejor.

Sean and Lynette's place is exactly as shown in the pictures. It is a spacious and very comfortable apartment. The location is perfect for tourists and those who want to see the city highlights and downtown. The neighborhood is safe and peaceful. We had a great stay!

Sean & Lynette's apartment is very clean and comfortable. The transportation and shopping are very convenient around the area. And Sean is very nice, patient and helpful. We had a great time there in Brooklyn.

We had a great stay in this apartment. It had every home comfort we needed and was in a great location for experiencing Brooklyn life as well as getting into Manhattan quickly. In the evening it was lovely to escape the madness. We felt right at home. Sean and Lynette are wonderful hosts.

L'appartement est très bien équipé, idéalement placé à 8 mn à peine d'une grande station de métro qui dessert tout New York. A proximité il y a des restaurants, des magasins alimentaire et vestimentaire, des bars, le Barclay center avec des animations en tout genre quasi quotidienne..... Rien a redire tout était parfait. Un accueil des hôtes chaleureux qui ont su rester discrets et disponibles.
Home sweet home!  What a lovely place to stay in the heart of Brooklyn.  The hosts were excellent and everything was how it was described/pictured and more.  This is a GREAT place to stay!
Highly suggest staying at Sean & Lynette's. Exactly how it is described in all of the past positive reviews.

Sean and Lynette are amazing. They are super helpful and they care about us a lot. Especially during the days me and my friends were there, there was a snow storm. They offered to show give us food and show us to the grocery store. Super nice people and the apartment is wonderful! Great location and the room itself is comfy and beautiful!
We had a wonderful stay at Sean& Lynette's place.  The apartment was very nice and well located for restaurants and subway.  They were very responsive and helpful.

We loved staying at Sean and Lynette's place.  Great communication, wonderful location.  Plenty of space for us and two teenagers.  They had milk/cheese/fruit greeting us which was wonderful after a long travel day.  We got to meet the hosts briefly and they were very friendly and accommodating..we would stay here again if back in the area.
Very nice hosts. Great place.

Great place in an amazing location if you are going to the Barclays Center or just want to be in a perfect Brooklyn location for exploring. The Long Island Rail Road is just a few blocks away so getting there from Kennedy is simple and less than $10. The subway that services the Barclays Center pretty much goes everywhere. There is a ton of shopping and great food (Don Chingon for mexican, James for brunch, Patsy's for Pizza) just a short walk away. The unit is safe and clean, has nice water pressure and plenty of hot water in the shower, and the kitchen is more than adequate. The back bedroom is huge and the pull out couch bed is comfortable. There is a Bluetooth speaker, fast WiFi and the towels were soft. The owners were very accommodating to some last minute emergency changes in plans that occurred, and getting in and checking out was a breeze. Overall a perfect airbnb experience that was also a great value.

Sean and Lynette were extremely accommodating and helpful. Their apartment was very clean and and comfortable, and commuting around Brooklyn and into Manhattan was a breeze. Would definitely recommend!

This was a great find! It was spacious, super convenient to get around Brooklyn and Manhattan, and a great deal. Sean and Lynette were extremely helpful. They were in great communication and responded quickly to any questions that we had. We loved our stay and would definitely seek out their place again when we return to NYC.
This house was very nice for my family. Especially it was very accessible from downtown so that we can easily enjoy Newyork city tour. Thank you Sean & Lynette^^
We had a great time stay at sean place ! Its clean, good location, and very quiet. Sean is a good host she response all my questions and very helpful for everything. Recommend!!!

We had a great stay at Sean and Lynette place. It's located in a super convenient location, well connected with Manhattan and JFK. The apartment is just like in the pictures. 

They were available for us the whole time.

Sean and Lynette were very communicative and helpful. The apartment was as per description and it was very clean and cozy. You have to climb up a few stairs to the apartment, but that´s no problem. Some juicy apples were waiting for us as welcome :) In round about 10 minutes walkway you can arrive the subway station at Barclay Center. From there it´s easy to go to Manhattan or JFK-airport (better to take the LIRR). We always felt safe in this area and we can recommend this lovely home!
Big, clean, bright. Large spacious bedroom, comfortable sleeping, easy access and check-in. Close to metro, Barclays Center with shopping. Thank you for the cheese and apples! Loved you place!

We had a really fantastic stay at Sean & Lynette's place in Brooklyn. The apartment is well located, very near numerous subway stations and plenty of local restaurants and eateries (definitely visit Bergen Bagels and the Habana Outpost!) It's clean, well kept and a good size for the four of us for five days. Sean & Lynette were great hosts, they stopped by one evening for a chat which resulted in a birthday pie being given to my sister for her birthday - A+ hosting!! Next time we find ourselves in New York we will be looking to re-book, highly recommended!

Schöne Wohnung in Brooklyn 
Die Beschreibung der 2-Zi Wohnung entspricht der Ausschreibung. Sie ist in einem Wohngebiet, relativ ruhig gelegen, mit guter Verkehrsanbindung. Zur Subway-Haltestelle Atlantic-Barclaycenter sind es 5 min. zu Fuß. Dort gibt es auch ein großes Einkaufszentrum. Nach Midtown Manhatten fährt man ca. 30 min.
Die Gastgeber sind sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich. 
Nächstes Mal sind wir gerne wieder dort.
We had great time in NYC staying at Sean and Lynette. Easy communication and check-in/out - whenever we had a question, they helped immediately. This spacious apartment is close to subway. Recommend!

Sean and Lynette were such gracious hosts and their apartment was perfect! The apartment was very clean and spacious, and we appreciated the coffee and snacks they left for us. Sean and Lynette checked in by text throughout our visit to make sure everything was going well and went above and beyond to make sure we enjoyed our stay. We could not have asked for a better experience! Thanks :-)

El departamento fue tal y como lo vimos en fotos, y quedamos muy contentos por la cercanía que había de la estación del metro que conecta en 20 minutos con Manhattan, ademas esta la estación de trenes, que también nos resulto muy fácil usar, y conocer los afueras de Nueva York.  Muchos negocios cerca, supermercados y botilleria. El departamento cómodo y muy privado, con todo lo necesario para llegar a descansar después de muchas caminatas. Todo perfecto y de acuerdo a lo que nosotros esperábamos como familia.
Sean y Lynette siempre estuvieron pendientes por mensajería si necesitábamos algo mas de lo que había en el departamento. Felices por las 2 semanas es nos alojamos ahí.

The appartement is very close from a metro station where you can catch several of the main metro lines to go to Manhattan or other places. Sean and Lynette were very nice and quick to answer to any questions before and during our stay. The appartement is spacious and convenient. The principal bedroom is very comfortable, however I would recommand the sofa bed only for children or young adults as it's a bit old and not very comfortable for two people. When we arrived we had fruits, milk, several kind of biscuits and coffee waiting for us which is very appreciable. We really enjoyed our stay at Sean and Lynette's place!

Great spaceous accommodations.  They checked in on us, were friendly and had snacks when we arrived! Clean, plenty of room to sit and unpack for the week.  Surprisingly quiet area for being in the city. Great neighborhood!

Appartement tres propre et calme adapté pour 4 personnes
Ce n'est pas a Manhattan mais l'emplacement est vraiment très commode et proche des lignes de métro qui permettent d'aller partout en moins de 30 minutes. Sean et Lynette sont braiment disponible et arrangeants.
Parfait!
Muy buena la atención! Todo fue bien!

Apparemment très bien situé,proche du barclays center avec toutes les lignes de métro qui vous amènent directement à Manhattan. On a adoré le quartier,très typique, notre fils de 8 ans a même joué au foot avec des jeunes au stade d en face. Super séjour.Merci pour tout

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour chez Sean & Lynette. L appartement est idéalement situé dans Brooklyn, Métro, restos, proximité de Manhattan bref tout y est ! Sean et Lynette ont été de supers hôtes, leurs conseils ont été précieux. Nous recommandons vivement cet appartement.

Sean and Lynette's apartment was very comfortable, conveniently situated, and it much be said they went the extra distance; they made up the sofa bed for me (very clean and comfy), and stocked the fridge with some basics - an absolute lifesaver after a long flight! Many thanks to you both! Emma (Australia).
From top to bottom, my mother couldn't have asked for a more welcoming and comfortable stay. She is already talking about her next visit! Sean and Lynette are the best hosts one could ask for.
Buen apartamento en zona tranquila y cerca de transporte. Dueños muy atentos y que solucionan cualquier duda. Muy recomendable.

Sean & Lynette's place was nothing short of perfect for our stay. We were greeted by a welcome book with recommendations of places to eat, house rules, and wifi password. Our hosts also left some snacks in the fridge for us with a stocked coffee and tea bar after our flight was delayed by 3 hours. Spacious living/kitchen/dining and bedroom areas allowed us to spread out and feel settled into the space. Netflix was a welcome add-on on breaks between sightseeing. We are very grateful for the opportunity to stay in their clean, comfy, and convenient apartment, and we hope to stay there again in the future. Highly recommend!
Gran ubicacion. Muy limpio y comodo.

Lynette was the best host ever, she helped in every possible aspect during my stay. She went above and beyond into making our week in Brooklyn, NY, the best week we could hope for. The apartment is amazingly confortable and I would recommend it every single time. 10/10
Spacious and clean, located close to cool streets and easy subway rides to Manhattan. Our hosts were helpful and friendly.

Die Lage ist super zentral in Brooklin. Die Metro ist wenige Minuten zu Fuß entfernt, es gibt leckere Restaurants in der Nähe und die beiden sind so liebe und hilfsbereite Vermieter.
Wir haben uns pudelwohl gefühlt und kommen gerne wieder <3
Sean and Lynette’s Place was absolutely perfect. Felt like home away from home. I’ll definitely stay with them next time I’m in NYC.

Sean & Lynette's place is a perfect example of an outstanding Airbnb experience.
Their place is as described, and is perfectly located.  In a fantastic part of Brooklyn - super convenient to Manhattan, but still in it's own self-sufficient area with great shops, cafes, restaurants around.  Felt very safe (there is a police station and fire station on the block) and the street was a great example of a New York street - literally a perfect location for exploring NYC but feeling like a local.
The apartment has everything you need, and is really spacious, and has multiple bed options.  Feels homely, yet clean and uncluttered.  There were lovely touches I didn't expect like a fully stocked coffee machine and snacks.  So much space, closet space and was generally quiet and comfortable.
I have nothing bad to say about the place.
Sean and Lynette introduced themselves, were lovely and made themselves available during the stay to help.
I will definitely be returning here on my next trip. Loved it, and loved their hosting.

Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine chez Sean et Lynette. 
L'appartement est conforme à ce qui est dit dans l'annonce.Il est propre, dans une rue calme mais très proche de rues plus animées (restos, supermarché, galeries,...). Les stations de métro très proches aussi sont très pratiques pour relier Manhattan rapidement.
Sean et Lynette sont très accueillants et sont prêts à répondre à toutes nos questions ou autres demandes (ils nous ont imprimé des billets de match NBA, par exemple).
Nous recommandons vivement ce logement!

Sean and Lynette are wonderful host: friendly, very polite and always present in communication. Their apartment was clean and confortable, very well equipped with all we need. Check in and check out were perfect and easy and they also let us know stay some hours more than standard. We also loved the area, close to atlantic station for train and many metro lines and to prospect park. Thaks for all!

This apartment is better than it's pictures!  It's very spacious with good beds and a nice bathroom and kitchen set up. The building is quiet and it seems to be in a very safe neighborhood. We brought a car and there was 24 hour parking around the corner. Did not use the car in the city as the public transportation was close by. The neighborhood has great restaurants and shops and most places were very reasonable. Sean and Lynette answered all questions quickly and checked in with us by the inbox almost daily. There were thoughtful and essential items in the kitchen including milk for coffee, fresh fruit, coffee, tea and cheese. That was all very welcome as we checked in quite late at night. Would definitely stay here again

Sean & Lynette's apartment is spacious, bright, sparklingly clean, and located in a wonderful neighborhood. I and two friends were completely comfortable during our stay. We had all the amenities we needed and found the hosts helpful and very responsive. We had a great time and recommend the apartment highly!

Nice and spacious apartment, good for families and close to subway stations, supermarket , restaurants and shops.
Thank you for the fruits , cheese and coffee...very useful after a long early bird flight.
Communication was always timely and accurate.
Recommended.

It was my 1st time using AirBnB and I absolutely loved my stay in Brooklyn!! They were so nice and accommodating! The apartment was clean and comfortable. The location is PERFECT and walkable to everywhere. I’ll definitely book again with them! Thanks again for everything!
Apartment was really well located - Sean and Lynette were very helpful and welcoming - we'd happily stay here again!

We spent 10 days in NY with kids. Our major goal was to see all major sightseens of Manhatten and surroundings. I was searching for a long time and chose this place. We could't find anything better for our budget. It's a quite street but just 5 minutes away from big subway hub Atlantic/Barclays center. Large supermarket, department stores, cafes they are all very close. Apartment is in historical building and has atmosphere. The most important for me that everything was very very very clean: clean linens and towels, clean dishes, clean bathroom, clean apartment. Supplies of good coffee and tea, some basics in kitchen cabinets and fridge - it was all very nice. I was cooking and found all dishware I need for that. And we get instant response from our dear hosts for all our requests. It was as low as 15 F outside but very warm in the apartment. And you can always ask to adjust termostat. Beds are comfortable - its full beds not convertibles.
Sean and Lynette, thank you for making us feel at home! We had great experience and surely stay with you if visit NY again.

This place was a good as advertised and even better! They hosts were extremely accommodating and left no request unanswered. I would strongly recommend anyone to rent this location for their first trip to NYC. Affordable plus convenient to everything you want to see in the Big Apple.
Very spacious and clean apartment . Nice to have coffee and milk there when we arrived. Location was perfect for us. Helpful hosts. Would consider staying there again.

My in-laws spent a long weekend at Sean and Lynette’s, and this is what they have written: This was our first Airbnb experience and we couldn't have been more impressed.  The reviews were entirely accurate: spacious, clean, comfortable, quiet, great location, everything you need!  The hosts were so friendly, responsive, accommodating, and thoughtful.  They had even stocked the kitchen with plenty of coffee/tea (complete with fresh whole milk in the frig), cheese, crackers, and fresh fruit.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would not hesitate to return or recommend this place to others.  Thank you Sean and Lynette!

Appartement spacieux et très propre  pour un tarif très correct . 
Emplacement idéalement situé  dans Brooklyn ..  pas trop loin de Manhattan  (15min en metro) . Quartier sympa (école , commerces à proximité )
Pour les amateurs de basket , l appartement est à 5min du Barclays Center des NETS ...
Les propriétaires sont super gentils et très réactifs  !! 

Bref nous recommandons cet endroit sans hésitations !!!

When it comes to staying in Brooklyn, it's all about location and this place is right in the heart of everything.  Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, I definitely recommend staying here as it provides all the comforts of home as well as a nice, quiet working environment. Not to mention, Sean & Lynette, by far, were the best and most understanding hosts I've ever stayed with. They accommodated my every need and went above and beyond the call of duty.
La ubicación es perfecta para moverte en metro a donde quieras. La zona es tranquila y tienes a dos cuadras un centro comercial y supermercado. Excelente atención de parte de los anfitriones.
Ubicación inmejorable, muy amplio, limpio y cómodo. El Barrio es seguro y tranquilo .

We enjoyed our stay at Sean and Lynette's place for our Spring break trip to NY with our 2 kids. Their place is clean, comfortable, quiet and close to several subway and bus stops.  It took about 30 minutes to get to Times Square area in Manhattan.  If you come with a car, it is a struggle to find free street parking.  We found a great spot, but had to move it due to street cleaning and had to park in a parking garage that was over $40 a day.  Just something to keep in mind if you are driving. Sean and Lynette's place is a great value for being near lots of shops, restaurants and the subway. We would stay there again!

Nous avons été extrêmement satisfaits de l'appartement de Sean et Lynette. Nous sommes partis en famille avec nos deux enfants. C'est un appartement très pratique pour les familles, à 5 minutes à pieds des métros pour aller à Manhattan très accessible pour aller aussi bien au nord ou au sud de Manhattan y compris tard le soir. Nous nous sommes sentis en sécurité dans ce quartier. L'appartement est situé dans une rue plutôt calme, très reposant après une journée à Manhattan. Nous avons pu nous préparer à manger tous les soirs à l'appartement, il y a des magasins pour acheter à manger à 5 minutes à pied, nous allions souvent au Whole food market pour acheter de la nourriture bio (  proximité du métro atlantic barclay ). Lynette et Sean ont répondu très rapidement à toutes nos demandes et ont tout fait pour nous arranger. L'appartement est grand avec une grande chambre et un grand salon ( avec un lit 2 places dans le salon) la literie est bonne, L'appartement était très propre. je conseille fortement cet appartement nous avons été très très contents et cela a contribué à la réussite de notre voyage.
